input:
Summarize: I'm the outlier that found the Wii controls infinitely easier and quicker than PS2 one, having played only about 90mins of the PS2 one (stopped after the announcement of the Wii version) and all the way through on the Wii.
It's far inferior to the Wii and GameCube versions.
the wii was better then the ps2 and games looked better then the ps2.
Graphically speaking, Wii has slightly better graphics than PS2 and slightly worse graphics than Xbox 1 by looking at the launch titles.
The Jak and Daxter games on the PS2 used dynamic loading, and the PS2 hardware was clearly inferior to the Wii in every respect.
I wish the Wii can do better than PS2.
In Japan, the Wii sold better in 2007 than the PS2 did in 2001, but it peaked that year and declined rapidly while the PS2 had a much slower taper.
The Wii is the first time in a very long time when Nintendo had the graphically inferior console (it was also superior to the PS2 and the Xbox btw).
I thought the Wii should have better graphics than PS2.
The PS3 only gets used for PS2 games (inferior to even the Gamecube) and Blu-Ray movies while the Wii gets all the attention.
The wii u isn't even better then the orig xbox or ps2!
The PS2 version is far superior to the Wii one.
Ps2 games LOOKED BETTER THAN WII GAMES!!!!!!
agreed PS2 controls are way cooler than Wii controls for this.
My PS2 looks a hell of a lot better on my 20" screen in my room than a 30+" screen, so the same logic would probably apply to the Wii.
The PS2 versions look better than the Wii games.
ps2 had a better online setup than the wii does.
I think the PS2 is much better than the Wii.
A PS2 can probably push out better graphics than a WII.
There are ps2 games that do look better than similar wii games.
output:
Wii and PS are both popular gaming consoles, but they have some differences in terms of graphics, controls, and online setup. 

Some argue that Wii controls are easier and quicker than PS controls, and that Wii graphics are slightly better than PS graphics. However, others argue that PS games looked better than Wii games. 

Furthermore, some argue that PS has a better online setup than Wii. In terms of specific games, some argue that the PS version is far superior, while others argue that the Wii version is better.

Ultimately, the choice between Wii and PS may depend on personal preferences and priorities. Some prefer PS over Wii, while others prefer Wii over PS. It's also important to consider specific games and their respective versions to get a better understanding of their quality and performance.

input:
Summarize: We ran our computer with USB before switching to Vonage recently and it ran better on USB and faster, than when we used an Ethernet connection... that is why we switched to USB.
Firewire 400/IEEE 1394a is 400Mb/S, not 480, and in practice runs much faster than USB 2.0's supposed 480Mb/S.
USB is much faster than Ethernet 3.
USB is much faster then 10/100 ethernet.
USB 3.0 is quite a bit faster than gigabit ethernet.
It seemed that syncing over USB was faster than Ethernet.
Ethernet will not be faster than USB, although it comes close.
USB is easier and more practical than Ethernet for many applications.
Cause the Ethernet is slower than the USB 2 with regards to transfer speeds.
1000Mbps Ethernet is much slower than USB 3 (5000Mbps), but about twice as fast as USB 2 (480Mbps).
Thats true LAN conection is better and faster than USB connection.
Also to make things easier, i noticed the tablets that we are using has a docking station that comes with a lan port which is nicer then the usb to lan dongle we have .
Faster than USB or FireWire, it's basically for external hard drives for quicker data transfers.
For tethered shooting, a long Ethernet cable is easier and less expensive than a long USB cable, plus it is faster (potentially) than USB 2.
Built-in gigabit ethernet makes connecting to wired networks easier than fumbling with USB adaptors, and faster too.
and USB port upload/downloads will be slower than for Ethernet.
ADSL via Ethernet is slightly faster than USB (see below).
It is a little bit faster than the normal USB 2.0.
ethernet is better than usb for network connexions.
I believe the gigabit ethernet connection is faster than USB 2.
output:
USB and Ethernet are two commonly used types of computer connections with different advantages and disadvantages.

Some users argue that USB is faster than Ethernet. This is especially true for USB ., which is much faster than gigabit Ethernet. Moreover, USB is easier and more practical to use for many applications. However, others argue that Ethernet comes close to USB in terms of speed, and is faster in some cases such as built-in gigabit Ethernet.

On the other hand, some users argue that Ethernet is better for network connections and that it is faster than USB for ADSL. Ethernet is also considered more practical for some purposes, such as tethered shooting, where a long Ethernet cable is easier and less expensive than a long USB cable. 

Ultimately, the choice of USB or Ethernet depends on the user's specific needs and preferences. Some users may prioritize speed, while others may value ease of use, practicality, or cost.

Milk and juice are both popular beverages, but they differ in taste, nutritional value, safety, and other qualities.

Milk is often praised for its nutritional value, being a better choice than sugary sodas or juices. It is also considered good for bones. However, it can go bad quickly and may contain harmful bacteria if not pasteurized properly. Milk is also often compared to other beverages, like chocolate milk, which is seen as a better pick-me-up than juice.

far better service than amazon.

input:
Summarize: Toshiba may be inferior to Asus, Dell, HP, Samsung and Sony, but surely is superior to Acer.
In most benchmarks it is only about 20% slower than the Samsung which is still 100% faster than a mechanical drive.
The Samsung drives are slightly faster than the Toshiba drives.
I'm honor-bound to mention that, statistically speaking, the Toshiba picture is inferior to that of the Samsung, outputting at 1080i ("i" for interlaced) instead of the superior 1080p.
With 552 MB/s, it is only marginally slower than the competing model from Samsung, but in writing it is significantly faster with 521 MB/s vs. 468 MB/s.
The Samsung takes second place, being just a little faster than the Toshiba.
Samsung SSDs read and write speeds are significantly faster than the Toshiba SSDs.
In the widespread Quadrant Standard benchmark the Toshiba AT200 scores 1486 points and is greatly inferior to the Samsung Galaxy Tab 10.1 , which reached 2300 points.
The problem is that the Toshiba drives are noticeably slower than the newer Samsung drives.
My 5 years old Samsung looks better than my year old Toshiba.
Lighter and slightly smaller than the HP14, better build quality than the 720 (hopefully), and looks somewhat similar to the samsung in my opinion.
The slower Toshiba (150/150) and the faster Samsung (255/255).
It's superior to its closest rivals, the iPad 2 and Samsung Galaxy Tab 10.1 , but inferior to the likes of the Toshiba AT200 or heavyweights such as the Lenovo ThinkPad Tablet.
Notably, however, it was also much slower than the Toshiba HK3R, which had a raw score even faster than the Samsung 840 EVO's (7,464).
In our CPU limited in-house tests it proved quicker than both the Samsung X360 and the Sony VAIO TT, particularly in the video rendering test where it was around 15 per cent faster than the Samsung and 20 per cent faster than the Sony.
However, when switching from apps to the home screen, the Samsung was a hair slower than the Toshiba, whose animations were also smoother.
- The Toshiba starts much faster then the Samsung.
For HD content, this TV's PQ is no inferior to my SAMSUNG (D7000 model).
These reports seem to indicate the 11-inch models and the 256GB 13-inch model are using the faster Samsung drives, whereas the 128GB 13-inch model is using the slower Toshiba drive.
Toshiba dlps in particular were and still are far superior to Samsung in this respect.
output:
Samsung and Toshiba are both well-known brands that produce various electronic devices. However, there are some differences between the two companies, according to the arguments presented.

Samsung is praised for its faster SSD drives, better picture quality, and faster performance in some tests. On the other hand, Toshiba is noted for being superior to Acer, having slightly slower but still fast SSD drives, and faster boot-up times. 

There are also conflicting opinions on which brand is better in other areas, such as build quality, design, and performance in different benchmarks. Therefore, the choice between Samsung and Toshiba may depend on the specific product, personal preferences, and individual needs.

Overall, it is advisable to do some research and read reviews before making a purchasing decision.

sed is also # much slower than awk.

awk might be a better choice than sed.

this is much more simpler to understand than the bunch of sed secret code .

awk is a better bet than sed or cut for picking bits out of the output of ps .

- The Toshiba starts much faster then the Samsung.

Summarize: Yes, the IOS is nifty, but having a device that is larger than a smart phone yet lighter and faster than any laptop can really change your computing habits.
I kind of wish this software was available for PC, as it almost makes typing on the phone faster and easier than a laptop.
gadget tool would be that being larger than a phone screen, it is easier on slightly more mature eyes and it is a helluva lighter to haul around than my laptop with a 17 inch screen.
There are some things I'd swear this phone does better and faster (maybe because it streamlines processes so much and leaves out the non-essential) than my desktop or laptop.
Best email client on a phone, have my work and non work emails tiled on the screen , helps me manage my email alot better - sometimes it's just quicker to read email on my phone rather than checking my laptop at work lol.
The phone you carry in your pocket is, in many ways, considerably smarter than your PC and laptop ever were.
The phone is far superior to any laptop in data entry methods.
My phone worked faster than my laptop.
I think this phone faster then my laptop .
This phone well be faster than my laptop.
Faster than the laptop, and much better than using the phone.
A lot smaller and lighter than the laptop but much easier to use than the phone.
Plus on the desktop/laptop/tablet I can type a lot faster than using my thumbs on my phone which I love!
I have several laptops and desktops for anything other than making calls, and even my 12" laptop is much better for doing anything other than phone calls, because I can see what I am doing better.
I've been in dire need of a mobile computer that is smaller, lighter and more readily accessible than a laptop and bigger, faster and more functional than a mobile phone.
My laptop is easier to use than my phone.
It would be more portable than a laptop, easier to read the screen than my small android phone, and all-around a better way of living!
Sounds from our laptop were clearly better than the mobile phone MP3 files, yet the pairing process was oddly faster with mobiles.
The diminutive keyboard is of course harder to type on than a regular laptop, but it had a reasonable touch for something so small and was much faster than phone typing.
It is far cheaper and lighter than a laptop or a UMPC, uses cheap standard replacement parts, has a better UI than a UMPC, is less limited than a typical PDA or phone.
output:
Phones and laptops are both popular devices for computing and communication, and each has its own strengths and weaknesses.

According to users, phones are more portable, lighter, and faster than laptops, which can make them more convenient for some tasks like managing emails or data entry. Additionally, some users argue that phones can do some tasks better and faster than desktop or laptops, even giving them a smarter edge. However, using a phone for typing or doing complex tasks can be harder than using a laptop, which has a larger screen and keyboard. 

On the other hand, laptops are preferred over phones for tasks that require larger screens, more advanced features, or higher performance. Laptops are easier to use for typing and can be more functional for anything beyond phone calls. Moreover, laptops can have better sound quality than phones, and using some software applications can be more convenient on a laptop than a phone.

Ultimately, the choice between a phone and a laptop depends on personal preferences and the intended use case. For some, a phone can replace a laptop for light computing and communication tasks, while others may require a laptop for more complex work or entertainment.

Bing is certainly an impressive piece of work, and is faster and delivers better search results than previous Microsoft efforts.
Today's Yahoo can't match the minimalism of many Google offerings, but it still has designs that are simpler and easier to use than many counterparts at Microsoft.
Google's productivity tools may lack some of Office's advanced features, but are easier and simpler to use than anything Microsoft offers -- especially when it comes to the cloud-centric features.
In the past 24 hours, Instant hasn't made my searching easier or quicker it feels more like the old "paperclip assistant" interruption on Microsoft Word than it seems to be productive.

It's obvious that Google is leading the way in organizing the world's information because they are capitalizing faster and greater than Microsoft did back in it's 80's boom.
Google is smarter, faster and more aware of history than the others, but Microsoft has the desktop, still most of the browser space, and a shitload of money to throw any direction they please.

Microsoft and Google are both major players in the tech industry, and each has its own strengths and weaknesses.

According to some arguments, Microsoft needs to be faster and better than Apple and Google in order to win. Microsoft is perceived as being a better and safer partner than Google, and its search engine Bing is said to offer wider selection and more accurate results than Google. Microsoft is also praised for having a better understanding of security for enterprises and being superior in the office space. Additionally, Microsoft's reporting services run faster in Google Chrome.

However, some argue that iTunes is closed down and less open than YouTube and can become congested with low-quality content.

On the other hand, YouTube is praised for its ability to research music, performances, and dance routines, its open platform, and its user-generated content. Ultimately, the choice between iTunes and YouTube depends on personal preferences regarding quality, convenience, and legal access to content. While iTunes is better for downloading and higher-quality content, YouTube is more open and has a larger variety of content.

input:
Summarize: Wine drinkers are in no way superior to beer drinkers, its just a personal preference.
Hops is also used in beer, which tastes better than the tea.
If your beer makes your mouth pucker up faster than a very strong Earl Grey tea, your beer may be too astringent.
As far as beer being bad for your teeth, I would say it's probably a little safer than coffee / tea.
Beer cheaper than water' trumpet the tabloids, conveniently forgetting that for centuries beer was actually safer than water, and small beer - that is, weak beer - was given to schoolboys to drink for breakfast before tea became dominant.
I assure you that, Tullamore Dew or no, it tastes a heck of a lot better than green beer.
As a general rule, beer stories are better than stories about milk and cookies and tea.
Pizza, McDonalds and beer taste a lot better than bean sprouts, tofu and unsweetened ice tea.
There is something in the beer that makes this work like a charm - even better than the tea.
The complexity of the beer is narrow compared to a good lambic, but far superior to the average fruit beer that dumps a fruity taste that floats on top of a beer , like drinking an unstirred long island ice tea.
Tea better than beer.
Probably even better than beer, although there's no buzz.
The herbal tea was actually nicer than some of the cheap British beer we drank then.
At least iced tea is easier on the nose than beer or soda; no bubbles.
We believe you'll like the oolong much better than the beer, as we do.
But regardless of when you're celebrating, there's got to be a better glass to raise than watery, shamrock-colored beer.
Elemental Coffee will serve more coffee and tea than usual this month with cooler temperatures arriving, and COOP Ale Works will offer craft beer.
It seems rather stupid to have the Feds spend $25 billion a year to make illegal drugs easier for kids to get than legal beer.
Those who had a hot cup of tea cooled down far better than those who had a cold beer.
Certainly it's better for the mind and body to chat while sipping cups of Assam and sencha than by swilling mugs of beer.
output:
Beer and tea are two popular beverages, but they have some differences and similarities.

On one hand, beer is known for its flavor and complexity, and it was safer to drink than water in the past. Some argue that it tastes better than tea or can be used as a substitute for tea with similar results. Others highlight that it is less harmful to teeth than coffee or tea. According to some, beer stories are also better than milk and cookies or tea stories.

On the other hand, tea is perceived by some as a healthier and more relaxing option that cools you down faster than beer and is easier on the nose. Some even argue that talking over cups of tea is better for the mind and body than swilling beer. 

Overall, the choice between beer and tea depends on personal preferences and needs. Some may prefer beer for its flavor and complexity, while others may choose tea for its health benefits and calming properties.

It is also claimed to be faster in certain operations, and to have superior performance on cost. Moreover, PostgreSQL is praised for its features such as criteria-filtered views, efficient permanent storage, and automatic replication. 

On the other hand, Oracle is well-known for its performance and scalability, and can perform better than other RDBMSs in certain scenarios. It is also said to have better auto-tuning capabilities, and to be faster in loading raw data.

Ultimately, as with any technology choice, the decision of which RDBMS to use depends on individual needs. Both PostgreSQL and Oracle have their own strengths and weaknesses, and it is important to consider factors such as performance, features, cost, and ease of use before making a decision.

input:
Summarize: Google, Cisco 'better' for Indian IT professionals than IBM .
Revenue per employee at places like Google is 5X greater than IBM.
Sure Google 's sales and earnings grew -- are growing -- much faster than IBM 's.
If the tide turns and Google comes of age in another couple of decades, it won't be because they were nicer than Microsoft, any more than Microsoft was nicer than IBM.
So, while Google currently has smaller revenues and profits, it also has much better prospects for growth than IBM or Microsoft.
Even worse for traditional server makers, companies like Google and Facebook make their own servers rather than buying them already manufactured.
The smaller, more agile companies like Google, Apple, Paypal, Digg, etc. can do things quicker and cheaper than the larger monolithic companies like Dell, IBM, etc.
Is the total set of Google engineers better than IBM, Microsoft, Novell, Apple, Intel, AMD, Bell-Labs, Adobe, etc..
Corporate results from General Electric, Google, and Microsoft were mostly better than expected, though IBM and McDonald's missed estimates.
Because Google invested in dark fiber early last decade, because Google emphasized low-cost PCs on its server farms, because Google takes energy costs seriously, Google now has a better Internet core than AT&T and Verizon, than Microsoft, IBM or anyone else.
MUNGER: IBM is easier to understand than Google or Apple.
IBM: We Have Better CX Analytics than Google or Adobe .
PS Yes, Google wouldn't be a better option than IBM.
They understand IBM better but that does not mean Google and Apple will not do better than IBM.
Indeed, last year its issuances were greater than Microsoft, Hewlett-Packard, Oracle, Apple, EMC, Accenture and Google combined.
But Lenovo, with its IBM ancestry knows the enterprise market better than Google does.
This leaves IBM but somehow I doubt IBM would get along any better with Google than they did with Microsoft.
He told CMSWire the analytics IBM offers are better than traditional metrics provided by Google and Adobe.
who acquired ibm [a search cited as Powerset doing better than Google in Matt's story] .
This is something big elephants like IBM, Microsoft and SAP can do better than Google.
output:
Google and IBM are both technology companies, each with their own strengths and weaknesses.

According to some sources, Google has better prospects for growth, has been growing faster, and has invested in infrastructure that gives them better internet core and lower energy costs. On the other hand, some argue that IBM is easier to understand and has better CX analytics. IBM is also noted for their ability to serve the enterprise market better than Google. 

Other arguments included revenue per employee, agility of smaller companies, and corporate results.

Overall, which company is superior depends on a variety of factors, including individual needs and preferences. It is important to research specific products and services that both companies offer to make an informed decision.

Summarize: For me, green tea powder was more drying, though worked faster than lemon juice (diluted).
Tea is better than juice, and more pure than any formula thought of being.
Iced tea is a much better choice than soda or juice boxes.
Also, hot beverages such as coffee and tea are generally safer than fruit juices, sugarcane juice, or buttermilk.
But if a "juice drink" with HFCS as its main flavoring ingredient isn't exactly the kind you had in mind, there are better choices available, such as Honest Kids Organic Juice Drink, made by Honest Tea.
Iced tea is delicious and is a far better choice than soft drinks or concentrate juice.
There's no better way to start your day than with the right cup of tea.
Now I drink tea because I like it better than soda, juice, or coffee.
I love green tea and I feel a lot better when I drink green tea rather than coffee or juice.
Bottom line: Energy juice drinks can supply caffeine, but it's no better than the caffeine you get from coffee or tea.
-POM juice has more and better antioxidants than red wine, grape juice, Acai juice, and green tea!
In fact, pomegranate juice's antioxidant power is greater than red wine or green tea.
My smartphone drains juice faster than I ever downed an iced tea, mostly from the display.
I think green juice like that is better than tea or coffee tbh.
Apparently, the presence of polyphenols in the wonderfuls give the juice a potent antioxidant content superior to those found in other juice known to contain antioxidants, like green tea, cranberry and even acai juice.
What is so wonderful about this Pomegranate juice is its' antioxidant potency, where better than green tea, cranberry juice, red wine, concord grape juice and blueberry juice.
I believe this is a much better value than a bubble tea, it's about the same price anyways.
3 Pomegranate juice has been analyzed to have greater antioxidant capacity than red wine, grape juice, cranberry juice, green tea or acai juice; 4 drinking pomegranate juice measurably reduces oxidative stress in healthy humans.
But, water is still a better choice than drinks that have caffeine like soda, coffee or tea.
According to some studies, drinking pomegranate juice can be better for you than red wine, green tea, or cranberry and orange juice.
output:
Tea and juice are both popular beverages, but they have some differences in terms of their health benefits and taste. 

Some argue that tea is a better choice than juice because it is generally safer, purer, and has a potent antioxidant content. Moreover, tea is praised for its taste and ability to improve health. On the other hand, some prefer juice over tea because it can be a more refreshing and flavorful option, and some juices like pomegranate juice have been found to have greater antioxidant capacity than green tea.

Both tea and juice have their advantages and disadvantages. Iced tea is considered a better choice than soda or juice boxes, while green tea powder may work faster but can be more drying than lemon juice. Furthermore, energy juice drinks can supply caffeine, but it's no better than the caffeine you get from coffee or tea. 

In the end, the choice between tea and juice is a matter of personal preferences and priorities. It's important to remember that although juice can be a healthy option, water is still a better choice than drinks that have caffeine like soda, coffee, or tea.

input:
Summarize: Sega All Star Racing Transformed is excellent on the Wii U and is faster & smoother than the PS3 version.
My Wii upstairs loads and plays better and faster on WiFi than the PS3 did.
All I do now is watch Netflix on my Wii U, because it works better and faster than PS3 one.
The Wii U is superior/better/more powerful/however the hell you want to quantify it than the PS3 and 360.
3DS Tops 5m Slower than Wii, DS, PS2 but faster than X360, PS3 - News .
Nintendo typically doesn't announce exact hardware specs, but with more games on display for Wii U, it's now becoming easier to size up its graphical horsepower (which beforehand some had said was better than PS3).
3DS Tops 5m Slower than Wii, DS, PS2 but faster than X360, PS3 .
Ya I guarantee the Wii U won't be better then the PS3/360 but I guarantee the graphics will improve as developers get used too it.
Positive journalistic spin (fanboyish): "Watch Dogs on Wii U looks noticeably better than Xbox 360 and PS3 versions".
Compared to other recent systems in an aligned region by region launch, the 3DS has reached 5m units slower than Wii, PSP, PS2 and DS but faster than X360 and PS3.
PS3 is WAY WAY more superior, I KNOW because I HAVE a 360 AND PS3 and compared them both PS3 is obviosly better than 360 and wii.
When people see how much better the EA Sports lineup is on a next gen console, combined with motion tech and better graphics and online scoreboards and online multiplayer thats much easier to manage than Wii, many people will begin trading for the superior console.
MLB 2K9 for the Wii isn't a great baseball game, but superior controls and animation make it a bit better than its 360 and PS3 siblings.
You fanboyz jump at any opportunity (even at the peril of going off on some far tangent), to extol the virtues of the PS3, even if that means making sure everyone knows the PS3 can surf porn better and easier than the Wii.
None, WII U isn't next gen. 8 years ago consoles ruled over PC but then manufactures figured out how to deal with architecure better and now even GPU's are 30x times faster processors than PS3 and xbox.
The bad: Reportedly reacts slightly slower than PS3 with Move, though still faster than Wii, and currently the smallest library with only 17 games currently available.
But the PS3 was faster than the Xbox 360, which was faster than the Wii.
You could see the Wii was inferior to the 360/Ps3.
In many ways the Wii is inferior to Xbox 360 and PS3.
hello no wii has the worst graphics its worse than ps3 but better than xbox360.wii and xbox360 wont have a chance against ps3 .
output:
The Wii and PS are both popular gaming consoles, but they have some differences in terms of performance and capabilities.

Some argue that the Wii has faster and smoother gameplay for certain games, such as Sega All Star Racing Transformed, and works better and faster for streaming services like Netflix, as well as having superior motion technology and controls. On the other hand, some argue that the PS is more powerful and has better graphics, as well as a larger game library and faster reaction time for motion controls with the Move.

However, there are also arguments that the Wii U has superior graphical horsepower and capabilities compared to the PS and Xbox . Additionally, the Wii is noted for its popularity and sales numbers, with the DS topping  million faster than the PS and Xbox  but slower than the Wii, PSP, DS, and PS.

Ultimately, the choice between the Wii and PS may depend on personal preferences, as well as specific game titles and capabilities needed. It is recommended to research and compare both consoles to see which one better fits your needs.

Ultimately, the choice between metal and plywood depends on the specific needs and preferences of the user. For example, metal may be preferred for outdoor construction due to its durability and resistance to elements, while plywood may be more suited for indoor use where a nicer look and ease of use are more important.

input:
Summarize: But you wouldn't want the mix adjusted every day, just because the stock price of IBM today is a better deal than Hewlett Packard.
IBM is the Dow's top dog, with a greater impact on the index than Alcoa, Bank of America, Cisco, Intel, Pfizer, AT&T, GE and Hewlett Packard combined.
It's not the software business of Microsoft or Oracle or IBM, to be sure, but it hangs together better perhaps than what Hewlett-Packard has cobbled together.
IBM retained the top spot but had slower revenue growth than Dell, while Hewlett-Packard stayed in second place with hardly any growth at all, according to Gartner's estimates .
"This is aimed at Sun hitting IBM harder and at standing on the head of Microsoft, Compaq and especially Hewlett-Packard with a unified strategy, albeit more proprietary than the ever-more popular Linux."
However, "HDS and Hewlett-Packard have taken a rather aggressive editorial license in promoting their storage solutions as being up to eight times faster than those of EMC and IBM," according to the report.
We note that HP's server units grew faster than both Dell and IBM, but the market moved strongly to whitebox vendors, and believe HP may have focused on ASPs and margins this quarter, at the expense of unit growth.
As previously reported in their financial filings, Hewlett-Packard had a very good quarter for server sales in its fiscal fourth quarter ended October 30, Dell did better than it has done in a while, and IBM and Sun Microsystems had mixed results.
output:
IBM and Hewlett-Packard are two major technology companies that have a significant impact on the market. 

According to some sources, IBM has a greater impact on the Dow index than Hewlett-Packard. IBM is also known for its slower revenue growth compared to Dell. On the other hand, Hewlett-Packard has been focusing on ASPs and margins, perhaps at the expense of unit growth. 

In terms of software, IBM is considered one of the top dogs in the industry along with Microsoft and Oracle. However, there are opinions that suggest Hewlett-Packard's software products are more coherent than what IBM has to offer. 

There are also discussions of aggressive editorial licenses by Hewlett-Packard, which may have exaggerated the performance of its storage solutions compared to those of competitors such as EMC and IBM. 

Ultimately, the choice between IBM and Hewlett-Packard may depend on the specific needs and priorities of the consumer. It's important to consider the strengths and weaknesses of both companies before making a decision.

Summarize: Steel proved capable of producing greater and lighter spans than heavy stone construction.
The baking steel heats faster and is much easier to clean than my old pizza stone.
Steel holds heat better and faster than stone, and is ideal for those that want faster and hotter bakes in home ovens, as in under 550F.
For me, it's pretty clear that either Baking Steel is superior to the Lodge Cast Iron pizza pan, though any of them will do you better than a traditional stone.
This stone is harder than steel.
The stone contains particles that are harder than the carbides in the steel, and the harder they are, the faster they cut.
What makes a steel ax superior to a stone ax is not that the first one is better made than the second.
They worked with stone harder than steel!"
The steel retains and transfers heat better than our old baking stone resulting in quicker pizza cook time (win!)
I mean a steel tool is much, much superior to a stone tool.
Stone mills grind finer, produce less heat at finer settings, and wear better than steel burr plate mills.
And the weight of the exterior stone walls was much greater than the lighter skeleton frame of steel and iron used on the interior.
Stone-ground flour is, however, preferred by many bakers and natural food advocates because of its texture, nutty flavour, and the belief that it is nutritionally superior and has a better baking quality than steel-roller-milled flour.
Under heavy loads, stone is superior to wood but not to iron, steel, or reinforced concrete.
Plus, stone and wood look nicer and more impressive than steel and concrete.
It cuts regular German faster than Japanese steel like Kikuichi damascus.
The exact same thing happened with prehistoric chipped-stone tools, and stone dulls much faster than steel.
Much lighter than conventional steel knives reduces fatigue during long cutting tasks .
Carbide and diamond rasps last much longer than steel rasps and work on harder types of stone.
The hard stone often takes a lot of effort because it is not much harder than steel.

Steel and stone are both commonly used materials in various applications, such as construction, cooking, and tool-making. 

According to some arguments, steel is capable of producing greater and lighter spans than heavy stone construction, heats faster and is easier to clean in cooking applications, holds heat better and is ideal for faster and hotter bakes, and is superior to stone in tool-making. On the other hand, some argue that stone is harder than steel, contains particles that are harder than carbides in steel, and produces finer flour texture and nutty flavor in natural foods. 

Moreover, some prefer stone over steel in certain situations, such as in milling, under heavy loads, and for aesthetic reasons. Others argue that steel is superior to stone in terms of weight reduction, cutting tasks, and durability of rasps.

Ultimately, the choice between steel and stone depends on the specific application and personal preferences. Both materials have their own advantages and disadvantages, so it is important to consider the intended use and specific properties of the material before making a decision.

Overall, the choice between steel and stone depends on the specific use and properties one is looking for. Steel is often preferred for its lighter weight and heat retention, while stone is favored for its hardness and aesthetic value.

Summarize: I like the beans, rather than pasta-makes for a lighter soup.
I didn't want something new, I wanted something warm and comforting and easy, easier than my favorite pasta e fagioli recipe.
Also, I've been eating the nacho cheesy pasta, and spaghettini - really good, better than soup!
I get that they need to bring everything to a high heat to seal the container but still, I don't think there's anything worse than mushy vegetables or pasta.
With apologies to Mom, her pasta is better than her soup; I just didn't want to ruin the rhyme scheme.
Pasta fagioli had a base more like a meat sauce than a broth, making chicken noodle a better soup choice.
The Italian soup is as good, if not better than most minestrone and pasta fagoli soups I've had in Italian restaurants.
There's at least one hypothetical pasta shape that would sell even better than Alphanumeric Soup to nerds, geeks, dweebs, and poindexters: a tiny MÃ¶bius strip.
Because it is just pasta and broth, it is very easy on the stomach and nothing soothes a cold better than a mug of Mom's soup.
An immersion blender is my go-to appliance for making pureed soups and pasta sauces -- it's so much easier to blend in the pot than pouring hot soup or sauce into a regular blender.
In fact, when I taught this miso soup recipe in a class a few years ago, more than one person remarked that it was easier than cooking pasta (and better for you, too!)
There is nothing better than fresh pasta and stock.
serve with better than sour cream, additional coconut milk, basil, rice or pasta.
The soup was good, a lighter version than some, with lots of ditalini pasta and a modest amount of beans and vegetables.
Barley is very low on the glycemic index, meaning that it is a much better starch for diabetics than rice, bread or pasta.
Once they were purred they made the soup just a little too think and the puree was absorbing the broth quicker than the pasta.
Hearty chicken noodle soup is better than mom's, with grilled chicken, green onions, and a bonus of penne pasta.
I like to add Farro to my soups too, I think that is better than adding pasta (flavour and texture).
So much better for pasta, stir frys, or anything saucy or "loose" (rice, beans, juicy veggies or fruit, etc) than regular plates!
Wk lovely menu Wife & I both had the Mushrm Soup Delicious better than Nougatine's soup hearty great Starter Added a Pasta course the Ricotta Ravioli hit the mark.
output:
Pasta and soup are both comfort foods that can be enjoyed in various forms.

Some argue that pasta-based soups are less satisfying and lighter, or easier and better for digestion than pasta dishes. Others say that pasta dishes are better than soups, or easier to puree and blend and have better texture than adding grains like Farro to soups.

In terms of flavor, some soups are praised for their taste, such as Italian soup and mushroom soup. Some pasta dishes are appreciated for their freshness and texture. Moreover, some argue that grains such as barley used in soups may be better for health.

Overall, the choice between pasta and soup may depend on personal preferences, dietary needs, and specific recipes. Both can be comforting and delicious in different ways.

Summarize: I mean in japan the 360 is at the bottom of the heap and elsewhere the ps3 is neck and neck with it so...if the 360 is selling better than the ps2 than good but so is the wii, the ds and the ps3.
And even if you don't have a PS3 or 360, the game just feels too similar to the far superior Zelda DS games.
We haven't really seen alot for it so it might sale very good, maybe better than the PS3 and 360.
Nowadays few reasonable people argue that the PS3 has the best library, and PSP has great games (better than the DS imo).
The recent upgrades to both the PS3 and PSP firmware allow for much, much better compatibility between the two than compared with the DS and the Wii.
Frozen zombies (slowed zombies by a Snow Pea , Ice-shroom, or Winter Melon ) on versions with higher qualityÂ graphicsÂ (PC, iOS, Xbox 360, PS3) have a lighter blue than on DS and DSiWare versions.
Yeah I'm aware, but I figured since someone mentioned Shadow of the Colussus and Ico earlier for PS3 which were also on PS2... Also it more or less suited Wii better and led to a sequel for the DS.
While you may argue PS3 is going to be the best or PSP is better then DS, or whatever floats your boat, the one thing you can't argue with is that PC gaming is dying.
Nintendo isn't stupid to just make the graphics of the Wii U equal to 360/PS3; they have more than enough billions to pull off much better graphics than those two consoles now, unlike before when they first debuted the DS/Wii.
3DS games are already between 10 and 15â‚¬ more expensive than DS ones (absurdly, as so far 3DS ones are way worse), but if Vita ones have similar price ranges to PS3 ones then I will think twice before buying that console.
becurse they are better than ps3 and 360.

Wizardry DS moves smoother than Wizardry PS3 .
The Nintendo DS did better than 360 and PS3 by double!!!
The DS would be a even better plataform than PS3 and X360.
For them, it's better than the Xbox 360, PS3, PC and PSP.
Still, Xbox 360 gamers will at least get a version of the game that is in some areas superior to the PS3 game.
The new DS controller is 100 times better than the PS3's version.

Regarding features and compatibility, some argue that PS and PSP have better compatibility than the DS and the Wii. Others discuss graphics quality differences and speculate about the graphical capabilities of the Wii U, while others compare game prices. 

Ultimately, personal preference is what determines whether someone prefers one console over the other. While some people prefer the DS for its smoother gameplay and better sales, others prefer the PS for its library and sales.

Summarize: Standard paper/cardboard bags, like the US or old days would actually be better and provide superior hygiene, compared to the plastic germ incubators imo.
Cardboard bike helmets are safer than plastic .
Sometimes a cardboard box works better than a plastic storage container, especially if the amount that is stored in that box changes frequently.
Cardboard Bike Helmet Better than Plastic .
Cardboard sleeves just look and feel nicer than plastic CD cases.
still cardboard is much better than plastic.
Cardboard was much lighter than the lightest plastic option: a $10 shower enclosure.
It is a little harder to insert than cardboard, but I did it.
The cardboard tray makes it easier to recycle than the plastic trays.
The cardboard inserts cushion glass ornaments better than plastic would.
I had to make little notches in the tape so that it would seal properly either side of plastic strengthening ribs under the rim, but this was still much easier, quicker, and safer than using cardboard.
I find the plastic is smoother and easier to use than the traditional cardboard applicators, although again probably less environmentally friendly.
Plastic jugs are lighter and cheaper than cardboard.
Plastic is better than cardboard.
These plastic moving boxes are recyclable, environment friendly and superior to cardboard boxes.
A roller confine with plastic ribs holds up superior to anything cardboard pens.
Plastic would be better than cardboard.
Plastic bins are better than cardboard.
The corrugated plastic hold staples better than cardboard also.
Plastic applicators are better than cardboard ones.
output:
Cardboard and plastic are used in many products, and each has its pros and cons. 

Some argue that cardboard is better in terms of hygiene, safety, and versatility. Moreover, it is considered more environmentally friendly and easier to recycle. Others mention that plastic is smoother and easier to use, lighter, cheaper, and more durable. Additionally, plastic is sometimes seen as more recyclable and environmentally friendly. 

Ultimately, the choice of which material to use depends on the specific product and its intended use. Some argue that plastic is better for certain products like moving boxes, bins, and applicators, while others prefer cardboard for storage containers, bike helmets, and CD sleeves. 

Therefore, it's a good idea to consider the advantages and disadvantages of each material and choose the one that best fits your needs.

Summarize: Not to mention that someone who knew the language could generate the parsing code in perl faster and easier than in java.
Perl is also has a somewhat lighter footprint on your server, and managing the path to modules is much easier than managing CLASSPATH for Java.
And so, I have a vested interest in people believing Perl is faster to develop in and easier to maintain than Java or C#.
While Ruby/Python/PERL/PHP are interesting and can do some things better/nicer than Java, I think that it will take some time for one of these languages to be on a par with Java.
Perl is around 34 times faster than Java.
Perl (with Moose and other element), Node, Ruby, and a few others would all be far superior in getting students to the thinking stage faster than the twisting turning maze one finds themselves in with Java.
Still perl is faster, but Java is not worse than other languages like python.
I'm pretty sure I can do things in Perl much faster than I could do them in Java, and far faster than I could do them in brainfuck and assembly.
That's why I would think Perl is superior to Java.
Perl (under mod-perl/ISAPI) is generally faster than Java .
Java is around 100 times faster than Perl.
This version should be more accessible (if installing a Java environment is easier for you than installing Perl) and faster.
This would put it near the performance of Erlang-significantly better than Python, Perl, and Ruby, but similarly significantly slower than C#, Java and native C++ .
PHP is much simpler to learn than Java, and a bit easier than Perl.
Java is superior to your puny perl.
The claim is that ICI is faster than Perl but slower than Java, a peculiar claim since Perl and Java each out-perform the other in different circumstances.
Considering that Java syntax, which many would arguably consider to be easier to understand than Perl, uses similar syntax, we are curious how it would perform.
All in all error handling in php is better then perl and worse then java.
The Perl and Python runtimes are much slower than Java's, but Perl and Python applications generally start up much faster and are considerably more responsive.
java will still be faster then Perl .
output:
Perl and Java are both popular programming languages, but they have different characteristics and uses. 

Perl is argued by some to be faster to develop in and easier to maintain than Java or C#. It also has a lighter footprint on servers and easier module management. Some users also praise its faster parsing code generation compared to Java, faster performance, and superior ease of use for beginners. However, others argue that Java syntax is easier to understand than Perl, and its performance is superior. Additionally, some users appreciate Java's advanced error handling and better overall speed. 

Therefore, the choice between Perl and Java may depend on personal preferences and the nature of the project. Other programming languages, such as Ruby/Python/PHP, may also offer specific advantages and disadvantages. Ultimately, the best approach is to evaluate the specific requirements of the project and choose the language that is most suitable.

Summarize: Direct3D is pushing the envelope for hardware features, which means a Direct3D app can run faster or look better than an OpenGL app on equivalent hardware.
Microsoft was running a massive marketing campaign for Direct3D, and soon everyone "just knew" that it was faster and better than OpenGL.
The Direct3D system is a technically superior piece of technology, and support for working with it is still better than OpenGL whether you're a hobbyist or a pro.
He always claims on the front pages that Direct3D is superior to OpenGL.
It's much easier to learn than plain OpenGL or, even worse, Direct3D.
In my experience, currently (2008) OpenGL driver quality on Windows is much worse than Direct3D driver quality.
Just because OpenGL is changing at a slower rate than Direct3D, doesn't make it better.
Direct3D used to have much better support than OpenGL back in the day, so it was much easier to find good Direct3D drivers than good OpenGL drivers.
I'm not familiar with any argument stating that Direct3D is superior to OpenGL.
John Carmack: Direct3D Now Better Than OpenGL (!)
I only used OpenGL in the beginning, where I was told OpenGL was better, faster and easier all together than Direct3D.
In the early days OpenGL was better and faster than Direct3D but now there is little difference.
Clearly today OpenGL is superior to direct3D.
As for why OpenGL is faster than DirectX/Direct3D, the simple answer is that OpenGL seems to have a smoother, more efficient pipeline.
Valve: OpenGL is Faster Than Direct3D .
performance on OpenGL will be superior to that of Direct3D".
OpenGL is better than Direct3D.
Direct3d is way worse than opengl though.
As to why OpenGL is faster than DirectX/Direct3D, the simple answer is that OpenGL seems to have a smoother, more efficient pipeline.
It's also what they mention in the blog: "The second category would include reducing overhead in calling OpenGL, and extending our renderer with new interfaces for better encapsulation of OpenGL and Direct3D."
output:
DirectD and OpenGL are two popular graphics application programming interfaces (APIs) used for D graphics and gaming. 

According to some arguments, DirectD is technically superior and can run faster or look better than OpenGL on equivalent hardware. In the past, DirectD had better support and driver quality than OpenGL, and some people still consider it easier to learn than plain OpenGL. There are also marketing campaigns that promote DirectD as faster and better than OpenGL.

On the other hand, some arguments praise OpenGL for its smoother and more efficient pipeline, faster performance, better encapsulation, and superior overall technology. Others state that DirectD driver quality on Windows is currently worse than OpenGL, Overhead calling OpenGL is reducing, and that DirectD is way worse than OpenGL. 

Overall, the choice between DirectD and OpenGL may depend on personal preferences, the specific project, and the available hardware and drivers. It's important to research and compare different APIs and consider using both to ensure optimal performance and compatibility.

Summarize: There's no need to take my word for it that Java is inferior to Smalltalk.
CinCom's commercial Smalltalk is faster than Java on just about everything.
Oh, and Smalltalk already has a much nicer development environment than anything available for Java.
Or even with its performance due to such--in fact, when Java first came out, it was several times slower than Smalltalk.
For these and many other reasons, refactoring in Java is harder than refactoring in Smalltalk.
They were certainly first prototyped in Smalltalk (way easier to do than in Java).
Lisp, Scheme, Python, Ruby, and Smalltalk are all better than Java and .
Even though prolog and smalltalk are superior to java in C# in many ways, it has never been a mainstream language.
While Smalltalk has a superior method syntax for modeling concepts, Java offers several features that Smalltalk lacks.
At the start for sure Smalltalk was and is still faster than Java at almost everything.
Better than Smalltalk.
In fact, Java is simpler than C++ and Smalltalk in many aspects.
It's not (necessarily) a slam that Smalltalk VMs (like Envy) are inferior to, say, Java, Perl, C# or Visual Basic.
i think Java the language is better than smalltalk in a team setting and Java the platform way better than Smalltalk the platform.
I think Smalltalk's (oh, and by the way it is 'Smalltalk', not 'SmallTalk') grammar is far superior to the C-like grammar of Java.
-- LarryPrice I do not think that Smalltalk is harder to learn than Java.
Imagine how much easier it would be to sell Smalltalk when you can deploy a JBoss module written in Smalltalk.
Smalltalk urges a developer to think harder about APIs, much more than Java, where types etc. enforce specific usage.
We come to java frameworks 1998 and found the java technology 100% better for frameworks than C++ or smalltalk.
Sun marketed Java aggressively while the folks at Parc place laughed and thought how could that inferior badly designed language win out over the superior Smalltalk.
output:
Smalltalk and Java are both object-oriented programming languages, but they have their own strengths and weaknesses.

Some argue that Smalltalk is faster, has a much nicer development environment, and is easier to prototype. Some also praise Smalltalk's superior method syntax for modeling concepts and better API design. However, others argue that Java is simpler, better for team settings, and has features that Smalltalk lacks. Moreover, Java has been marketed more aggressively than Smalltalk and has become the more mainstream language.

There are also differing opinions on the difficulty of learning Smalltalk and Java. In terms of refactoring, some argue that it is harder in Java than in Smalltalk.

Ultimately, the choice between Smalltalk and Java depends on personal preferences and the specific needs of the project or application. While some argue that Smalltalk is better than Java, others believe the opposite.

Summarize: Somewhat unexpectedly, the Zotac is inferior to the reference card from Nvidia.
AMD-based solutions are generally inferior to Nvidia-based ones in this game.
The new card is inferior to previous-generation solutions of the same class, ATI Radeon HD 2600 XT GDDR4 and Nvidia GeForce 8600 GTS.
The MSI NX8800GT OC is slightly slower than the Nvidia GeForce 8800 GTS 320MB at high resolutions, which is quite a surprise.
On this game title the NVIDIA GeForce GTX 680 was 30% faster than the MSI R7970 Lightning!
The MSI N560GTX-448 Twin Frozr III Power Edition was just 1 FPS slower than the NVIDIA GeForce GTX 570 at both 1920Ã—1080 and 1280Ã—1024 screen resolutions and was 4-6 FPS faster than the overclocked ASUS ENGTX560 TI DirectCU II video card.
We found the NVIDIA GeForce GTX 680 with the reference cooler to be quieter than the MSI R7970 Lighting with the new Twin Frozr IV GPU cooler at both idle and full load in Furmark!

Ultimately, the choice between pizza and soup comes down to individual preferences and needs. Both dishes have their own unique attributes, so it's a good idea to explore different types and recipes to find what works best for you.

input:
Summarize: It was quite good with a sandwich and better than most canned soup.
The ham and egg sandwich has the nutrients more concentrated and easier to handle than the chicken soup.
It may not be very PC, but it really is better than a ham sandwich dunked in Campbell's chicken noodle.
Grilled cheese is a versatile and widely treasured sandwich favorite, but there's nothing better than pairing the sandwich with a bowl of tomato soup.
As with a good tomato soup, I can think of no better accompaniment than a grilled cheese sandwich.
Dinner is gonna be tuna on a Sandwich Thin (100 calories, far better than bread) and a can of soup (200 calories/can).
Now, i'm not real creative with my sandwich choices, to me there is nothing better than a tradition grilled cheese, served with tomato soup!
Not necessarily whole packets of Mr Kipling cakes, not nowadays, and I'm not an emotional drinker, but sometimes a cheese sandwich is easier to make than a vegetable soup.
The fever is gone and I have finally been able to eat something solid; a sandwich - a much better choice than another bowl of chicken soup, tea and crackers.
According to it, a chicken sandwich is much better for the environment than a tofu curry (massive soybean production is problematic), and a bowl of lentil soup is beneficial to my body and the environment.
Nothing pairs with tomato soup better than a classic grilled cheese sandwich .
I eat a lot of soup, I have a bad stomach, and soup digests much easier than a sandwich for lunch.
But I daresay the soup went better with the beer than a grilled cheese sandwich... .
Easy-to-make homemade Buckeye Beans and Herbs Split Pea Soup provide better lunch alternative than a hamburger or a sandwich.
There are lots of casserole and soup recipes but there is NOTHING better than a yummy, thick ham sandwich!
Plus if you are planning on having a cheese sandwich, there is no better accompaniment than a warm bowl of tomato soup.
Big Fil is also a particular fan of rice pudding and thought the rice pudding was bit better than the toasted sandwich, quite creamy, with nutmeg sprinkled on top.
for a fast meal this sure looks a lot better than the balony sandwich I would have come up with - 1 slice of bread with mustard, 1 slice of bread with mayo, 1 slice bologna, 1 slice cheese - should you ever need the recipe.
However, when the kitchen began to distribute soup donated by Taliano's Italian Restaurant, he said they realized "it was better than ours" and returned to the sandwich line.
Entrees were a pan seared trout with toasted almond butter, mashed potatoes, mac 'n cheese, curry pumpkin soup (a bit sweet, and even better than the squash soup), and a buttery, melt-y, fabulous pimento grilled cheese sandwich.
output:
Sandwiches and soups are two popular food items, but the debate over whether one is better than the other is ongoing.

Some people prefer sandwiches as they are easier to handle and have more concentrated nutrients than soups. There are also many types of sandwiches to choose from, such as grilled cheese, ham and egg, and tuna. Grilled cheese sandwiches, in particular, are often paired with tomato soup as they complement each other well. Moreover, some argue that sandwiches are a better choice when having stomach issues and they are faster to make than soup.

However, others argue that soups are a healthier option and easier to digest than sandwiches. They also have a broader range of flavors, including lentil, split pea, and tomato. Additionally, some people prefer soup as an accompaniment to their meals, such as with beer or a trout entree. 

Ultimately, both sandwiches and soups have their own unique benefits and drawbacks. The choice between them may depend on factors such as personal preferences and health considerations.

On the other hand, some argue that Asus boards have better connectivity options, fan control, and are easier to overclock. Asus boards are also said to have better memory bandwidth, nicer BIOS user interface, and to be superior to Gigabyte in terms of Linux support. 

Ultimately, the choice between Gigabyte and Asus may depend on specific needs and preferences. It's always a good idea to read reviews and compare specifications before making a decision.

input:
Summarize: Organising your son's birthday is alot harder than your own wedding.
The birthday was harder, the people were needy, awful, wanted in at 5am, etc. than any wedding I've ever witnessed.
Circumcision in Sudan is treated just like a wedding, graduation or even better then a Birthday.
A friend once told me her parents' wedding anniversary was a far greater family holiday than her own birthday.
I can't imagine a better place than cabo to have a wedding and honeymoon.
Ruffled's three year birthday week couldn't end any better than with a gorgeous intimate wedding in Colorado shot by none other than Sean Flanigan .
I feel like since I'm asking all these people to go to my wedding than I better not miss a single birthday party, etc.
If you were to give $200 as a wedding gift, it might be easier for them to accept than if you gave them $200 for a birthday because that type of gift on a birthday is not normal.
Sometimes our collaborations result in sending out for wedding soup (a Pittsburgh speciality much better than the bitter divorce soup) or a cake for someone's birthday.
It just so happens to be my birthday today and I can't think of a better gift than having Anne and Michelle's gorgeous LaCuna Lofts wedding featured over on Style Me Pretty Illinois today !
Wedding gifts are worse than birthday gifts or other thoughtful gestures given freely.
It makes things a whole lot easier than running to Target right before a wedding!
Birthday cakes are easier to make and there's less pressure for a beginner than wedding cakes.
Better to wait one day for the wedding than 2,3...anyway.
We rounded up some super creative cakes that probably look better than your wedding cake!
Statistics show that greater than 80% of guests attending wedding receptions remember the FUN they had most because of the entertainment.
The only birthday gift that would be better than a day off of work would be our wedding pictures... :)
What better opportunity could there be in life to appreciate the flowing beauty of poetic words than on a wedding day.
It's Kanye's birthday, and I hope his new bride didn't choose (or worse - design) his wedding cake because, if she did, their marriage is closer to being over than previously thought.
Today is Beth's birthday -- and what better way to show my love than post a smokin' hot picture of her on her wedding day.
output:
Weddings and birthdays are both important events in people's lives, but they have different challenges and rewards.

Some argue that organizing a child's birthday party is harder than organizing a wedding, while others point out that in some cultures, events like circumcision are treated as equally important, or even better than, weddings and birthdays. Additionally, some people believe that wedding anniversaries are even more special than birthdays. 

Weddings are often seen as more romantic and glamorous than birthdays, and they are usually remembered for their entertainment and fun. However, there is also pressure associated with weddings, such as the need to invite everyone, and the expectation to give more expensive gifts. 

Birthdays, on the other hand, are typically more low-key and less expensive than weddings. While there may be pressure to plan a good birthday celebration, it is often seen as easier to make a birthday cake than a wedding cake, and gifts are not as expensive or formal as wedding gifts. 

Ultimately, both weddings and birthdays are important milestones in people's lives, and can be celebrated in creative and meaningful ways.

Summarize: I certainly don't think Dell is doing that much worse than Hewlett-Packard (NYSE: HPQ ), though we'll all know by the time this article is published.
Grant conceded that IBM's services would be harder to package than offerings from the likes of Hewlett-Packard or Compaq, but insisted the company was trying to identify how this could be done.
IBM retained the top spot but had slower revenue growth than Dell, while Hewlett-Packard stayed in second place with hardly any growth at all, according to Gartner's estimates .
"This is aimed at Sun hitting IBM harder and at standing on the head of Microsoft, Compaq and especially Hewlett-Packard with a unified strategy, albeit more proprietary than the ever-more popular Linux."
However, "HDS and Hewlett-Packard have taken a rather aggressive editorial license in promoting their storage solutions as being up to eight times faster than those of EMC and IBM," according to the report.
As previously reported in their financial filings, Hewlett-Packard had a very good quarter for server sales in its fiscal fourth quarter ended October 30, Dell did better than it has done in a while, and IBM and Sun Microsystems had mixed results.
At an impressive growth estimated to average 10.53% in the next five years, Accenture will grow faster than Microsoft (8.26%) and Hewlett Packard (0.00%), but slower than Oracle (10.62%).

Paint and chalk are two popular materials used for artistic and design purposes, each with its own advantages and disadvantages.

Some arguments state that paint features superior adhesion properties and fade resistance, covers better than other paints, and dries faster than chalk paint. Others suggest that chalk is easier to control than paint, sands off easier than any paint, and is a nice medium to use with oil paint. Chalk is also preferred for certain tasks, such as writing guest names and table numbers on wine glass stems.

There are different types of paint, such as milk paint and latex paint, which can be compared to chalk paint. Some argue that milk paint goes on much better than other paints, and makes furniture look better than latex paint. On the other hand, some believe that chalk paint is better than other recipes for chalk paint, and is an easier medium to use than painting back over something.

Ultimately, choosing between paint and chalk may come down to personal preferences, the type of project being undertaken, and the desired outcome.

Ultimately, the choice between paint and chalk depends on the specific task at hand and personal preferences. While some may prefer the ease of handling and versatility of paint, others may appreciate the unique texture and appearance of chalk.

Summarize: Java/ASP/Ruby/Python/Perl/C is better, and faster than PHP .
Generating my Perl content was much faster than my Mediawiki installation and I like Perl better, so PHP lost.
Even though perl is much faster and better than php, the comparison is made as CGI against mod_php and perl loses.
The results from the poll showed unanimously that the impression that Java/ASP/Ruby/Python/Perl/C are better and faster than PHP topped the charts.
So it proves even more than PHP is much slower than Perl, because my benchmark shows Perl is faster and I don't have mod_perl.
perl people are smarter than php people.
php is not better then perl, nor is perl better then php.
perl also, is not slower than php.
perl isn't an worse than PHP.
I can take a PHP application that is slower than its Perl equivalent, and without changing the code compile it with HipHop and now it is faster than the Perl version.
PHP is much simpler to learn than Java, and a bit easier than Perl.
The latest version, PHP 4, is faster and more powerful than its predecessors, while still being far easier to learn than Perl or JavaScript.
Many find PHP to be a faster and easier way to build Web applications than Perl or other programming languages.
Their comments about PHP being "much faster" and putting a lighter "load ... on the server" than Perl strike me as particularly funny.
It's even simpler if you've done some Perl too.
But I lately have shifted to PHP because it does most things I want and is alot easier to keep straight than Perl.
All in all error handling in php is better then perl and worse then java.
Asking if Perl is slower or uses more resources that PHP is like asking if a Ford gets better gas mileage than a Toyota.
PHP saves you the fork() so it appears to run faster than perl, but, I've seen perl CGI scripts actually run faster then PHP, because they were written with speed in mind.
So I have my faults, but that doesn't make PHP superior to Perl.
output:
Perl and PHP are popular scripting languages used for web development, but there are differences between them that users have opinions about.

Some argue that Perl is better and faster than PHP, which is slower and has slower CGI execution, while others argue the opposite. However, some say that PHP is simpler to learn than Java or Perl, and finds PHP faster and easier to build web applications than Perl. Furthermore, comparisons of performance should take into account the specific use case and optimizations like compiling with HipHop.

Other arguments focus on personal opinions and biases, such as Perl being preferred over PHP, or vice versa, or statements about intelligence, and the humor of comments made about performance.

In the end, the choice between Perl and PHP will depend on multiple factors, including the specific requirements of the project and personal preferences.

Summarize: It's slower than the ASUS Hero Z87 motherboard but faster than the MSI Z77A-GD65 Gaming motherboard.
The ASUS board is 2% quicker than the Gigabyte board and up to 9% faster than the X1250 boards.
The ASUS and Palit are definitely superior to the Gigabyte in their connectivity options.
This was 13.2MB/s slower read than the ASUS R4E and 36.2MB/s slower write.
The greater memory bandwidth of the Asus board is probably why the P55 performs better than the Gigabyte board in both processor tests.
In general, ASUS has better fan controlling than Gigabyte.
Got the Cooler Master Hyper 212 Plus Cooler (a little overkill) for $24, an Asus P7H55-M Pro motherboard for $96 (much nicer than the Gigabyte) and a $10 esata/usb card reader.
The H55M-USB3's memory latency is also a bit slower than the Asus board.
I can't see any hardware reason that the Gigabyte should be slower than the Asus.
Overclocking with ASUS motherboards seem to be much easier than with GIGABYTE motherboards.
Moreover, it was 12fps faster than the original G1.Sniper and 22fps quicker than the Asus Crosshair IV.
Gigabyte boards may sometimes be of better quality than Asus, but their Linux support is worse.
In both WinRAR and Cinebench, ASUS' Gene comes out slightly slower than Gigabyte flagship board, although it is faster than its big brother -- the Formula.
It's the first one we've tested that has faster USB 3.0 performance than the Asus boards, but in overall graphics and system performance, the Gibabyte was slightly slower than the Premium board.
I've heard that Gigabyte is better than ASUS.
I know that the FTW has a higher clock speed and is more stable ( and a wee bit faster than the Asus ) and the Asus has the custom cooler making it run a bit cooler and less noisy!!!
The Gigabyte boards definitely seem to offer better value for money than Asus, but I think Asus's EFI and windows software are vastly superior to Gigabytes.
Other Thoughts: Gigabyte products are better engineered than Asus.
Gigabyte just might be getting their BIOS updates out faster than ASUS.
Gigabyte is no worse than Asus of MSI, it's all about hazard.
output:

Moreover, some users argue that ASUS has better fan controlling and superior connectivity options, while others say that Gigabyte has better Linux support and BIOS updates. In terms of performance, both manufacturers have boards that outperform the other in different tests.

Overall, the choice between ASUS and Gigabyte motherboards depends on personal preferences, such as the desired level of performance, budget, overclocking capabilities, and compatibility with hardware and software.

The H55M-USB3's memory latency is also a bit slower than the Asus board.
I can't see any hardware reason that the Gigabyte should be slower than the Asus.
Overclocking with ASUS motherboards seem to be much easier than with GIGABYTE motherboards.
Moreover, it was 12fps faster than the original G1.Sniper and 22fps quicker than the Asus Crosshair IV.
Gigabyte boards may sometimes be of better quality than Asus, but their Linux support is worse.
In both WinRAR and Cinebench, ASUS' Gene comes out slightly slower than Gigabyte flagship board, although it is faster than its big brother -- the Formula.
It's the first one we've tested that has faster USB 3.0 performance than the Asus boards, but in overall graphics and system performance, the Gibabyte was slightly slower than the Premium board.
I've heard that Gigabyte is better than ASUS.
I know that the FTW has a higher clock speed and is more stable ( and a wee bit faster than the Asus ) and the Asus has the custom cooler making it run a bit cooler and less noisy!!!
The Gigabyte boards definitely seem to offer better value for money than Asus, but I think Asus's EFI and windows software are vastly superior to Gigabytes.
Other Thoughts: Gigabyte products are better engineered than Asus.
Gigabyte just might be getting their BIOS updates out faster than ASUS.
Gigabyte is no worse than Asus of MSI, it's all about hazard.
output:
Asus and Gigabyte are both reputable brands of computer hardware, particularly motherboards. The preference of one over the other may depend on specific models and user needs.

Some arguments suggest that Asus is faster in certain performance metrics; has better connectivity options; has better fan controlling; and has superior EFI and Windows software. 

On the other hand, some users argue that Gigabyte offers better value for money; is better engineered; and has better BIOS updates. Also, some state that Gigabyte boards may sometimes be of better quality than Asus, but their Linux support is worse. 

Overall, the choice of an Asus or Gigabyte motherboard might come down to personal taste and specific requirements. Users may want to compare specific models and read reviews to make an informed decision.

input:
Summarize: That means that your computer will speed up for harder tasks more effectively than a standard AMD-powered laptop, but at the cost of draining the battery faster.
Not at all like intel is better than amd.
Like Intel dual-core being comparable if not better than AMD quad cores.
You can't, however, buy a new Windows ultraportable with anything better than an Atom or AMD E-Series processor for $450.
I find it irritating that AMD and Intel are doing better at coming down (e.g. Kabini) than ARM/Samsung at going up.
Also included is a 1TB hard disk drive (which is slower and more power hungry than the solid-state drives found on other ultrabooks), a dedicated AMD graphics chip and an optical disk drive.
AMD might even have to sell off their processor division to IBM (which already makes POWER processors), Sun (which needs something better than SPARC), Samsung, etc. .
even on my brand new Toshiba (also an AMD/ATI chipset) while far better looking and playable than on my Samsung, it still seems to have a few 'blurries'.
better than my AMD Athlon XP 2600+!
There can be multiple reasons why Intel is faster then AMD.
The AMD-based HP Pavillion was significantly slower in benchmarking tests than the Samsung, which we found extremely disappointing.
@71d0e48c35c2d715918bd4e7d885406f:disqus Just like how Intel is just better than AMD right.
Faster than an AMD Athlon X2 with all-day battery life and a very good (although low-res) screen.
And I think that Apple actually gets a better deal from Intel than AMD, which is why they split from AMD in the first place.
The first DDR chipsets weren't more than 5-10% faster for AMD hardware (the P4 showed dramatic gains because the P4 was so bandwidth-starved on SDR).
While this model is around Â£50 more expensive than other TB laptops we've tracked, it has a much faster graphics subsystem built on AMD technology and a faster processor, plus there's at least a third more memory on offer.
It performs much better than Nouveau (which isn't surprising, since AMD released full specifications, and nVidia requires complete clean-room reverse engineering), and integrates into a Linux desktop cleaner than the nVidia proprietary driver (nVidia destroys the boot display, for example).
The results of the 3DMark benchmarks are on a good level and are marginally better than the scores of the Satellite ( AMD A8-4500M , Radeon HD 7640G + HD 7610M dual-graphics ).
output:
AMD and Samsung are well-known brands in the technology industry, and both offer products with different features and performances.

According to different arguments, AMD is noted for its multitasking capabilities, but may have higher power consumption. Samsung is praised for its faster benchmarks and better graphics subsystem on certain models. 

Additionally, some people argue that Intel is better than AMD, while others suggest that AMD may offer better deals and have better-looking graphics on some devices. 

Ultimately, the decision of which brand to choose may depend on your specific needs and preferences. It is recommended to research and compare specific products and models to make an informed decision.

Windows 8 makes it harder to use my computer than Windows 7, Windows XP... or even Windows Vista.
Actually for many Windows XP users it is easier to migrate to Linux Mint than to Windows 8.
Perhaps it is little wonder that Windows XP usage continues to grow faster than that of Windows 8.x .
Many organizations have the perception that Windows XP is faster, more efficient and less buggy than Windows Vista, Windows 7 or Windows 8.
Hence It was slower than its predecessor Windows XP which is still popular with over 30% market share and Windows Vista holds less than 10% market share according to StatCounter .
It is also similar in usability to Windows XP, ensuring that the learning curve for new users is relatively smoother than migrating to Windows 8.
But it is not legitimate to make up a myriad of excuses why Windows 8 is worse than Windows XP or Linux.
Bloated or not, Windows 7 has a smaller memory footprint and a greater benchmark performance in practically everything than Windows XP.
But that aside, Windows 10 is still easier to navigate than Mac OS X and Windows 8, has better access to files than in Android, and is faster, more flexible and more capable than Windows XP and the Home and Enterprise editions of Windows 7.
Meanwhile, though Windows 8 is significantly at greater risk (1.73 percent) compared to Windows 8.1, according to Redmond's report, it's still significantly safer than Windows 7, Windows XP, or Windows Vista.

input:
Summarize: Aroma, even worse than the appearance, smelled worse than budweiser, and somehow worse than tomato juice.
It sucks juice faster than Andrew can drink beer.
When on MDMA, drink either cold water or fruit juice (it's nicer than swilling beer anyway...) .
In fact apple juice would be a better comparison than beer.
A pint glass of apple juice makes a better looking beer than this.
There's no better description for it than its name "Hop Juice."
Made from fermented apple juice, it has a bold and refreshing taste that is easy to drink and is lighter than beer.
Taste - if possible, worse than the smell - artificial lemon juice, skanky corn, rice alcohol - the ugliness sticks to your tongue like epoxy.
Drinking water, juice or sports drinks are better post-workout options to refuel than beer.
Cold apple juice after a hard run in the heat tastes better than any beer ever has.
It is better than a cooler and made with real jubilee strawberry juice....will definitely buy again and I cant wait actually....a real pleasure!
Nice clear brew, slightly lighter than apple juice.
This disappears quicker than I can say 'tomato juice.'
Pours a bit lighter than cranberry juice.
Lighter than regular apple juice in the glass.
Palate: smoother than a cider, similar to apple juice in palate.
Pours a bit lighter than the color of pink grapefruit juice.
MF- zesty tight carbonation and lighter than apple juice consistancy.
Clean dark hay pour, a bit lighter than apple juice.
Poured a very light yellow, many tones lighter than apple juice.
output:
Juice and beer are both popular beverages, but they differ in taste, appearance, and ingredients. 

While some people argue that juice, such as apple juice, can make a better comparison than beer, others prefer the taste and effect of beer. Some describe the taste of beer as "hop juice" or lighter than fruit juice, while others say it smells and tastes worse than tomato juice. In contrast, some argue that cold fruit juice, like apple juice, tastes better than beer, especially after a workout.

Overall, juice is generally considered a healthier alternative to beer as it is lower in alcohol and calories. Furthermore, drinking water, juice, or sports drinks is a better option for post-workout refueling than beer. However, juice can also have negative aspects, such as sugary additives and artificial flavors.

Ultimately, the choice between juice and beer is a matter of personal taste and preferences. Both beverages have their own unique qualities and can be enjoyed in moderation.

Juice and beer are both popular beverages, but there are significant differences between them. 

Juice, particularly apple juice, can sometimes be used as a comparison to beer in terms of appearance, but it is generally considered to taste better, have a lighter and smoother palate, and be a more appropriate choice for post-workout hydration. Beer, on the other hand, has a distinct taste and aroma that can be polarizing and is often described as a hoppy or skunky "Hop Juice". It can also be consumed for its alcoholic content and as a social lubricant. 

Ultimately, the preference for juice or beer is subjective and depends on individual taste and situation.
