Ultimately, the choice between Toyota and Ford may depend on personal preferences. However, it's important to do research and read reviews to find the best fit for your needs.

input:
Summarize: It's the Operating System which matters to the user and, as an Apple computer user I shall still enjoy a vastly superior interface and better build quality than the Dell-boys and Windows.
I'm not saying Apple is superior to HP, Dell, etc.
EDIT: From my experiences, customer support is better than HP/Dell/Asus, but worse than Acer/Apple/Boutique Brands.
For computers, HP and Dell are worse than Apple, just have better PR to hide it.
Some in fact are better than their closest Apple counterparts like the sharper and lighter Dell XP 15.
Dell, for example, has even worse service than Apple.
It is for these technical reasons that the Apple iPod is superior to the Dell DJ.
Apple claims new Server G3 is faster than Dell server.
Yes, Apple products are superior to PC's when you compare standard issue hardware (vs. Dell , HP, etc).
Dell does not make better monitors than apple.
The MBP15 will still get better battery life than the stock L501x, it's slightly lighter and definitely thinner, and some will prefer the Apple styling.
I'm willing to bet that in a few months, HP or Dell or some other company will put a faster processor or a bigger GPU on the same/similar shell and then claim to be better than Apple at what they do.
The point is not whether Dell clusters are cheaper or faster, or even if Dell makes faster computers than Apple.
I still believe, as I wrote in my review, that this Dell's hardware is superior to that of the competing Apple iMac, though the Vista operating system is inferior to Apple's.
They're great notebooks - they have better screens than the 17" apple notebooks, faster hard disks, and better graphics cards too.
Dell is better if you like Dell better than Apple and Apple is better if you like Apple better than Dell.
It also touts certain Metro navigation and control features as being superior to those employed by Apple.
Why not, the dell ultrasharps as a monitor are superior to the apple displays.
dell is still better than apple.
You have no technical argument for the Dell DJ being "superior" to the Apple iPod.
output:
Apple and Dell are two major computer and electronics companies, and they have some differences in terms of quality, customer support, and performance.

Some argue that Apple has better build quality, better software interface, superior hardware, and better monitors. Others argue that Dell has faster hard disks and better graphics cards, and superior ultrasharp monitors, and that it has better PR to hide its flaws. Moreover, some argue that the customer support of Apple is better than that of Dell, while others disagree.

Regarding specific products, some argue that Apple iPod is superior to Dell DJ, and the Server G is faster than Dell server. However, others argue that Dell XP  is sharper and lighter than Apple counterparts.

Ultimately, the choice between Apple and Dell may depend on personal preferences, needs, and technical arguments. Some also suggest that other companies may offer similar or better products in the future.

input:
Summarize: A native-code compiler is available, and according to numerical benchmarks , it makes Erlang programs faster than Ruby, Perl, and PHP, albeit slower than Java and JavaScript.
Javascript syntax does _nothing_ better than ruby syntax.
Though thanks to V8, it executes JavaScript faster than PHP, python and ruby.
It is javascript-based, which is safer than ActiveX and the Ruby component is negligible.
Benchmarking languages is an inexact science, but Ruby appears drastically slower than even JavaScript and Python.
Otherwise Javascript has become amazingly fast, I think V8 is faster then ruby and python.
Javascript is quite good (it's actually faster than Ruby in most benchmarks, but memory consumption is a lot higher!)
At least in Windmill the JavaScript tests run exponentially faster than the Python or Ruby tests do.
The fact that JavaScript is so much faster than Ruby, even with the little bit of network latency, op code translation, execution, etc., just makes it even clearer to me that what I really want is a server-side JavaScript framework.
The order in which I listed them is my order of preference - yes, I like Javascript better than Ruby.
JavaScript : Dynamically typed and worse design than Python and Ruby.
Here is one case where I think Io serves better than JavaScript.
Ruby is a beautiful language, much easier to learn (syntactically) than javascript.
Ruby is simply a better language than Javascript will ever become.
(Hell, JavaScript has good debuggers and it's MUCH weirder and harder to follow than Ruby.)
Following up from Arlen's post: JavaScript is often harder to debug than Ruby because it often fails silently.
However, i don't think it is any better than emacs lisp, Scheme lisp, javascript, Mathematica.
If you are using link_to_remote it makes it easier to maintain than having javascript in your head-tag.
PHP, Ruby, JSP, or ASP, depending on your server's configuration will probably provide a better solution than JavaScript.
jQuery and prototype are better than cranking all your own javascript libraries, but they are not a GUI framework that leads to a clean and standardized app (like rails does).
output:
JavaScript and Ruby are both commonly used programming languages, but they have different strengths and weaknesses.

Some users argue that JavaScript is faster than Ruby in terms of execution and has better debuggers. On the other hand, some argue that Ruby is easier to learn, is a better language, and has better syntax. Some also find JavaScript harder to debug. Moreover, some argue that JavaScript is safer than ActiveX and that the Ruby component is negligible.

Ultimately, the choice between JavaScript and Ruby may depend on personal preferences and the specific needs of the project. It's also worth noting that other programming languages such as Python and PHP may be a better solution depending on the server's configuration.

Summarize: It's heavier than the Sony Vaio T ultrabook, and lighter than the new Dell Inspiron 14z.
If we look into the over heating issues,Â SonyÂ is better than dell
Viewsonic, Samsung, Sony, and several others have superior displays compared to Dell.
This showing was just shy of the average rate of 35.8 MBps and slower than the Sony VAIO S Series 15 (35.1 MBps).
Like the Sony VAIO VGN-CR11SR/P , the Satellite U300-111 comes with a larger amount of system memory and is thus superior to the Dell.
My 10 year old 27" Sony CRT looks better hooked to analog than the Dell unit.
Dell Streak 5's volume level and sound quality is much worse than Apple's, Sony Ericsson's, HTC's etc smart phone.
however, I do have a Sony PC which has better features and a lower price than Dell.
I don't know if Sony would be better than Dell, or any other make for that matter.
I like the look and the keyboard (plus number pad) on the Sony better than the dell, but the Sony screen is super flimsy.
That's more than a minute and a half faster than average (6:23), and slightly quicker than the MacBook Pro (5:02), Sony VAIO Pro 13 (5:10), Samsung ATIV Book 9 Plus (5:13) and Lenovo X240 (5:22).
It was much faster than the Sony YB Series and the Toshiba NB550D in the iTunes test, but it was still slower than the Toshiba in the Blender 3D test.
In all 3 catagories it performs MUCH better than my old Sony 17 inch media laptop.
Sony service was actually worse than both HP and Dell.
Dell typically has much better quality control than Sony.
It is a pound lighter than the 16" Sony F I am using.
This machine is also quicker than the likes of the Toshiba Satellite U840 and the Sony Vaio T11 .
In fact, it's thinner, narrower, and lighter by several ounces than the Sony VAIO V505 , although the 700m is heavier than the IBM ThinkPad X40 .
Its benchmark scores were slightly better than the nearly identically outfitted Dell Studio 1555 (4285MBU) and up to 22% faster (on PCMark Vantage) than a preceding Sony model, the VAIO VGN-NW120J released midyear.
It's much better than what my old Sony GRZ630 used to put out.
output:
Sony and Dell are two well-known and respected brands in the electronics industry, but determining which one is better depends on individual needs and opinions.

Some argue that Sony has better displays, better features and lower prices, and better performance in specific tasks. Others claim that Dell has better quality control, while Sony service was actually worse than HP and Dell.

There are also comments about the weight and volume quality of the products, as well as heating issues and design preferences. 

Ultimately, it is difficult to generalize which brand is superior, as this can vary depending on the specific product and use case. It is recommended to do research and compare models to find the one that best fits your needs.

And no restaurant knows home-cooking better than The Dixie Cafe.
The food was fine but no better than any other diner style restaurant.
WATCH: Amsterdam Restaurant Only Offers Tables For One, Better Than a Cat Cafe .
And this restaurant makes better coffee than any cafe I have -ever- visited.

The restaurant would have to be better than just a simple cafe or pizza place.
Arcade Restaurant has the best beignets; yes, way better than Cafe du Monde in New Orleans.
There's nothing worse than looking forward to eating at your favorite local restaurant all day, only to show up and find that it's closed.
In some ways, there is no greater honor than having your name forever emblazoned on the menu at your favorite restaurant, particularly if it stays open for the better part of a century and shows no sign of slowing down.
The atomosphere was much nicer than a typical Chinese restaurant.
The restaurant is worse than a motorway cafe .
I thought it was a nicer restaurant than our meal there indicated.
Is so much better than the average Basingstoke restaurant.
Better than most restaurant chains around in my opinion.
Taste: B+, better than your average chain restaurant.
A little lighter than the restaurant (which is a good thing) but full of flavour and spice!
The meals there are fantastic, prices reasonable and much quicker than a TS restaurant.
Anyways it is better than a "normal" non veg restaurant regarding options.

Ultimately, the choice between a restaurant and a cafe may depend on personal preferences and priorities, such as atmosphere, menu, and quality. Whether you opt for a fancy restaurant or a laid-back cafe, the key is to enjoy the experience and savor good food and company.

Summarize: The combination Twitch+YouTube looked great on paper - much better than Amazon+Twitch.
YouTube will have better demographics than Amazon for this service, but a less substantial offering.
If you need to kill massive amounts of time, there's no better way to do it than YouTube.
I will upload a TON of video from this on my YouTube site that will allow you to see the quality (or lack of quality) far better than Amazon allows given its limits.
If you're disappointed that I didn't review the gameplay then it's only because I can't compete with YouTube videos, which will give you a better idea about gameplay mechanics than all Amazon reviews combined.
StreetPass Mii Plaza (Play with Miis from around the world) ArGames Face Raiders 2 Activity Log Download Play Flipnote Hatena YouTube (Much better than the 3DS version) Facebook Twitter Amazon Video Hulu Plus Netflix .
It looks better than the YouTube website.
The volume was somewhat better than streaming YouTube videos.
On my connection, it looked about as good as Hulu's "480p" option - considerably better than YouTube.
Roku's Amazon app is much better, but of course Roku is notoriously lacking a YouTube app and a few others like Vudu.
It's much easier to produce a movie and upload it onto YouTube than it was to get a short feature made in the days of film.
Amazon made it easier to buy than it was to steal it and sites like Pandora and YouTube made it easier to sample music before we bought it.
You'd probably be better off watching gameplay videos on youtube than having one of us explain it to you.
"Done is better than perfect," Feross Aboukhadijehm, creator of YouTube Instant, a site that lets you look through YouTube videos in realtime, told the magazine.
So much so you might rediscover that reading a good story might just be better than Facebook updates about someone's kid graduating from preschool, or almost any YouTube videos.
As a rapidly growing video site that has generated more web traffic than Facebook and Hulu in past months, Twitch will give Amazon greater scale to compete for ad dollars with the Google-owned YouTube, the world's biggest online video destination by far.
output:
YouTube and Amazon are two popular websites that offer different services, but they have some similarities and differences.

Some argue that YouTube is better for entertainment and passing time, provides better video quality and upload limits, and has more informative content. Additionally, YouTube is easier to use for uploading content and has a better-looking website.

In comparison, Amazon is praised for its online shopping and purchasing, offers a better streaming volume, and has a more substantial offering. Its app on Roku is also said to be better. Moreover, Twitch (owned by Amazon) has generated more web traffic than YouTube. However, others criticize Amazon's limitations on video quality.

Ultimately, the choice between YouTube and Amazon depends on personal preferences and needs. For example, Amazon may be a better choice for shopping, while YouTube may be better for entertainment or informative content.

input:
Summarize: Nothing pairs with tomato soup better than a classic grilled cheese sandwich .
I eat a lot of soup, I have a bad stomach, and soup digests much easier than a sandwich for lunch.
But I daresay the soup went better with the beer than a grilled cheese sandwich... .
On a cold rainy day, there's not much better than tomato soup and a grilled cheese sammich.
There are lots of casserole and soup recipes but there is NOTHING better than a yummy, thick ham sandwich!
Easy-to-make homemade Buckeye Beans and Herbs Split Pea Soup provide better lunch alternative than a hamburger or a sandwich.
Plus if you are planning on having a cheese sandwich, there is no better accompaniment than a warm bowl of tomato soup.
However, when the kitchen began to distribute soup donated by Taliano's Italian Restaurant, he said they realized "it was better than ours" and returned to the sandwich line.
Entrees were a pan seared trout with toasted almond butter, mashed potatoes, mac 'n cheese, curry pumpkin soup (a bit sweet, and even better than the squash soup), and a buttery, melt-y, fabulous pimento grilled cheese sandwich.
Nothing is more comforting than tomato soup, which is perfect any time of year, and it just gets better when it's paired with a hot, cheesy grilled cheese sandwich.
It was quite good with a sandwich and better than most canned soup.
Plus what goes better with soup than sandwiches!
And dare I say better than the soup simply because it takes a lot less time.
The ham and egg sandwich has the nutrients more concentrated and easier to handle than the chicken soup.
Grilled cheese is a versatile and widely treasured sandwich favorite, but there's nothing better than pairing the sandwich with a bowl of tomato soup.
As with a good tomato soup, I can think of no better accompaniment than a grilled cheese sandwich.
Now, i'm not real creative with my sandwich choices, to me there is nothing better than a tradition grilled cheese, served with tomato soup!
Even better than a grilled cheese, though, is a half grilled cheese paired with a cup of soup ($12).
Nothing goes better together than soup and sandwiches, but it would be nice to put the whole meal on one plate so it's easy to carry to the couch.
Even better, it all came together in less than 45 minutes, a substantial time-saver when compared to the classic soup recipe's 72 hours.
output:
Soup and sandwich are popular meal choices with their own pros and cons.

Many people enjoy tomato soup with a grilled cheese sandwich, as they pair well together and provide comfort on a cold or rainy day. However, some argue that soup, in general, is easier to digest than sandwiches, which may be important for people with stomach issues.

On the other hand, some argue that sandwiches, particularly ham or cheese sandwiches, are tastier and provide more nutrients in a concentrated form. Moreover, sandwiches can be more versatile and easier to make than soup.

Overall, the choice between soup and sandwich may depend on personal preferences, dietary needs, and convenience. Additionally, pairing soup and sandwich together can provide a well-rounded and satisfying meal.

input:
Summarize: Nothing pairs with tomato soup better than a classic grilled cheese sandwich .
I eat a lot of soup, I have a bad stomach, and soup digests much easier than a sandwich for lunch.
But I daresay the soup went better with the beer than a grilled cheese sandwich... .
On a cold rainy day, there's not much better than tomato soup and a grilled cheese sammich.
There are lots of casserole and soup recipes but there is NOTHING better than a yummy, thick ham sandwich!
Easy-to-make homemade Buckeye Beans and Herbs Split Pea Soup provide better lunch alternative than a hamburger or a sandwich.
Plus if you are planning on having a cheese sandwich, there is no better accompaniment than a warm bowl of tomato soup.
However, when the kitchen began to distribute soup donated by Taliano's Italian Restaurant, he said they realized "it was better than ours" and returned to the sandwich line.
Entrees were a pan seared trout with toasted almond butter, mashed potatoes, mac 'n cheese, curry pumpkin soup (a bit sweet, and even better than the squash soup), and a buttery, melt-y, fabulous pimento grilled cheese sandwich.
Nothing is more comforting than tomato soup, which is perfect any time of year, and it just gets better when it's paired with a hot, cheesy grilled cheese sandwich.
It was quite good with a sandwich and better than most canned soup.
Plus what goes better with soup than sandwiches!
And dare I say better than the soup simply because it takes a lot less time.
The ham and egg sandwich has the nutrients more concentrated and easier to handle than the chicken soup.
Grilled cheese is a versatile and widely treasured sandwich favorite, but there's nothing better than pairing the sandwich with a bowl of tomato soup.
As with a good tomato soup, I can think of no better accompaniment than a grilled cheese sandwich.
Now, i'm not real creative with my sandwich choices, to me there is nothing better than a tradition grilled cheese, served with tomato soup!
Even better than a grilled cheese, though, is a half grilled cheese paired with a cup of soup ($12).
Nothing goes better together than soup and sandwiches, but it would be nice to put the whole meal on one plate so it's easy to carry to the couch.
Even better, it all came together in less than 45 minutes, a substantial time-saver when compared to the classic soup recipe's 72 hours.
output:
Soup and sandwich are popular food choices that often go together. 

There are arguments that claim there is nothing better than pairing tomato soup with a grilled cheese sandwich. Others emphasize that soup is easier to digest than sandwich and provides a better lunch alternative. 

Moreover, some people argue that sandwiches go better with soup than anything else. There are also comparisons of the taste and quality of soup and sandwich dishes, such as soup being better than a ham sandwich, or Taliano's Italian Restaurant soup being better than homemade soup. 

Overall, soup and sandwich have a long history of being enjoyed together. Some argue that they are perfect comfort food, while others point out the convenience and time-saving aspect of combining them in one meal. Ultimately, the choice depends on individual preferences and dietary needs.

Others argue that soup is easier to make than pasta, tastes better than jarred pasta sauce, and is more versatile as it can be served with a variety of ingredients such as beans and vegetables. 

On the other hand, there are arguments in favor of pasta as well. Some argue that pasta can be more satisfying when paired with ingredients like grilled chicken and green onions, and that it can be less likely to become bloated and mushy when frozen than pasta in soup. Additionally, some believe that certain types of pasta, like Ricotta Ravioli, can be very delicious when made well, and that certain brands of pasta, like spaghettini, can be better than soup.

Ultimately, the choice between soup and pasta may depend on personal preferences and needs. Both are delicious and can be nutritious when combined with the right ingredients.

input:
Summarize: Hydroplaning on 2 wheels is much worse than hydroplaning in a car or truck that has 4 or more wheels.
All four top car and truck finishers completed the course quicker than the top motorcycle team.
I bought a 1978 Toyota Truck (20r 5spd RWD) for $500 as I was looking for something safer than a motorcycle during the winter.
Not only because we believe that the cities and towns that you'll find just off the 400 highways offer a better experience than truck stops and fast food joints, but the scenery is better, the people are welcoming, and every turn reveals something unexpected.
Still, check at least twice before turning or pulling into intersections because, even with that headlight, a motorcycle can be harder to see than a car or truck.
The eventual ride was in the back of a pick-up truck, which was only slightly better than on the back of a motorcycle, I guess.
Winning not just the Trophy Truck category but also the Overall title, the first time a 4 wheel vehicle has been faster than a motorcycle since 1973 in a peninsula run to La Paz.
The driver got mad and followed me, the truck was faster than my motorcycle, he eventually came in contact and started pushing (didn't RAM, just started pushing) and my bike blew up a second later, died instantly.
Used to raise my travel trailer to make repairs, lubricate, and change a tire which is easier and safer than using the scissor jack from my truck.
A motorcycle stops quicker than a car or truck.
To tell you the truth, my husbands chopper is smoother then my truck.
It is easier than securing bikes in the bed of a truck.
It was faster, more fuel efficient and more affordable than either a car or a truck, and was often better suited for use as either a service or light-load delivery vehicle.
In most traffic situations, a motorcycle will get you to your destination quicker than a car or truck.
Therefore the motorcycle will undergo a much greater change in its motion than the truck.
A lot better gas mileage than the truck.
Comments from others is the sound quality is better than the Bluetooth from my truck stereo.
Better than storing every size in back of the truck to bang around.
output:
Trucks and motorcycles are different modes of transportation with their own advantages and disadvantages.

Some argue that motorcycles can be safer in some situations because they can stop more quickly than trucks. However, others note that motorcycles are more difficult to see than cars or trucks and can be more dangerous in wet driving conditions.

Trucks, on the other hand, are generally considered safer than motorcycles due to their stability and greater visibility. Trucks are also better for carrying heavy loads and are more comfortable for long trips.

There are also arguments that favor one mode of transportation over the other based on specific features. For example, motorcycles offer better gas mileage, are easier to park, and can sometimes be more affordable. Some people also prefer the smoother ride of a motorcycle over a truck.

Therefore, the choice between a truck and a motorcycle may depend on personal preferences, needs, and driving conditions.

input:
Summarize: I'd also like to point out that plastic boards are way faster and smoother to ride than a standard skateboard, as they generally have a slightly softer wheels and absorb the vibrations from the roughness of the ground way better than wood.
The video explains that iGPS plastic pallets are lighter, stronger, safer and greener than wood.
The plastic is lighter and the checkering is so much better than the wood version.
This beautiful teak board requires more careful cleaning than plastic boards, but it feels better under a knife and it's easier to maintain than other wood boards.
Plastic laminate flooring is one of the most affordable options; it is cheaper, easier to install and wears better than solid wood.
Its 100 percent recyclable all-plastic pallet with embedded RFID tags is lighter, stronger, safer and greener than platforms made of wood and has been adopted by many of the world's leading brands.
So it seems that the prevailing "wisdom" that plastic is safer than wood is not true after all.
And plastic pallets are safer than wood, because they are lighter and don't splinter.
Isn't plastic safer than wood.
I realize that plastic would be much lighter than clay/wood but if you have a work force already "trained" in one thing then it might be quicker to get a product to market using a "worse" option than you can retraining them.
I have seen enough research for and against wood but to me, it's much easier, safer and simpler (less maintenance) to simply have 2 cheaper plastic boards (raw vs. ready to eat) than expensive wood and 1 cheaper plastic for raw.
Wood looks better, feels more natural, and is easier on your knives than plastic.
I think it will be better and much easier to print out graphene Ink on some plastic substrate.
It was another forum and the talk turned into: Is wood cutting boards safer or better than plastic/poly.
If the deck board is wood or has wood (organic matter) in it, it will attract mold faster/easier than an all-plastic board.
As I mentioned before, plastic is harder than wood, meaning it will dull a knife faster.
Bamboo is easier to wash than a wood cutting board and safer than plastic.
Wood clarinets don't automatically play better than plastic clarinets & plastic clarinets don't automatically play worse than wood clarinets.
They are better than metal for flexibility and slight stickiness, and better than plastic for quality, hand, and lighter stickiness.
They are superior to sound over plastic.
output:
Plastic and wood are two popular materials with various applications, and each has its own advantages and disadvantages.

Some argue that plastic is lighter, stronger, and safer than wood, as well as easier to install and wear better. It is also noted that plastic boards are faster and smoother to ride than wooden skateboards, and they absorb vibrations from rough ground better. On the other hand, some argue that plastic is harder than wood, which means it dulls knives faster. Additionally, some think that wood looks better, feels more natural, and is easier on knives than plastic.

A bamboo cutting board, which is a type of wood, is considered easier to wash and safer than plastic. Some people also prefer wood cutting boards, as they believe that they are safer than plastic.

Overall, the choice between plastic and wood depends on the specific application and personal preferences. It is essential to consider factors such as durability, safety, aesthetics, and functionality to make an informed decision.

Summarize: There simply is no objective truth on whether pizza tastes better than steak.
We ignored his editorial feedback and sauntered around the corner for a middling white pizza and a better-than-expected steak salad at Pitfire Pizza .
I found the selection of food to be a huge bonus, hot burgers, pizza (better than the typical Italian pizza I described above), hot dogs, steak, fantastic pasta, etc.
In the '50s/'60s and into the '70s there were scores of Pasquales, serving good pizza (better than Pizza Hut) and even better sandwiches (the Hoggie, the Stromboli Steak to name the top two).
But in the end, I realized that there's no better way to break this silence than to do so with something that's just normal for us - like pizza.
They had magnificent pizza and excellent pastasÂ + all the "Western PA" specialties, like meaty wings (far better than Quaker Steak) and 'fill your plate' fish sandwiches.
No offense to Pat or Gino, but your local Pizza shop will provide a larger/better cheese steak than either of the two fighting it out in downtown Philly.
I'm 62 years old and the original P&M Pizza is without a doubt my all-time favorite food - ever, bar none; better than lobster, steak, crab legs, or you name it.

input:
Summarize: A sandwiche, bread, cheese, is easier than soup!
Day-old or slightly stale bread held up better in our Tuscan Bread Soup recipe than fresh bread.
Pop some bread in your bread machine because nothing goes better with a warm soup than warm, homemade bread!
Picking mold off the soft side of bread is easier than heating a can of soup.
We ate ours with some garlic bread because nothing goes better with a garlicky soup than garlic bread!
I was just reading that bread bowl post and I almost fell over... I love pretzel bread to begin with, a pretzel bread bowl is even better, & then add this soup!
In some cases a white bread ingredient is actually better than some GF chemical soup.
Small Cups of Soup start at $3.95 with a chunk of not much better than average bread for dipping.
The bread was easier to eat than the soup, for all that the warmth of the latter was comforting.
I adore the inclusion of a hearty home-baked bread - there truly is nothing better with than a soup/crusty bread comfort combo.
but milk curdles quicker with egg-yolks than with a liaison of bread .
The only thing better than brown bread is toasted brown bread.
Using sourdough is meant to be much easier on the stomach than standard white bread.
I adore any soup, but what goes better with soup than some homemade crusty warm bread.
I have experimented with different dough, and find that Market Basket's pizza dough is superior to all, including my bread machine dough.
While my wonderful soup was cooking, I decided what better to go with soup than homemade bread.
I think this filling tastes better with grilled than plain bread.
And it's simpler than Mark Bittman/Jim Lahey no-knead bread because you don't have to think a day ahead.
I agree with you and your daughter though, nothing better than homemade bread.
I like it much better than Panera Bread, but it is a little different.
output:
Bread and soup are two common food items that are often eaten together, but they also have their own unique qualities.

Some argue that bread is easier to eat than soup, particularly if it's homemade and warm. Others say that soup is the perfect accompaniment to bread, particularly if it's a hearty, garlicky, or crusty version. 

In terms of preparation, some argue that day-old or slightly stale bread is better in Tuscan Bread Soup, as it holds up better than fresh bread. Additionally, some bread ingredients are considered to be better for people with dietary restrictions, such as sourdough being easier on the stomach than white bread. 

Ultimately, bread and soup are two simple foods that can be enjoyed in many ways and can be easily customized to personal preferences.

Summarize: Java is around 100 times faster than Perl.
This version should be more accessible (if installing a Java environment is easier for you than installing Perl) and faster.
This would put it near the performance of Erlang-significantly better than Python, Perl, and Ruby, but similarly significantly slower than C#, Java and native C++ .
PHP is much simpler to learn than Java, and a bit easier than Perl.
Java is superior to your puny perl.
The claim is that ICI is faster than Perl but slower than Java, a peculiar claim since Perl and Java each out-perform the other in different circumstances.
Considering that Java syntax, which many would arguably consider to be easier to understand than Perl, uses similar syntax, we are curious how it would perform.
All in all error handling in php is better then perl and worse then java.
Not only is it slightly faster than Java its also much easier to code in.
java will still be faster then Perl .
Not to mention that someone who knew the language could generate the parsing code in perl faster and easier than in java.
Perl is also has a somewhat lighter footprint on your server, and managing the path to modules is much easier than managing CLASSPATH for Java.
And so, I have a vested interest in people believing Perl is faster to develop in and easier to maintain than Java or C#.
It was easier and faster to learn a few new Java class libraries than it was to try and tack on a new language.
While Ruby/Python/PERL/PHP are interesting and can do some things better/nicer than Java, I think that it will take some time for one of these languages to be on a par with Java.
Perl is around 34 times faster than Java.
Perl (with Moose and other element), Node, Ruby, and a few others would all be far superior in getting students to the thinking stage faster than the twisting turning maze one finds themselves in with Java.
Still perl is faster, but Java is not worse than other languages like python.
I'm pretty sure I can do things in Perl much faster than I could do them in Java, and far faster than I could do them in brainfuck and assembly.
That's why I would think Perl is superior to Java.
output:
Java and Perl are both programming languages with their own strengths and weaknesses.

According to some users, Java is faster than Perl, while others argue that Perl is faster. Java is also considered less simple to learn than PHP and Perl, but easier to understand than Perl. 

Perl is praised for its ease of development, lighter footprint on the server, and easier management of path and modules. Some users also argue that Perl is superior in getting students to the thinking stage faster than Java. 

However, Java has a large user community and a wide range of libraries, making it easier to learn a few new class libraries than trying to learn a new language. Some users also argue that Java has better error handling than PHP but worse than Java. 

Ultimately, the decision between Java and Perl may depend on personal preferences and needs. Both have their own strengths and weaknesses, and each may be better suited for different tasks.

The chip is expected to provide faster performance than the Atom "Clover Trail" processors currently found in Windows 8 tablets from Acer, Dell, Hewlett-Packard, Lenovo and Samsung.
Massey predicts the superior performance of technology shares such as Hewlett-Packard Co. and Microsoft will "last for a couple of years."
Shares of Intel trade at 10 times earnings, lower than an average of 14 for tech companies but better than Hewlett-Packard Co and Dell Inc, which also depend heavily on PC sales pinched by a lacklustre economy and the growing popularity of tablets.
The new V Series systems come in the two-way 200 model and four-way 400 model, and offer customers better performance at a lower cost than the companys high-end Continuum systems, which run the VOS and HP-UX Unix OS from Hewlett-Packard Co., Lane said.
output:
Hewlett-Packard (HP) and Intel are two major technology companies that produce a range of electronic devices and components.

HP has been known to produce faster microprocessors than Intel and Motorola in the past, and their new chip is expected to offer faster performance than Intel's Atom processors. In terms of stock market performance, some analysts predict that HP shares will outperform Intel due to their superior technology and performance. However, Intel currently has a better earnings ratio than both HP and Dell. 

HP also produces operating systems (OS) such as VOS and HP-UX Unix OS that run on their high-end Continuum systems that are costlier compared to HP's V Series systems, which offer better performance at a lower cost. 

Overall, HP and Intel are both major players in the technology industry, but their strengths and areas of focus are different. Whether one is superior to the other may depend on specific needs and preferences.

Ultimately, the choice between metal and concrete may depend on the specific needs of the application, such as the desired weight, strength, and durability.

input:
Summarize: I am no huge Apple fan and while I hate that they never communicate with devs or customers for that matter its impossible to say the google store is better or safer than the itunes app store .
Google music is far better than itunes but the purchasing setup for the itunes STORE is much easier to use IMO.
Apple's maps application proved to be far inferior to Google's, turning what was supposed to be a setback for Google into a vindication.
Google Music is way better than iTunes.
For Artists, Google Music Offers Much Better Deal Than iTunes .
I use Google in Safari because it's usually faster than the iTunes app.
Google Play seems to provide a smoother experience for buying media content and browsing than iTunes.
Google Music hands on: Better than beta, still no iTunes .
There is Google Chrome for Ubuntu, and Rythmbox is a much better alternative to Itunes, imho.
I disagree Google Music Instant Mix are superior than iTunes.
One of the huge pluses of the new Apple service is that iTunes already has a catalog of more than 20 million songs, meaning that the process is a lot easier and faster than, say, uploading every single track you own to Google Music.
Being able to use Google Play as a beta site for the more conservative (and slower to approve) iTunes is a remarkable benefit for any developer.
I do believe that Google is over-hyped, and that the product they have up is inferior to iTunes.
When it comes to media (and especially when you're outside the US), the Google Play store's selection remains inferior to iTunes'.
Google Play's tracks always sound inferior to either iTunes or Amazon's offerings and I have tested this across multiple devices/speakers.
AdMob has app advertising down better than Google so far.
Sources close to the story have said that Apple's cloud solution is expected to be vastly superior to competing services from Google and Amazon.
Neither is speed, Apple's Maps app is blazingly fast, faster than Google Maps on iOS.
iTunes store has a better selection than Google Play.
For people who make content, Apple is a better monopolist to deal with than Google.
output:
Google and iTunes are two popular platforms for media content and apps, but they differ in some aspects.

Some users argue that Google music is far better than iTunes, and offers a better deal for artists. Google Play also seems to provide a smoother experience for buying media content and browsing. On the other hand, iTunes is praised for having a larger selection of tracks, and a more convenient purchasing setup. 

Regarding apps, Apple's maps application is considered inferior to Google's, and some users prefer to use Google in Safari for its faster performance. However, Apple's cloud solution is expected to be superior to Google's and Amazon's. Also, AdMob has been found to have better app advertising than Google.

Overall, the choice between iTunes and Google depends on personal preferences and needs. Some may find one platform's features and selection better, while others may prefer the user experience of the other.

In conclusion, each platform has its own strengths and weaknesses. Therefore, it's important to weigh the pros and cons of each before making a decision on which platform to use.

In terms of off-road performance, Jeeps are praised for their winter performance and their off-road capabilities. They are also faster than some other SUVs. However, some argue that SUVs like the GMC Acadia offer smoother rides and better handling than truck-based SUVs like the Jeep Commander. 

Ultimately, the choice between an SUV and a Jeep depends on the specific needs and preferences of the driver. SUVs may be more practical for daily use and long drives, while Jeeps are better suited for off-road adventures. Both types of vehicles can offer different features and benefits, so it's important to research and test drive different models to find the best fit for you.

output:
Stone and timber are two materials used in construction that have different properties and applications.

Stone is considered superior to timber in terms of durability and stability, as it is non-combustible and provides better protection against earthquakes. However, timber is easier to erect and cheaper than stone. Stone structures are harder to identify and understand, and may not be the best choice for sites subject to movement. 

On the other hand, timber is a more versatile material, which can span greater distances than stones and easier to maintain than natural stone. Some argue that even cordwood has a better r-value per inch than a simple stone wall in cold climates. 

Overall, the choice between stone and timber depends on the specific needs of the project, such as structural stability, cost, and aesthetic preferences.

input:
Summarize: PHP is much simpler to learn than Java, and a bit easier than Perl.
The latest version, PHP 4, is faster and more powerful than its predecessors, while still being far easier to learn than Perl or JavaScript.
Many find PHP to be a faster and easier way to build Web applications than Perl or other programming languages.
Their comments about PHP being "much faster" and putting a lighter "load ... on the server" than Perl strike me as particularly funny.
But I lately have shifted to PHP because it does most things I want and is alot easier to keep straight than Perl.
It's not even signficantly faster than php apart from startup time (which doesn't matter in a mod_ or fastcgi situation).
All in all error handling in php is better then perl and worse then java.
Asking if Perl is slower or uses more resources that PHP is like asking if a Ford gets better gas mileage than a Toyota.
PHP saves you the fork() so it appears to run faster than perl, but, I've seen perl CGI scripts actually run faster then PHP, because they were written with speed in mind.
So I have my faults, but that doesn't make PHP superior to Perl.

The build quality is vastly superior to the Audi A6 that it replaced; the ride, even on 18 inch wheels, is much better than the Audi on 16 inch wheels!

Ultimately, the choice between Audi and Mercedes-Benz may depend on personal preferences, priorities, and the specific models being compared. It's important to consider factors such as performance, practicality, luxury features, and build quality when making a decision.

In October, IBM introduced a new range of POWER systems Â capable of handling massive amounts of computational data faster at nearly 20 percent better price/performance than comparable Intel Xeon v3 processor-based systems, delivering to clients a superior alternative to closed, commodity-based data center servers.
The current Powerpc (IBM 970)architecture is far superior to Intel.
GloFo has the brain power of IBM research behind it, superior to anything Intel.
If IBM ever decide that they're better off with Intel or anything else, they'd drop POWER quicker than you can blink.
IBM creates more technology (and better) than Intel.
IBM will ALWAYS be a better chipmaker than Intel.
In semiconductors, for example, Jones says IBM is "bringing their technology to market faster than the competition-faster than Intel, faster than Motorola, faster than Texas Instruments, faster than Fujitsu."
Guys like you would tell me how Apple's IBM chips were superior to Intel chips, nice to see that you have moved on.
Latest IBM POWER7 servers is 10% faster than Intel Westmere-EX and costs only 3x more.
Regional Water Company realized 7x better cost/performance for virtualized Java, and 2x faster data warehouse performance and order-entry transactions than IBM running Oracle Solaris, Database, Applications and Middleware on SPARC T5 servers with Oracle VM for SPARC versus competitive systems.
The economy of scale is better for IBM than it would have been with Alpha.
So, Oracle releases some cluster code which will allow RAC to work better and IBM releases some cluster code which will make WebSphere work better.

IBM has no magic fairy dust to do (much) better than Intel in a smaller die with worse process tech.

Fact is that Intel/AMD processors ARE FASTER than IBM PPC970.
The speed advantage of PC over MAC was not that Intel/AMD were so much faster than IBM G4, then G5, but the OS and drivers are much finer tuned.
Intel chips are cheaper and faster than what Apple was getting from IBM.
Intel Pentium processors are typically faster than IBM PowerPC chips in desktop applications; .

Overall, the comparison between IBM and Intel depends on what specific technology or application is being discussed. It's important to consider various factors, such as performance, cost, and reliability, before making a decision.

input:
Summarize: The actual pasta dough is even simpler than my basic bread dough, and even easier to pull together.
Pasta is way easier to make than bread.
Even regular pasta is easier on your blood sugar than starches such as white bread and potatoes.
My dietitian said that pasta is a better carbohydrate than bread and she prefers me to have some pasta instead.
Whole wheat pasta and breads are off course better than refined pastas and white bread.
i agree that pasta soup does taste better than bread... hopefully your boyboy could recover asap... .
Pasta is a little better than bread, but all wheat is best avoided, even organic whole wheat products.
Hand made pasta IS better than anything else, as is home baked bread that you knead by hand.
I cook a lot anyway and so using alternative grains and brown rice pasta is easier than making bread all the time.
I just made shrimp fra diavolo with the fettuccine and my family loved it and we agree it taste as good if not better than regular pasta.
For me, bread or potato is far superior to pasta.
Durum semolina (from semola meaning grainy) is golden yellow and a finer grind of semolina than that used to make dried pasta.
The dough is less elastic than bread doughs, but this makes it easier to roll into pasta shapes.
I've been dying to try sourdough bread, and what better excuse than to make it for pasta!
Dough that is made with it is less elastic than bread dough which makes it easier to roll into pasta shapes.
And everything I've heard about the superior, rougher surface texture of hand-stretched pasta versus machine-rolled is true!
Once again, the travel and hassle is worth it to Michele because they do such a superior job turning the flour into pasta.
Although durum wheat is less salt tolerant than bread wheat it attracts a premium price because of its superior pasta making qualities.
Here, the choices number about 50, including pizza, soups and bread, but I need something with a quicker pulse than ordinary lettuce, vegetables, chopped deli meats and cheeses, pasta salads and pudding.
It's a lot easier to eat whole grains these days than it was not all that many years ago, with products like whole-grain pasta and white whole wheat flour readily available and affordable.
output:
Pasta and bread are two popular staples in the Western diet, but they have some differences in terms of nutrition, ease of preparation, and taste.

Some argue that pasta is easier to make than bread and has a simpler dough, which makes it easier to roll into different shapes. Others argue that pasta is a better carbohydrate than bread for blood sugar, and certain types of pasta (like whole wheat) are better for health than refined pasta and white bread. Additionally, some argue that hand-made pasta has a superior texture and taste to machine-made pasta.

On the other hand, some prefer bread over pasta, citing taste preferences, or due to ease of making non-wheat-based grain choices. Additionally, some argue that durum wheat, which is used to make pasta, is less salt-tolerant than the bread wheat, and that wheat products should be avoided altogether. 

Ultimately, the choice between bread and pasta is a matter of personal preference, taste, and nutrition. It's important to choose whole-grain options when possible and make sure to balance your carbohydrate intake with other healthy foods.

Pasta and bread are both staple foods made from wheat and other grains, but they have significant differences.

Some argue that pasta is easier to make than bread, and that it is easier to roll into shapes, with a simpler dough. Others argue that bread or potatoes are superior to pasta for taste, or that wheat, in general, may be best avoided.

Summarize: Not only are Stanford, UCLA, Washington, and Oregon academically superior to Notre Dame, Virginia Tech, Texas, and Auburn based on polls by every single college ranking system available, they also have superior athletic programs to boot.
But holding off an Oregon onslaught is easier said than done, and it wasn't long before Virginia became the Ducks' latest victim.
Dennis Dixon, Oregon The West Coast's version of Pat White, except he's a better passer than the West Virginia star.
If you factor in population densities, then Virginia being slower than California and Oregon may likely be due to more saturation because it's covering the entire Eastern US.
Because ORS 20.096, designed to protect consumers like the cardholder in this case, is a fundamental policy, and because the cardholder resides in Oregon, Oregon has a greater interest than Virginia in applying its law.
Nonstop service from Oregon to the greater Washington, D.C., area is limited to a single daily flight into Dulles International Airport, located in Virginia more than 25 miles from downtown D.C. .
According to a study published in the journal Psychological Science, people who live in physically active states-like Colorado, Alaska, and Oregon-turned out in greater numbers during the 2004 election than those who live in less active ones-like Mississippi, West Virginia, and Tennessee.
Running an offense that looked faster than ever, Oregon torched the lowly Nicholls State Colonels by a score of 66-3 and did just what they needed to in their 2013 opener.
The Big East gets the nod over the Pac-10 because its top four teams -- West Virginia, Louisville, Rutgers, South Florida -- are collectively better than USC, Cal, UCLA, and Oregon.
This is the second straight year Virginia is hosting a ranked Pac-12 team at Scott Stadium - they'll hope for better results than last year's 59-10 loss to Oregon.
Or maybe you are jealous that West Virginia is scoring at a better rate than Oregon recently to the tune of scoring at least 69 points in 3 of their last 5 games.
I gave K State a slight edge because of its performance away from home: The Wildcats' road resume includes wins over Oklahoma, TCU and West Virginia- a better combination than Oregon and Notre Dame can offer.
I've already got 17 very worthy hosts for 16 spots - either Fullerton, Arizona, Stanford, Virginia or A&M is going to have to be on the road, and all those teams have better resumes than Oregon State.
His coaching clinics-held at such far-flung locales as the College of William & Mary in Williamsburg, Virginia; Superior State Teachers College in northern Wisconsin; and Oregon Agricultural College in Corvallis-were legendary gatherings in which the famous coach shared his knowledge and methods.

Overall, it is difficult to determine which state is better as opinions on what is important can vary. It is important to consider personal preferences and factors such as population density, academic institutions, athletic programs, voting patterns, and state laws.

input:
Summarize: Bash scripting is more easier then python :) .
For 2nd, bash was nearly 2 times faster than python.
For 1st, bash was nearly 3 times faster than python.
Bash : sometimes it's easier to write a script in bash rather than in python.
running BASH scripts is slightly lighter than running Perl/Python/whatever scripts on top of BASH.
I would find using Python to do that much harder than using BASH.
I use the Bourne shell for portability, Bash for its greater power than sh (arrays, etc.), ksh when Bash is not available and Python when I need speed and greater power than Bash.
Anything more than a few lines of Bash could be done better in Python.
As my python script seems to be slower than a bash script I want to try a ghc executable now.
If you already have a bash script (or find one via the Google), changing it is usually simpler than porting it to Python.
perl/python/php can be used for automating tasks and in many cases are better suited than bash for more complicated tasks .
Python is faster than bash usually, so I think I'll just adjust it.
Since Python supports objects it's easier to write complex scripts than with Bash.
Taken together with Python's robust and efficient syntax (and excellent regex implementation), these libraries are so much nicer to work with than either bash or java for writing utilities that manipulate files and their contents.
A simple Python script is likely to be faster than anything you can do in bash.
Python is about 80% faster than bash because it is byte compiled while base is interperated.
Python, Ruby and even PHP handle this sort of thing much better than Bash.
Sure it's a couple more lines in this case, but in other cases, python's abilities make it simpler than bash.
Python has good XML parsers, so portage could parse it on its own, probably faster than parsing BASH strings.
I find Python easier to program in than Bash; you don't have to deal with hordes of escaping scenarios, for one.
output:
Bash and Python are both popular scripting languages that are often used for automation and other tasks. 

Some users argue that Bash is easier to write and faster than Python, and that it's sometimes easier to write a script in Bash than in Python. Others argue that Python is faster than Bash and easier to write complex scripts in due to its support for objects. Moreover, libraries in Python are often considered more pleasant to work with than those in Bash or Java. 

There are also arguments that while Bash may be simpler for small scripts, anything beyond a few lines could be done better in Python, and that other languages like Perl, Ruby, or PHP are better suited for more complicated tasks. Some users report that Python scripts are faster than Bash scripts. 

Ultimately, the choice of language depends on the specific use case and the programmer's experience and preferences. Some users prefer Bash for its portability and power, while others find Python easier to work with due to its syntax and excellent regex implementation.

Scala is often praised for its superior design and better performance compared to Java, while others expect Scala to perform at least as well as Java. Some also claim that Scala code is quicker to write, easier to read, and less error-prone than Java. Additionally, Scala has rich semantics that can make coding easier and faster. 

However, some argue that Scala enums are inferior to Java enums and incompatible, and Java is often simpler from a tooling/debugging perspective. Others find Java code easier to understand due to its simpler syntax, while some consider Clojure persistent data structures slightly slower than its Java counterparts. 

Ultimately, the choice between Java and Scala may depend on personal preferences and needs, such as the desire for greater simplicity, better interopability with Java, and better support for specific tools (such as Grails).

Overall, the competition between Google and Microsoft is ongoing and dependent on personal needs and priorities. Each company has strengths and weaknesses, and users should consider which aspects are most important before making a decision.

The key observation was this: Client-side computation in JavaScript, while an order of magnitude slower than server-side computation in Perl, was still much faster than the network latency incurred during AJAX roundÂ trips.
Perl is a MUCH better choice for system administration than Javascript.
On equal footing JavaScript will almost always be slower than PERL - JavaScript carries a lot of baggage and is not as optimized for RegEx's as Perl is.
Stylistically I like Perl better than Javascript, but that's a personal preference.
We're not trying to make Perl a better language than C++, or Python, or Java, or JavaScript.
I only skimmed it once out of interest, but there's no chance that it will be faster than writing your validation functions in Perl.
There are plenty of other decent script engines and embedding perl or python is no harder than javascript, and people want to use these too.
Yeah, that explains why Python 2.x is so much worse than Python 1.x and Perl 5 is so much worse than 4 and why the new versions of C, C++, C# and Java never caught on... Oh, wait.
In Larry Wall's words : "We're not trying to make Perl a better language than C++, or Python, or Java, or JavaScript.
Javascript / node.js - Faster execution than perl, and much easier to write async code.
A native-code compiler is available, and according to numerical benchmarks , it makes Erlang programs faster than Ruby, Perl, and PHP, albeit slower than Java and JavaScript.
This is much nicer than firing off a new Perl process with the do shell script AppleScript extension, because the startup time is much faster and thus the latency is nearly eliminated.
JavaScript will likely have a greater impact on the use of CGI/Perl than Java.
JavaScript event handlers are executed faster than the Perl ones, due to the architecture (see below).
The notable exception is the V8 JavaScript version, which manages almost 10x faster than Perl on one core.
But I'm not convinced it works in javascript any better than it works in Perl.
(As for the Reddit commenter's claims that Perl is significantly slower than Python, Ruby, and JavaScript, I have some serious doubts.)
sooner they focus on perl6 development other than javascript, lua, ruby etc, faster we can enjoy the brand new perl.
Python has some great modules and handles "objects" better than Perl, but you can't take your code with you everywhere.
output:
Perl and JavaScript are two popular programming languages with different strengths and weaknesses. 

Perl is considered a better choice for system administration and is generally faster than JavaScript. It is also considered by some to have better RegEx optimization, and has a programming style that some people prefer. On the other hand, some users argue that JavaScript is easier to write async code in and that its event handlers are executed faster. 

There are also arguments that compare Perl and JavaScript to other programming languages, such as C++, Python, Java, and Ruby. Larry Wall has stated that Perl is not trying to be better than any of these languages. Some comparisons state that Perl programs are faster than Ruby, PHP, and Python, but slower than Java and JavaScript with a native-code compiler. However, there are doubts about claims that Perl is significantly slower than other languages. 

Overall, the choice of which language to use may depend on the specific tasks and preferences of the programmer. Both languages have their own strengths and weaknesses, and both have dedicated user communities.

input:
Summarize: Milk is better than beer!
This beer drinks as smooth, if not smoother, than mother's milk.
Not smacking with flavor, but does show off some nicer milk chocolate notes than would, say, an Irish Dry.
The carbonation is worse than a bowl of Rice Krispies with milk being added.
Though chugging milk and running also doesn't sound any better than chugging beer.
Actually, no, it's just that milk is better with cookies than beer is.
I didn't expect the coconut milk to lather as well or better than beer!
I am sorry to disagree but beer is not better for you than milk.
Up there with - if not better than - Left Hand's Milk Stout.
Not bad for this style and much better than the milk/lacto stout they make.
Had a light nutty smell, the taste was much lighter and smoother than it looks, slight coffee taste, heavy milk taste.
Add sugar to the mix (in this case, chocolate) and protein is digested even faster, meaning your muscles bounce back-bigger and stronger than ever-even more quickly than after drinking regular milk.
Drinks slightly lighter than a milk stout.
Mouthfeel: Smoother than a glass of chocolate milk.
Beer was cheaper than tea or coffee and safer than water or milk.
They slide down the throat quicker than mother's milk.
The human organism absorbs beer four times faster than milk.
Looks lighter in color than most stouts, even milk stouts.
Better than the nitro milk stout.
Lighter than a Milk Stout but as flavorful as it.
output:
Milk and beer are both popular beverages with different tastes and characteristics. 

Some argue that milk is better than beer, while others perceive beer as smoother and tastier than milk. Beer is also noted for its cheaper price compared to tea or coffee and its safety compared to water or milk. 

In terms of taste, some beer variants show off nicer milk chocolate notes, and some milk stouts have a heavy and smooth milk taste. Moreover, adding sugar to chocolate beer accelerates protein digestion, providing a quick muscle recovery benefit. Beer also has a faster absorption rate than milk in the human body.

On the other hand, some arguments criticize the carbonation level of beer, and others find it worse than a bowl of rice krispies. Coconut milk is also praised for its lathering ability. Milk stouts are noted for their slightly lighter and smoother texture than regular stouts. 

Ultimately, the choice between milk and beer depends on personal preference and the occasion. While milk might be more suitable for cookies or as a protein supplement, some people might prefer beer for its taste and enjoyment.

input:
Summarize: Painful though it is for a disciple of Bacchus to say so, sweet, natural, untreated Virginian cider is incomparably superior to its alcoholic cousin, and better by far than the pasteurised, clarified "apple juice" that you can find on the supermarket shelf.
We've been told that our cider pressing fabric cleans easier and strains juice faster than other commercial-grade cider pressing fabrics on the market.
I like apple cider better than apple juice - yum.
This authentic cider flavor, while being an acquired taste, is superior to the sweeter flavor of cider made from apple juice, which is very common in America.
In other words hard cider was safer to drink than apple juice, and milk was more dangerous than beer.
I think cider tastes much better than juice and would be my choice for making hard cider or cyser.
Apple cider vinegar will taste better then white, but lemon juice is the best tasting.
Too much poutine tends to bind me up too, but I find unpasteurized apple cider works much faster than apple juice.
And when the hunt is over, there is no better breakfast than a "ham biscuit", made with ham cooked in apple cider.
Now... It won't make it into Cider apple cider - but it will make it a huge step better than what you get from grocery store juice.
"The cans cool down faster than bottles, and the colder, the better, with a refreshing cider," Doughty says.
I concur that Mott's juice is superior when making cider.
Juice is filtered much better than cider and has asorbic acid added.
Reduce the apple cider: Place the apple cider (spiced or not spiced, but cider is better than apple juice) in a medium saucepan over high heat.
I have found that the juice batches do clear quicker than the ones made from cider and are ready to drink sooner.
(By the way, white vinegar or lemon juice is better for oily hair than apple cider vinegar.
Showering was experimenting with fermenting fruits and found that pear juice (perry) worked better than apples (cider).
He will provide juice that he believes can make superior hard cider - and he's leaving the cider making to them, the experts.
If you prefer apple juice better than eating the whole apple, go with organic cider that is unfiltered.
The apple juice turned out better then the cider by a long shot, but that was to my taste.
output:
Cider and juice are both made from apples but have some differences in flavor, safety, and production.

Some argue that sweet, natural, untreated Virginian cider is incomparably superior to its alcoholic cousin and better than pasteurized, clarified "apple juice". Cider also has a more authentic flavor compared to cider made from apple juice. Others prefer juice and find that it clears faster and is ready to drink sooner than cider. 

In terms of safety, hard cider was safer to drink in the past compared to apple juice, which was more likely to cause health issues. 

When it comes to production, cider may be easier to press due to fabrics that clean easier and strains juice faster. Some also prefer the taste of cider and choose to make hard cider from it. However, juice may be filtered better and have ascorbic acid added.

Ultimately, the choice between cider and juice may depend on personal preferences. Some enjoy cider for breakfast with ham or as a refreshing drink when cold, while others find that juice turns out better for certain recipes or when preferring organic options.

Cider production is also considered less difficult than that of cider juice. Some argue that Toyota interiors are nicer and more ergonomic than Honda, while others say that Honda has better logic and responsiveness in their transmissions. Furthermore, some argue that the Toyota Camry is softer, simpler, and requires a lighter touch than the Honda Accord.

On the other hand, Honda is praised for having more fuel-efficient and enjoyable-to-drive vehicles, as well as having better-equipped small cars compared to Toyota. However, both Toyota and Honda have cars with similar performance, such as the CX- being only slightly faster than the Toyota and Honda, and the V Honda Accord having a similar - time to the six-cylinder BMW Xi and GX. 

Ultimately, the choice between Toyota and Honda depends on personal preferences and needs. It's essential to research and compare different models to find the one that fits your lifestyle and budget.

I think that was the much harder issue in terms of people being unavailable than the holiday weekend.
What an amazing holiday we all had staying in the Chalet du Bois in Morzine ... better than our wedding day.
I remember watching The Shining at least 7 times on TV during that holiday - much better than any royal wedding.
To celebrate your wedding solely in the company of your chosen guests - No better place there is than the award winning Almond Holiday Village.
There's no better way to start the Thanksgiving holiday than with these beautiful images from Tonya Peterson Photography - a huge thank you to Michelle for sharing this gorgeous shoot with us!
And we have to admit we can't think of a better Halloween party than the reception of a couple who is cool enough to get married on this super fun holiday.
Believe it or not it actually works out better/cheaper for us to have a 2 week holiday and buy my dress in Florida than it does to buy it at home!

"It saves money and the smaller inserts are easier to store than huge doormats for every holiday."

Some argue that holidays are a great way to spend time with loved ones and relax, and that expert local holiday advisors can help plan the perfect vacation. On the other hand, there are those who argue that weddings make better family holidays than other events like birthdays.

Ultimately, the decision of whether to prioritize a holiday or a wedding depends on personal preferences and values. Both can be enjoyable events filled with laughter, love, and special memories.

Holidays and weddings are both special events that bring people together, but they have their differences and unique characteristics. 

Some argue that holidays are a great way to relax and refresh, and there's no better way to arrange your holiday than to have a chat with one of the expert local holiday advisors. Others may argue that weddings are a more significant and emotional event that brings together families and friends and creates memories for a lifetime.

Some people claim that certain holiday activities, such as watching movies or going to Halloween parties, are more enjoyable than attending a royal wedding, while others may argue that there is no better place to celebrate your wedding than in a beautiful holiday destination. 

The costs associated with holidays and weddings may also vary, and some may argue that it's more cost-effective to have smaller weddings, especially during the holiday season when everyone's hearts are already filled with love and cheer.

Overall, holidays and weddings both have their unique value and significance, and the choice between the two may depend on personal preferences and individual circumstances.

Ultimately, the choice between steel and aluminum depends on the specific application and usage. Each material offers unique advantages and disadvantages, and it's up to each individual to weigh them accordingly.

People keep making the claim that lacrosse is safer than football or hockey and I just can't get behind those sentiments.

But hockey is an infinitely faster game than lacrosse.
The puck moves faster, but it is actually less accurate than a lacrosse ball. "

Lacrosse is also noted for its cradling technique, which is considered easier than controlling the puck in hockey. Additionally, some argue that lacrosse shots can be faster than hockey slapshots and are fired from closer range. 

However, others believe that hockey is faster and more accurate than lacrosse. Hockey is also considered safer than some other sports, including speed skiing and race car driving. 

Overall, it's important to recognize that both sports have their own unique strengths and appeal to different individuals. Some people may prefer the physicality and speed of hockey, while others may enjoy the technique and finesse required in lacrosse.

input:
Summarize: Also, in some specific scenarios MySQL/MariaDB are faster and scale better than PostgreSQL.
"For years, the common industry perception has been that MySQL is faster and easier to use than PostgreSQL.
For years, the common industry perception has been that MySQL is faster and easier to use than PostgreSQL.
Mysql took an early lead in the Linux web hosting world about 10 years ago when in was the standard RDBSM installed, probably because it was easier to use, easier to install and faster than postgresql.
Both of them them were slower than MySQL ISAM but faster than Oracle.
-SQL Server is significantly superior to MySQL, faster than PostgreSQL, and for most businesses is cheaper than Oracle.
This publication shows that a properly tuned PostgreSQL is not only as fast or faster than MySQL ( 720.56 SPECjAppServer2004 JOPS@Standard ), but almost as fast as Oracle (since the hardware platforms are different, it's hard to compare directly).
MysQL is easier to use than PostgreSQL, yet it is a thousand times worse.
While it is true that count( ) is slower in postgres compared to mysql, there is a reason for that and a workaround.
MySQL is generally faster than PostgreSQL.
Converting from PostgreSQL to Oracle has always seemed much easier and smoother, but PostgreSQL isn't as popular as MySQL because it hasn't been as easy to throw hardware at problems with scaling PostgreSQL, whereas MySQL has always made that option easier.
Besides, PostgreSQL is better and faster than MySQL, and easier to set up and maintain as well (now there is a statement just asking for trouble ) .
PostgreSQL has a much nicer set of drivers and supports both standard ANSI-SQL and extended features, in many cases better than MySQL.
This is mostly because Postgres is a little better with joins and subqueries, has a great explain analyze, has fewer quirks, provides nicer error messages and has a better command line than MySQL .
PostgreSQL and it's lighter sibling FirebirdSQL are far superior to MySQL which was always considered a "dinky" database due to the fact it did not support referential integrity.
PostgreSQL is better than MySQL, OpenBSD is more secure than Linux, etc.
I agree, PostGreSql is much superior to MySql.
With the rise of PHP the friendlier MySQL platform was adopted much faster than the stricter, rules-based Postgres platform.
PostgreSQL has better clustering support than mysql so easier to support larger environments.
To now hear you brag that you've never looked back at a superior and faster database because of your steadfast and likely false belief that MySQL is faster, is rather amusing.
output:
MySQL and PostgreSQL are both popular open-source relational database management systems (RDBMS) that have their own advantages and disadvantages.

Some argue that MySQL is faster and easier to use than PostgreSQL, and it scales better in specific scenarios. However, others argue that PostgreSQL is better and faster, and it has better support for clustering.

There are also arguments that suggest both platforms have their own strengths and weaknesses. For example, some users claim that PostgreSQL has a nicer command line interface, better joins and subqueries, and provides nicer error messages, while MySQL is more "friendlier" and easier to install. 

It's worth noting that the performance of both systems heavily depends on how well they are tuned and optimized, as well as the specific use case. Some benchmark tests have shown that a properly tuned PostgreSQL can be as fast or faster than MySQL and almost as fast as Oracle.

Overall, the choice between MySQL and PostgreSQL depends on the specific needs and priorities of the user. It may be worth considering both options and doing research on different tools and features to make an informed decision.

PostgreSQL has a much nicer set of drivers and supports both standard ANSI-SQL and extended features, in many cases better than MySQL.
This is mostly because Postgres is a little better with joins and subqueries, has a great explain analyze, has fewer quirks, provides nicer error messages and has a better command line than MySQL .
PostgreSQL and it's lighter sibling FirebirdSQL are far superior to MySQL which was always considered a "dinky" database due to the fact it did not support referential integrity.
PostgreSQL is better than MySQL, OpenBSD is more secure than Linux, etc.
I agree, PostGreSql is much superior to MySql.
With the rise of PHP the friendlier MySQL platform was adopted much faster than the stricter, rules-based Postgres platform.
PostgreSQL has better clustering support than mysql so easier to support larger environments.
To now hear you brag that you've never looked back at a superior and faster database because of your steadfast and likely false belief that MySQL is faster, is rather amusing.
output:
MySQL and PostgreSQL are both popular Relational Database Management Systems (RDBMS) used for storing and managing data. 

Some argue that MySQL is generally faster and easier to use than PostgreSQL, and it scales better in some specific scenarios. However, others claim that PostgreSQL is better and faster than MySQL, and easier to set up and maintain, with better clustering support. 

Furthermore, some argue that a properly tuned PostgreSQL can be just as fast or even faster than MySQL. PostgreSQL is also noted for its nice set of drivers and better support for standard ANSI-SQL and extended features. It is also said to be better with joins and subqueries, provide nicer error messages, and have a better command line than MySQL.

Some users also prefer PostgreSQL because it supports referential integrity, has fewer quirks, and provides better performance in some cases. However, others feel that PostgreSQL is more complex and harder to use than MySQL, which has a friendlier platform and wider adoption because of PHP.

Ultimately, the choice between MySQL and PostgreSQL depends on your specific needs and preferences. It's a good idea to do your own research and testing to see which RDBMS better serves your needs.

Your Halloween shipments have a greater than 20percent chance of being returned in time for Thanksgiving.

Look for part two of Brien Posey's column on why Windows Vista is a better operating system than Windows XP.
The ability to tightly control PC settings and configurations, the improved security architecture, the ability to reduce the number of images created and maintained, and the self-healing properties all combine to make the work of managing Windows Vista PCs better and easier than Windows XP.
In spite of the nearly global backlash against Windows Vista, though, I personally think that Vista is a better operating system than Windows XP.
