input:
Summarize: I can't think of a better way to show the boys how great real food tastes than through a breakfast sandwich, especially a from-scratch one.
This filling and satisfying egg sandwich is so good you will never believe you are eating something better for you than a sausage and egg biscuit.
Chicken sandwich and boneless buffalo wings at the Original Hooters in Clearwater, much better then a ballgame, tonights gonna be sausage sandwiches with peppers and onions prepared in homemade spagetti sauce.
If you're making a breakfast run ,Â your best bet is an English muffin sandwich with an egg (better yet, an egg-white patty) and Canadian bacon or ham, which have less fat than sausage or traditional bacon.
Though the menu is limited, the egg sandwich-Berkshire ham, Emmentaler cheese and fried egg on a Balthazar bun ($6)-is a superior breed; and the sausage-enriched red beans on toast ($7) are the perfect hangover restorative.
I am not sure how a home made fresh muffin could be dry or how Cumberland Farms rubbery microwaved breakfast sandwich could be better than a home made english muffin with fresh farm raised eggs and fresh Vermont Smoke & Cure Bacon or Sausage.
So much better than a sandwich.
The taste and aroma are so satisfying and superior to any Sujuk sandwich in Bourj Hamoud.
After a nice lunch (the sausage and mash was nicer than the usual sandwich!)
Flatbreads are thick enough to slice through and better tasting than the sandwich thins that are currently flooding the market.
However, it still cooks pretty well so far (sausage came out great), clean up is easy, and it is definitely a better sandwich grill than my old sandwich grill.
I really should have not finished off that day with eggs/sausage but was ravenous and figured it was better than a sandwich.
Tina and Greg both think that the sausage plate, with two large sausages and fries is even better than the sandwich, though I like me my carbs: .
The fact that the McGriddle's sausage is so much better tasting, combined with the more pronounced sweet-salty flavor makes it much more appealing than Dunkin' Donuts' waffle sandwich.
output:
Sandwiches and sausages are two different types of food that can be filling and satisfying, depending on personal tastes and preferences.

Some argue that sandwiches, specifically breakfast sandwiches, are a great way to show how real food can taste and can be healthier than some sausage-based options. Sandwiches can also be made from scratch, using ingredients like farm-raised eggs, bacon, and ham. Others prefer sausages, claiming that they are a superior breed of food and tastier than some sandwich options. Sausages can also be part of traditional dishes like sausage sandwiches with peppers and onions in homemade spaghetti sauce. 

Ultimately, whether you prefer sandwiches or sausages depends on personal taste and dietary preferences, such as looking for healthier options or fewer carbs. It's also worth considering the quality of the ingredients used and your own cooking skills.

Others enjoy various types of sausage sandwiches, such as those with peppers and onions prepared in homemade spaghetti sauce or sausage plates with fries. 

Ultimately, the choice between sandwiches and sausages depends on personal preferences and dietary restrictions. Some recommend sandwiches with lower fat content, such as those with Canadian bacon or ham, over those with traditional bacon or sausage. Others point out that flatbreads can be a tasty alternative to sandwich thins.

input:
Summarize: I can't think of a better way to show the boys how great real food tastes than through a breakfast sandwich, especially a from-scratch one.
This filling and satisfying egg sandwich is so good you will never believe you are eating something better for you than a sausage and egg biscuit.
Chicken sandwich and boneless buffalo wings at the Original Hooters in Clearwater, much better then a ballgame, tonights gonna be sausage sandwiches with peppers and onions prepared in homemade spagetti sauce.
If you're making a breakfast run ,Â your best bet is an English muffin sandwich with an egg (better yet, an egg-white patty) and Canadian bacon or ham, which have less fat than sausage or traditional bacon.
Though the menu is limited, the egg sandwich-Berkshire ham, Emmentaler cheese and fried egg on a Balthazar bun ($6)-is a superior breed; and the sausage-enriched red beans on toast ($7) are the perfect hangover restorative.
I am not sure how a home made fresh muffin could be dry or how Cumberland Farms rubbery microwaved breakfast sandwich could be better than a home made english muffin with fresh farm raised eggs and fresh Vermont Smoke & Cure Bacon or Sausage.
So much better than a sandwich.
The taste and aroma are so satisfying and superior to any Sujuk sandwich in Bourj Hamoud.
After a nice lunch (the sausage and mash was nicer than the usual sandwich!)
Flatbreads are thick enough to slice through and better tasting than the sandwich thins that are currently flooding the market.
However, it still cooks pretty well so far (sausage came out great), clean up is easy, and it is definitely a better sandwich grill than my old sandwich grill.
I really should have not finished off that day with eggs/sausage but was ravenous and figured it was better than a sandwich.
Tina and Greg both think that the sausage plate, with two large sausages and fries is even better than the sandwich, though I like me my carbs: .
The fact that the McGriddle's sausage is so much better tasting, combined with the more pronounced sweet-salty flavor makes it much more appealing than Dunkin' Donuts' waffle sandwich.
output:
Sandwiches and sausages are both popular food items, but they have differences in taste and health benefits.

Some arguments highlight the superiority of sandwiches, particularly breakfast sandwiches made from scratch and sandwiches with lower fat content than sausages. Others argue that sausages have a better taste and aroma than sandwich fillings. Some also mention that sausage and mash can be a nicer lunch than a sandwich.

On the other hand, some argue that sausages can be more filling and satisfying than sandwiches. Some also prefer sausages in certain dishes like sausage sandwiches with peppers and onions and McGriddle's sausage in fast food sandwiches.

Overall, the preference for sandwiches or sausages may depend on personal taste, health concerns, and the context of the meal.

Toshiba may be inferior to Asus, Dell, HP, Samsung and Sony, but surely is superior to Acer.
When asked why the PS4 is so physically superior to the Xbox One, the simple answer is: Sony is better than Microsoft at designing hardware.
Microsoft is inferior to Sony in terms of gaming.
Sony is better than Microsoft at designing hardware" .

Microsoft has some great shooters, but really beyond that is inferior to Sony.
Sony was a bit smarter than Microsoft here.
Microsoft is much worse than Sony.
Now, hopefully Sony is smarter about it than Microsoft.
Microsoft is better & 2 times faster than Sony.

The fact is Microsoft has a much better (easier to use) SDK for games than Sony does.

I will say though, that I trust microsoft a lot better than sony, customer wise.

Overall, the choice between Sony and Microsoft may depend on personal preferences, priorities, and experiences. input:
Summarize: Anyway ... it's great to be carrying around a single device (the iPhone 5) that is thinner, faster, lighter, and all around way cooler than my LG EnV + iPod Touch combo.
The iPhone music interface is smoother and easier to navigate than the newer iPods, so I'm leaning strongly to the iPhone, or maybe the iPod touch, as my new music player.
Mage Gauntlet's iPhone is likely to perform better on the iPhone 4S with its faster processor than on the iPod touch.
The same could happen with this faster Wi-Fi in the Touch, and it wouldn't be the first time the Touch has had better hardware than the iPhone.
Other than that, the iPhone 6 is expected to pack in a faster processor and a better camera, as well as feature an all-new design for the iPhone that closely matches the rounded edges of the iPad Air, iPad mini, and iPod touch.
But it's starkly inferior to iPhone.
We suspect that the update in processor is just an evolution in the development of the product, but the slower processor could be more of a battery life factor on the iPhone.
In fact, the iPod Touch's processor is the only thing that's inferior to the iPhone 5.
The iphone 5 is already much superior to any ipod touch out there.
Of course the ipod touch is slower than the iPhone 5 and OF COURSE the ipod touch is slower than the iPhone 4S.
I feel it is easier, certainly lighter, and safer then taking the iPhone around in those settings.
And with it, a host of new features that promise to make it even better and faster than the iPhone 3G.
With the extortionate prices of the iPhone on AT&T, much greater than anywhere else in the world, there is no better time than now to get yourself a cheap iPod Classic.
Physically redesigned, the new model is lighter and feels thinner than before, sports a nicer chrome front bezel, and packs both an internal speaker and side-mounted volume control buttons, just like the iPhone.
The later iPod touch models had a newer chipset, slightly faster processor and an arguably superior DSP than the iPhone 1st Gen and 3G, and on that basis, the claim was made that audio playback sounded better on the iPod touches.
Apple iOS (for iPhones , iPads, iPod Touch) - Some argue that Apple's touch response is noticeably quicker and smoother than Android devices, and this has only improved for the iPhone 6 generation, which features sensors on the surface rather than beneath.
More importantly, iPhones and the iPod Touch have 480x320 resolutions, and six of the 19 producers using greater than 320x240 resolution produced at 16:9, which looked better on the iPhone/iPod Touch than 4:3 video.
Combined with the image signal processing in the A6, Schiller said this will allow better noise reduction; low-light performance; and faster photo capturing, which he said is 40 percent faster than in the iPhone 4S.
You can get a far better phone, with a touch-screen interface, a vastly superior camera and excellent media-playing capabilities, for hundreds of pounds less than the life-of-contract cost of an iPhone.
Soon, there will be an MP3 player far superior to the iPod; there will be faster laptops and cells phones and a much better iPhone.
output:
The iPhone and iPod are both products of Apple with similar features, but there are also notable differences.

Some argue that the iPhone is superior to the iPod in terms of speed, performance, touch response, camera quality, and design. Others point out that the iPod has some better hardware features such as a faster processor, superior audio playback, and a lower price point. Some also prefer the iPod for certain activities and settings, such as exercise, where the iPod may be safer and lighter to carry.

Ultimately, the choice between the iPhone and iPod depends on personal preferences and needs. While the iPhone is often praised for its advanced features and capabilities, some may prefer the simplicity and affordability of the iPod. It is also worth noting that new technologies and products are constantly emerging, and what is considered better or superior today may change tomorrow.

input:
Summarize: Deep dish pizza is not only NOT better than New York pizza - It's not pizza," said Stewart, calling it "tomato soup in a bread bowl.
Deep-dish pizza is not only not better than New York pizza - it's not pizza," said Stewart, calling it "tomato soup in a bread bowl.
Finally, what impressed me is the mushroom soup as it was much better than the ones served at Pizza Hut.
The pistou soup is warm and filling; the rubber chicken is easy to prepare, delicious, and frugal; and I have never made an easier or tastier pizza crust than the Kneadless Pizza Dough.
Instant mashed potato: invalid food soup/stew thickener base for fish cakes with a roasted chicken from the grocery store, better than pizza delivery .
The Daily Show's Jon Stewart recently ranted against a culinary signature of Chicago: "Deep dish pizza is not only not better than New York pizza - it's not pizza," said Stewart, calling it "tomato soup in a bread bowl."
Yeah, I get that it is processed and has high sodium/MSG, but nothing is perfect, and soup is a hell of a lot better than ordering pizza or eating Cheetos and panda express for dinner.
The soup was orders of magnitude better than any chain food ever invented, but I kept seeing the Spirit of Orange County Past streaming through its kitschy side door, looking in vain for a personal pan pizza.
We almost never complain but after the soup was served we complained about excessive salt and were told "OH sorry" we also shared a eggplant grinder which was slightly better than a typical Subway, should have had a beer and pizza I guess .
Even better, their smaller size makes them easier to eat than a full slice of bread covered with boiling soup.
the pizza looked better than it tasted, but the soup was so yummy!
Well, that sounds so much better than the soup it is not even funny!
There's five variations, ranging from peach cobbler to Oreo, and all of which make for a better dessert than soup.
After a tough day at work, beer and pizza often sound a lot better than soup and salad.
The spinach manicotti was superior and Wendy reports that the beef barley soup was fresh and obviously made in the restaurant and delicious, without a hint of MSG or excess salt.
However, I still got to fully exploit the marrow's taste by scooping it out onto a couple pieces of bread (and this was much easier to scoop out than Soup Tulang as these were big thick bones cut just right).
The slices do have a nice cheese to crust to sauce ratio, making them way better than bland, bloated crust pizzas from Yorkside (No hard feelings, I still love your avegolemono soup).
output:
Soup and pizza are two popular foods, each with their own fans and detractors. 

Some argue that soup is a better option than pizza as it can be a healthier and more comforting meal. Others argue that pizza is a great comfort food and a popular choice for a tasty meal. Bluetooth and USB are two popular ways of transferring data between devices, but they have differences in terms of speed, ease of use, and battery consumption.

Some argue that Bluetooth is better than USB because it offers better range and bandwidth. Moreover, it is considered easier to use than USB cable and does not require a USB port. Some also appreciate that USB does not drain the battery as fast as Bluetooth and syncing over WiFi, and it provides faster broadband connection speeds.

Ultimately, choosing between Bluetooth and USB depends on the specific needs and preferences of the user. Bluetooth may be a better option for short-range and low-bandwidth connections, while USB is better suited for faster and more reliable data transfers.

Ashpalt is better for wear and tear than concrete actually though, why some roads use concrete on high speed curves, better grips but harder on the rubber, .

Eco-Rubber absorbs impact so it is much safer than concrete or asphalt surfaces.

Light and comfortable, they broke in fast and seem to wear well, however, as a lighter rubber sole, they will wear faster on concrete and rough terrain than the old style.
The another one is the 'dillo's have a harder durometer rubber compound than many road tires do.
Special blades had to be developed because, surprisingly, rubber dulls tooling five times faster than grinding concrete.
The rubber has dried harder than concrete.
Concrete is always better than rubber when it rains .
Punching through concrete is considerably easier than punching through rubber, after all.

Searching for a malleable material, they ground up discarded tires and designed resilient rubber panels that are harder than a running track but softer than concrete or asphalt.

Rubber and concrete are two materials used in a variety of applications, and each has its own strengths and weaknesses.

Rubber is said to be safer, softer, and better-looking than concrete when used for flooring. Some also argue that rubber absorbs impact better and is safer than concrete or asphalt surfaces. Moreover, outdoor rubber tiles stay cooler in direct sunlight and are comfortable underfoot.

On the other hand, concrete is considered better for wear and tear, especially on high-speed curves, and is generally better for traction when it rains. Additionally, concrete is easier to punch through than rubber and can be used for applications that require higher durability and hardness. Some people also prefer concrete tee pads for disc golf and it is associated with lower prevalence of cow injuries than rubber mats.

Ultimately, the choice between rubber and concrete depends on the specific application and personal preferences. While rubber is softer and safer for certain flooring applications, concrete may be more durable for high-speed curves and more resistant to damage.

I think this beer tastes better than any juice I've ever had.
Apple juice for me is worse than drinking a beer & you know how alcohol makes you pea.
But to answer your question, beer specifically isn't any worse for your teeth than juice or soda.
Color is a dense opaque looking liquied for a fruit beer, and a touch lighter then the color of pomegranite juice.
Appears a fizzy light beer ultra pale lighter than apple juice golden straw color with a bright white vibrant head forming.
You want the bubbles in the ferment (not the airlock) to go no faster than half the rate of a glass of beer.
This beer, when properly made, in a warm room, is an exquisitely delightful beverage, containing no alcohol, and is to the connoisseur of temperate taste not inferior to the fermented juice of the vine.
Now that I think about it, the beer being distilled couldn't be any worse than the tomato juice being distilled.

It sucks juice faster than Andrew can drink beer.
When on MDMA, drink either cold water or fruit juice (it's nicer than swilling beer anyway...) .
In fact apple juice would be a better comparison than beer.

Drinking water, juice or sports drinks are better post-workout options to refuel than beer.

Cold apple juice after a hard run in the heat tastes better than any beer ever has.
Notice the carrot juice....better for you than beer but just doesn't seem to do it for me.
Things i've added....tomato juice and salt, v8 juice, Clamato Juice(probably is better then tomato)....hillbilly martini....beer with olives(big fat ones with garlic cloves shoved in 'em.
output:
Beer and juice are both popular beverages, but they have different characteristics and uses.

Some argue that beer tastes better than juice or that apple juice is worse than beer. Others argue that juice lacks nutrients and slows down the yeast in the fermentation process. Still, others argue that juice is a healthier alternative to beer, or a better-looking ingredient for brewing fruit beer.

In terms of production, some found cider to be easier to brew than beer, while others found beer brewing to be easier than making juice. 

When it comes to health, some discussions argue that beer is no worse than juice for teeth or that distilled juice and beer have similar effects. On the other hand, some prefer cold apple juice after a workout and find it more refreshing than beer.

Ultimately, choosing between beer and juice depends on personal preferences and needs. While beer is predominantly an alcoholic beverage, juice is associated with benefits such as vitamins and antioxidants, making it a popular option for health-conscious consumers.

Overall, the decision of which drink is better depends on personal preferences and situation. It's important to consider factors such as taste, nutritional content, and container safety when making a choice between soda and beer.

Timber and forest are closely related terms, but they are not the same thing. Forests are ecosystems where trees and other vegetation grow, while timber refers to the wood that is harvested from those trees. 

Some people argue that timber grown in certain areas is superior to that grown in other places. Timber interests often lobby for easier access to forest land for logging, and sales of timber from national forests can be appealed. However, excessive logging can cause depletion of wood inventories and have a negative impact on forest ecosystems. 

Moreover, the long-term economic value of forests is often greater than that of timber sales, due to factors such as biodiversity and soil erosion prevention. Older forests are often preserved and considered more valuable for their effects on wildlife and water quality. 

Overall, the relationship between timber and forest is a complex one with multiple factors to consider. The sustainable management of timber resources and forest ecosystems is crucial for the well-being of both the environment and the economy.

But even better, Swift is fundamentallyÂ simpler and easier to use than Objective-C, the language that developers currently have to use to build iOS and OS X apps.
Called Swift, it's meant to offer a faster, easier way to build software for Apple's products than its existing programming language, Objective-C.
In other words, iOS and OS X apps built with Swift should run even smoother and faster than counterparts made with the tried and true Objective-C.

output:
Swift and Objective-C are both programming languages used mainly for developing apps for Apple's products, but they have some differences and similarities. 

According to some sources, Swift is designed to be easier, faster, and safer than Objective-C. It offers a simpler and more interactive way to build software and apps that run smoother and faster. Furthermore, Swift has advanced features such as functional patterns, generics, and enumeration and collection features.

However, some argue that Objective-C is easier to learn than Swift, and some tests have shown that Objective-C performs better than Swift in certain tasks. Additionally, some find that Swift code samples are not significantly simpler than Objective-C.

Ultimately, the choice between Swift and Objective-C may depend on personal preferences, the requirements of the project, and the level of expertise of the developer. Both languages have their strengths and weaknesses, so it's important to consider them before making a decision.

Summarize: But I realized that the startup culture at MIT and Boston in general is not inferior to Stanford.
MIT seems to have a slightly greater pedigree than Stanford.
IMO MIT gives a better undergrad education than Stanford for Sciences and Engineering.
Already, my Berkeley and MIT essays feel better than my UCLA and Stanford ones.
MIT is often viewed as "inbreeding central": the chart though suggests that it is no worse than Stanford, and definitely not worse than CMU.
Years ago - and maybe it's true today - MIT had the reputation of having a better teaching environment than Harvard, Chicago, Stanford, etc.
First, from working on a wartime military project at MIT, Terman realised that the electrical engineering programmes there and elsewhere on the east coast of the USA were far superior to those of Stanford, and he sought to emulate them.
Physics I is Physics I for the most part (with the exception of MIT and Caltech), but doing research with a top flight researcher is easier as a Harvard/MIT/Stanford student than as a community college student transfering to a low tier school.
It seems to me that (on average) students who attended the University of Chicago, Swarthmore, Reed, MIT or schools like that end up with better educations than students who attended Princeton, Amherst, Williams, Stanford, etc. .
Here's Why Stanford Startups are Better Than MIT Startups .
Here's why Stanford startups are better than MIT startups.
Stanford has a much greater "normal person" component (athletes, dumb rich kids) than MIT.
Berkeley and Stanford are better than the first two, but I would still say MIT (with Lippard, Schrock, Cummins, etc.) is superior.
So it is well known that grading at Stanford or Harvard is easier than grading at MIT or Caltech.
I am not trying to use NRC ranking to prove that Stanford is better than MIT and Berkeley in EE.
The kind of entrepeneurial teaching at Stanford and UCSF is IMHO superior to MIT and Harvard, and it is a bonus to be so close to Silicon Valley.
We know Stanford is better at fundraising than schools like MIT, but there's obviously a lot more to it than that.
"Mr. Stanford does better than Mr. Mississippi State, but Ms. Mississippi State does just as well as Ms. MIT," said Fisman.
As to the economics of the exchange between Stanford and Podunk (how much can Stanford charge), that's a function of how many other providers there are offering the same product and whether the Stanford calc class is any better than the CalTech or MIT class.
output:
MIT and Stanford are both prestigious universities known for their excellence in science and engineering. 

Some argue that MIT has a better teaching environment, pedigree, and undergraduate education in sciences and engineering. Others claim that Stanford has a stronger startup culture, a more diverse student body, and better entrepreneurial teaching. Some also suggest that grading at MIT is more rigorous than at Stanford.

Ultimately, the choice between MIT and Stanford depends on the individual's preferences and goals. Both universities have their strengths and weaknesses, and a potential student should do their research to find out which one aligns better with their interests.

Overall, while Google and Intel have different strengths and expertise, the choice between them may depend on the user's specific needs and preferences.

Summarize: I'm surprised that it's about 15% slower than my laptop.
If I were traveling and could get wifi, it would be a great web browser, easier than pulling out a laptop and nicer than reading things on my iPhone.
It's worse than my laptop, and worse than my HTC Mogul.
It's hideously expensive and generally far inferior to a laptop but most importantly, I simply couldn't see decent reason you'd actually buy one.
My iPhone 3gs has worse battery life than my laptop.
Phones have less memory and they can be slower than your high-powered laptop.
The best smartphones, an Apple iPhone 4S and a Samsung Galaxy S2, ran HTML5 6x and 10x slower than the Mac laptop.
More convenient than my laptop, and way easier to see than my iphone.
To be fair, it doesn't sound any worse than standard laptop audio, but it really doesn't sound significantly BETTER, either (though it is louder than most of the machines I tested it with).
Safari on the iPhone is still a lot slower than any browser on a laptop.
But for all the talk I have heard about how the iPhone will make marketing WiMax easier (because WiMax networks are so much faster than 3G), the WiMax folks still need something cooler than a USB dongle for a laptop to generate true mobile-user excitement.
But from what I've heard, mobile broadband in its current state is not going to be any faster or more reliable than my iPhone, which is much lighter and easier to carry on trips than a laptop.
It's faster and runs smoother than my laptop, so although I was very much skeptical with this purchase, I am now quite happy and feel rather smug about it.
Only with AT&T I can A) Faster broadband for my laptop (EVDO is technologically slower than HSPA.
As a mobile media consuming device it'll be easier to watch than my iPhone 3gs and lighter than my Dell laptop.
Dragon NaturallySpeaking is certainly faster on the laptop than on the iPad.
We find the iPhone to be much easier to use than Android based smartphones and we are considering replacing our PC and laptop with a Mac Desktop, a MacBook Air and or an iPad tablet.
At least my iphone boots faster than my laptop .
It also works faster than my laptop.
The iPhone was lighter than carrying recording equipment and a laptop.
output:

Some people argue that laptops are faster and more powerful than iPhones, have better battery life, better audio quality, and larger screens. Others argue that iPhones are more convenient and easier to carry, as they are lighter and smaller than laptops. iPhones are also praised for their smooth performance, and some say that they work faster than laptops. 

Both devices have pros and cons that depend on the specific needs of the user. Laptops are suitable for more demanding tasks, such as running software and editing documents, while iPhones are more suitable for on-the-go browsing and media consumption. 

Ultimately, the choice between a laptop and an iPhone depends on your personal preferences and needs. It is also essential to consider the specific model and its features before making a decision.

People who play contact sports such as hockey or football are more likely to be injured than those who play tennis. Hockey has a solid puck that can maintain its integrity after impact, unlike a hollow tennis ball. 

On the other hand, some argue that tennis players can hit the ball faster than hockey players can shoot a puck. Additionally, some find tennis coverage better than hockey coverage, and the format of tennis seasons is sometimes compared favorably with polo compared to other popular sports. 

Ultimately, the choice of which sport is better depends on personal preferences and what people look for in a sport. Some athletes in individual sports such as tennis may experience a greater "Reduced Sense of Accomplishment" compared to team sports such as hockey, but this is a personal preference.

Eclipse PDT in version 3.6 is mooore quicker then Netbeans!

keep it up eclipse team... i hope eclipse continues running faster than netbeans... netbeans is really heavy .

Overall, opinions on which IDE is better are divided and depend on personal preferences and needs. Some users prefer NetBeans, while others prefer Eclipse. Some also consider other IDEs, such as IDEA, or mention performance improvements in competitors like PhpStorm.

input:
Summarize: Amazon has better implementation than Hulu, though.
On the plus side the Amazon video on demand service is far superior to Hulu and I downloaded 3 Harry Potter movies last week from Amazon.
So it looks to me like Amazon Prime is a better deal than Nook Tablet and Netflix (or Hulu Plus).
Unfortunately, Amazon Prime doesn't represent a better value than Netflix or Hulu Plus, both of which are available on other streamers.
Also, switching between Amazon Instant Videos is faster than moving between apps like Hulu Plus or Netflix - those take a few seconds to load up.
Watching it on Amazon is so much better than on TV or even Hulu because there are no commercials, the cost is nominal, and the quality is excellent.
Netflix's subscription streaming service, for examples, lacks most of the new movie releases that can be found for sale on iTunes and Amazon, though Netflix has greater depth of older titles than a site like Hulu.
Hulu+ is far superior to Amazon Prime tv.
Hulu Plus shows load much faster than Amazon Prime, but Hulu Plus is more likely to buffer content, but Hulu Plus seems to offer more HD content than Amazon Prime.
Packing much more than just screen mirroring as in Chromecast , the Android TV sounds better than the recently announced Amazon Fire TV .
the 3500kbps 720p hulu stream looks better then thr hd stream from amazon.
Hulu Plus seems to have a greater variety of available titles than Amazon Plus (free titles).
Hulu has a better video player and overall user experience than Amazon Prime and a lot more content than what Amazon is offering, so a buy could help.
Netflix and Hulu offer greater video selection than Amazon, though Amazon is spending hundreds of millions of dollars buying more content from Hollywood and TV studios.
So users will notice that Netflix or Hulu works better than Amazon Prime, which buffers repeatedly and is choppy.
There are numerous ways to watch TV and movies on your iPad -YouTube, Amazon Instant Video, Netflix-but if you want professional quality TV, there's no better option than Hulu (the Hulu Plus moniker has been retired).
Yeah, it's lightyears better than the boxes most cable operators willingly hand over to you, but TiVo has worked hard at both interface and expansion, mixing Netflix, Amazon VOD, Rhapsody and other services into its menu to make it that much more valuable.
output:
Amazon and Hulu are two video streaming services offering different features and user experiences. 

Amazon is praised for its better implementation, better selection of movies, and being a better deal than other services such as Nook Tablet and Netflix. It is also noted for its fast and efficient streaming without buffering and high-quality content without commercials. However, it is criticized for lacking value compared to competitors like Netflix and Hulu Plus and having a smaller selection of titles.

On the other hand, Hulu is praised for its better video player and user experience and having more titles than Amazon Plus. It is also noted for its fast loading of shows and more HD content. Additionally, Hulu is said to offer a greater variety of available titles and a greater depth of older titles than Netflix. 

Ultimately, the choice between Amazon and Hulu may depend on individual preferences or the content users are interested in streaming.

input:
Summarize: A motorcycle stops quicker than a car or truck.
In most traffic situations, a motorcycle will get you to your destination quicker than a car or truck.
Therefore the motorcycle will undergo a much greater change in its motion than the truck.
The Slik Stand motorcycle wheel chock system offers superior stability while hauling a motorcycle in a trailer or truck bed.
"And there was the time just last month when my teammate Finn Brannigan asserted his motorcycle was faster than my truck.
My motorcycle is 30 years old and is a million times easier to work on than my 9 year old truck.
The level of stamina and fitness required to race on a motorcycle is far greater than racing it in a truck.
The difference between motorcycle accidents and other accidents, unfortunately, is that motorcycles are much smaller and lighter than other vehicles, meaning that when a motorcycle is struck by a car or truck, the motorcycle rider almost always loses.
The harsh fact about motorcycle theft prevention is that your bike is far easier for thieves to steal than a car or truck.
many times the limits are set way too low- a motorcycle can stop much faster than a semi truck- identical, too low speed limits aren't logical.
Actually easier to install than my motorcycle cover!
All four top car and truck finishers completed the course quicker than the top motorcycle team.
I bought a 1978 Toyota Truck (20r 5spd RWD) for $500 as I was looking for something safer than a motorcycle during the winter.
I read later that because of the snow they had started earlier than usual, and some of the cooler items like an x-ray machine, turnstiles, and a motorcycle had already been loaded around 8 am.
Still, check at least twice before turning or pulling into intersections because, even with that headlight, a motorcycle can be harder to see than a car or truck.
The eventual ride was in the back of a pick-up truck, which was only slightly better than on the back of a motorcycle, I guess.
Winning not just the Trophy Truck category but also the Overall title, the first time a 4 wheel vehicle has been faster than a motorcycle since 1973 in a peninsula run to La Paz.
The driver got mad and followed me, the truck was faster than my motorcycle, he eventually came in contact and started pushing (didn't RAM, just started pushing) and my bike blew up a second later, died instantly.
output:
Motorcycles and trucks are two types of vehicles that serve different purposes, but both have their advantages and disadvantages.

Motorcycles are generally quicker in traffic and can stop faster than cars or trucks. However, they are also more vulnerable to accidents due to their smaller size and lighter weight. Bikes are easier to work on, but also easier to steal. They are used for racing, which requires high levels of stamina and fitness.

Trucks, on the other hand, offer superior stability when hauling motorcycles in a trailer or truck bed. They are larger and more visible on the road and can offer better protection in case of an accident. However, they are slower in traffic and can be harder to maneuver in tight spaces. Also, in some races, cars and trucks can complete the course quicker than motorcycles.

Ultimately, the choice between a motorcycle and a truck depends on personal needs and preferences, as well as considerations such as safety, speed, and convenience.

prototyping object based code quicker and easier than compiled languages such as Java .

Summarize: Mapping is finicky stuff, and I really hope Apple is up for the job, because the App itself is awesome and way better (smoother, faster, cleaner) than the current Google implementation.
Even the latest iteration of Apple Maps - its simpler, has nicer tiles, and is more performant than the Google Maps app on my iPhone 4.
Apple maps is nicer and better than Google Maps despite the data deficiencies that effect it's accuracy.
Who would of thought Apple would solve corp email issues faster and better than Google and Motorola.
Apple maps are far from perfect but are getting better at a faster pace than Google are becoming correct with directions .
Apple Maps has a far superior and easier to use GUI and has a significantly larger locations database than Google.
I still feel that apple maps has been faster and with the integrations with Siri and turn by turn it makes it much better than google maps.
Meanwhile, Apple is having control on hardware design, production and evolution too, making the propagation of new iOS versions much easier and much faster than it is for Google with Android.
As for iOS, I prefer the Apple mail app as it's faster and better looking than the Gmail app, which seems to be just a web wrapper (the curse of Google apps generally).
One of the huge pluses of the new Apple service is that iTunes already has a catalog of more than 20 million songs, meaning that the process is a lot easier and faster than, say, uploading every single track you own to Google Music.

output:
Apple and Google are two of the biggest tech companies, each known for their innovation and influence in the industry. 

When it comes to specific products, some argue that Apple Maps is nicer and better than Google Maps, despite some data deficiencies, while others appreciate the integration of Siri and turn-by-turn directions. Additionally, some argue that Apple is better than Google and Motorola at solving corporate email issues, and that the Apple mail app is faster and better looking than the Gmail app. 

Conversely, others argue that Google is getting better at design faster than Apple is getting better at web services, and that Google is getting better at sophisticated user interfaces faster than Apple is getting better at avoiding catastrophic cloud errors. 

Both companies have their strengths and weaknesses. Ultimately, the preference between Apple and Google may depend on personal preferences and needs.

input:
Summarize: The truck pulls my boat much easier than her suv.
Large wheels shod with low-profile tires are lighter than high-profile truck tires, for less unsprung weight and better suspension control than in a typical SUV.
Other than that, I couldn't ask for a better truck.
Obviously a diesel SUV is a lot harder to come by than a diesel truck.....but its something to consider.
My truck gets better mileage than most cars, or any suv/truck on the road, will last longer than a newer car, and has better resale than any lexus, bmw, mercedes etc.
This truck handles and rides better than any suv that I have owned.I would not hesitate to go cross country in this truck!
I'd even say the market is still in favor of more and more truck sales as much or greater than SUV market.
If they had run the yellow light with the suv, instead of stopping a bit harder than usual, the truck would have hit them instead (or in addition to) the suv.
Cost is similar, and the SUV might have lower fuel costs (I can't figure out why), but most are lighter than their truck siblings, and lower ins costs as well.
All of those weight-saving technologies translate here to a truck that is more responsive and way faster than the SUV it replaces.
The Highlander is a car-based SUV, making for easier handling and a smoother ride than a truck-based SUV.
A pick up with camper shell or an SUV seem to suit them better than a car, and trucks are lot easier to clean out, but then it's kind of extravagant to buy a truck just to haul dogs around in.
This SUV is superior to any other large truck or SUV I have ever driven.
Wife also likes better than truck, easier to drive and ride is fantastic.
And with our superior parts for the 2007 Ford Expedition, your truck will run better than ever.
The vehicle's body seems like an SUV and provides a smoother ride than a traditional pickup truck.
"Compact SUVs" based on car-body designs are actually safer than the larger, heavier fullsize SUVs based on truck designs; .
This Lexus takes puddles better than my truck on 35's... .
They're also quieter and smoother riding than the truck-based SUVs like the Yukon.
The Gordini SUV is smaller and lighter than any truck Gordon has built and raced at Dakar previously.
output:
Trucks and SUVs are both popular vehicle types, each with its own set of advantages and disadvantages. 

According to users, trucks are better at pulling heavy loads, such as boats and have better handling and suspension control due to lower unsprung weight, while SUVs provide a smoother ride and are easier to drive. Trucks also tend to have better resale value than SUVs. 

Despite being similar in cost, SUVs may have lower fuel costs and insurance costs than trucks. Some people argue that SUVs are safer than trucks but others regard some large SUVs as superior to any other large truck or SUV. 

Ultimately, the choice between a truck and an SUV depends on your specific needs and preferences. Consider factors such as the type of driving you'll be doing, the loads you need to carry, and the style and appearance that you prefer.

And siemens solution (just display delivery reports on the screen, only) is IMHO superior to both nokia and ericsson.
I think that Siemens phones are much better than many others famous manufacturers' like Nokia, Motorola, e.t.c.
I like this Siemens s40 mobile phone - it's quality is better than my Nokia 8290 (82xx series).
Siemens was a very motivated seller of NSN, it would have been easier for a bidder to buy NSN when Siemens owned half, and maybe Siemens would have gotten more than what Nokia paid.
Then yes, Nokia went to set a world record failure in handsets, Nokia fell in the next year, 2011, worse than Motorola or Palm or Siemens or RIM .
General Comments I think that Siemens phones are much better than many others famous manufacturers' like Nokia, Motorola, e.t.c.
Siemens has a slightly better track record than Nokia, with orders falling but revenue rising over the past year.
The fall is far FAR worse than that rapid collapse which killed Siemens, and that which killed Palm, and that which killed Motorola in mobile phones.
The people that gave it 5 stars have obviously never used a nokia before, the menu system on the T720i is the worst I've ever used, worse than Siemens and Samsung menus I've used before.
Some people say Nokia mobile is better than Siemens because it's easier to operate.
The camera is better then the one on the siemens mc60.
with 500 hr as standby time u don't need to turn this thing off.Changing settings is more complex than nokia but easier then siemens and other manufacturers.

input:
Summarize: "At MIT we thought we were better than people at Harvard because we were smarter and worked harder.
I am pretty sure Chomsky would not have been tolerated at Harvard, but I am not saying that Harvard is morally inferior to MIT.
MIT One Goal Better Than Harvard For Second Time This Year .
However, for my other interest, CS, MIT is loads better than Harvard.
If you want to say MIT kids are smarter than Harvard kids, well, I give that to you.
I can't understand why they'd turn down the MIT engineer who is probably much smarter then the Harvard poetry major.
MIT is good, definitely better than Yale or Columbia University but not as good as Harvard.
Regarding MIT, they said, "So it's official: MIT students have a better sense of humor, hands down, than Harvard students.
I personally think MIT is a better school than Harvard for engineering, physics and math.
So MIT often does well, but then MIT is a fantastic research university, which on some impact indicators is better than Harvard.
As you said, Harvard is much better at consulting than MIT is.
Berkeley and Stanford are better than the first two, but I would still say MIT (with Lippard, Schrock, Cummins, etc.) is superior.
Nash did get an MIT job, but a position there was decidedly inferior to the jobs at Princeton or Harvard to which he aspired.
There were times when Harvard or Caltech were better than MIT on the Putnam.
Of course I am prejudiced and think that Harvard is the better choice than is MIT, though MIT is a wonderful school.
So it is well known that grading at Stanford or Harvard is easier than grading at MIT or Caltech.
"It seems like the guys at MIT are worse than the guys at Harvard because the shuttle runs directly to the frats at MIT," says Jaronczyk.
But on average, the random group of 10 Harvard grads will always be smarter than the random group of 10 non-Harvard grads (unless those non-Harvard grads went to a similar school such as Yale, MIT, etc.).
In many ways, Harvard's superior reputation comes not just from its academic prowess-students at MIT or the University of Chicago, for example, are forced to cram far harder than Harvard undergraduates-but for the way it has traditionally fostered excellence both inside and outside the classroom.
HBS claims that their graduates come out "thinking" differently and better than the rest, but the fact is that someone graduating from Booth, MIT or Wharton will know more and have more solid skills.
output:
MIT and Harvard are two prestigious universities with a long history of academic excellence. 

Some argue that MIT is better for certain fields such as engineering, physics, and math, as well as for research. Others argue that Harvard is better for consulting and has a superior reputation. 

There are also arguments about which school has smarter students or a better sense of humor, with some saying MIT students are smarter and have a better sense of humor while others believe Harvard students are smarter on average. 

Moreover, there are arguments about grading difficulty at each school, and even opinions that some schools are better than both MIT and Harvard. 

Ultimately, the choice between MIT and Harvard depends on the individual's educational goals and priorities. Both schools offer a rich academic experience and a wealth of opportunities for personal and professional growth.

input:
Summarize: My iPod may be old, but it is an easier and better MP3 player than any mobile phone I've seen.
I have used many apple products and never had any problems until now, and I own one of their ipod touches and the ipod works 100% better and even faster than the phone does.
All things being equal, the iPad/iPod touch will always be slightly faster due to the lack of phone process running.
The Zune was not better than the iPod at all, and still isn't (it came much later on and was widely reviewed to be worse than the iPod) .
Also, iPod Touches historically tended to feel faster than an equivalent iPhone because it doesn't have to deal with the phone aspects of iOS.
My iPod is easier to deal with than this phone.
My iPod is better than my phone's music player.
This phone is as smooth if not smoother than an Iphone/Ipod touch experience.
My iPad2 and iPhone4 (my default iPod now) now run much, much faster than they had been running and my iPhone5 (my phone) is even better than it was before.
I like the fact that the iPod is thinner and lighter than a phone.
My phone also got the official Jellybean update on it last week and it is smoother and easier to use than my daughter's iPod.
If you talking about better functional devices, there have been few superior to ipod devices.
My Android phone is easier to use for music and, with teh poweramp app, sounds better through headphones than my iPOD classic.
All you do is hold down on a word and press the copy button, its a lot easier and faster than on my ipod touch and it exists anywhere you have text.
I'd also like a phone with a reduced set of features that's smaller, lighter, and simpler than the iPhone, but I can't find one that's as easy to use when it comes to the email and iPod features.
Although it may cause more use of future phone apps in the car, the car can offer a better display device and also uses can use the superior UI of the phone than the car makers crippled version (iPod).
It's now quicker to walk somewhere than look it up in Maps, and the iPod app and SMS app take forever to open up.
I thought the Zune was superior to the iPod the moment I saw it.
Much better than an iPod/iPhone.
May I also add that the Zune media player is superior to the iphones (and i'm an ipod guy).
output:
iPod and phone are two popular devices used for music and other media, but they have some differences and similarities.

Some users argue that iPod is an easier and better MP player than any mobile phone, and often feels faster than an equivalent iPhone due to lack of phone processes running. Others argue that phones can provide a smoother and better experience, especially when it comes to email and other features. Some say that Android phones have better sound quality. 

Some also prefer the iPod for its thinner and lighter form factor, while others prefer phones for their versatility and reduced set of features. Additionally, some argue that other devices, such as the Zune, are superior to iPods.

Ultimately, the choice between iPod and phone depends on personal preferences and needs. It's also important to consider specific features and performance when choosing a device.

I like the fact that the iPod is thinner and lighter than a phone.
My phone also got the official Jellybean update on it last week and it is smoother and easier to use than my daughter's iPod.

Much better than an iPod/iPhone.

Ultimately, the choice between rubber and wood depends on what they are used for and personal preferences. Both materials have their unique advantages and disadvantages, and one may be preferred over the other for specific purposes.

Ruby and JavaScript are two popular programming languages, each with its own strengths and weaknesses. 

According to some users, Ruby is a beautiful language, much easier to learn than JavaScript, and simply better than JavaScript will ever become. There are also arguments about the languages' suitability for specific tasks, such as server-side processing, where PHP, Ruby, JSP, or ASP are considered better options than JavaScript, and front-end development, where MooTools is faster and maintains a very Ruby-like feel. 

Ultimately, the choice between Ruby and JavaScript depends on personal preferences and needs. Both languages have a loyal following, and both are useful in different contexts.

input:
Summarize: My Ford was nicer and better than my Toyota is.
The new Ford Focus comes with a 6-speed automatic and we've found it to be smoother and better able to keep the engine in the heart of the power band than the 4-speed automatic in the Toyota can.
Ford also states that he C-Max Energi will offer better electric mode economy and a greater driving range (along with more space) than the Toyota Prius Plug-In.
Ford seats are superior to Toyota.
I wanted Ford to do better than Toyota so Toyota will have to work harder.
Next up - Steve Balmer thinks Windows is superior to Mac and Ford thinks they are better than Toyota.
Conclusion Type A: Ford is a safer car than Toyota, since it protected its driver and passenger much better than Toyota did.
Asking if Perl is slower or uses more resources that PHP is like asking if a Ford gets better gas mileage than a Toyota.
The 2014 Ford Explorer offers a greater level of technology than the 2014 Toyota Highlander.
Ford these days have extremely well-engineered products that are no longer inferior to Honda or Toyota.
The 300C is only slightly quicker than the Avalon at the penalty of several MPG, the 3.5 V6 actually a better engine choice(thank you MB) that is far superior to that 1970 vintage mixmaster Ford engine.
As Bubba2000 mentioned, Toyota has most things standard albeit a higher starting price but that's why it is simpler and easier to understand a Toyota than a Ford or GM car.
It was also priced 5 grand higher than the much smoother riding, more powerful and far better equipped Ford Ranger Sport (which now comes with a 100,000 mile warranty).
Now with smarter than ever technology a few options to choose from such as 360 degree camera with split-view display, Blind Spot Information System (BLIS) and many more it's never been easier to drive a Ford.
The Aurion ATX offers matching or better performance, competitive fuel efficiency, better build quality, greater levels of refinement, and all in a package that costs considerably less than both the Ford and Holden.
Toyota faster than Ford!
Stop just automatically believing that GM and Ford are inferior to Honda and Toyota.
The build quality is far superior to a Ford.
Toyota is always a smarter buy than Ford, GM, or Dodge when it comes to anything in a half ton truck or lighter.
Yes Ford is still a little slower than Toyota, but Mulhally has them on the right track.
output:
Ford and Toyota are two popular car manufacturers, and comparing them depends on personal preferences and needs.

Some argue that Ford is better than Toyota in terms of safety, seat comfort, newer technology, and smoother transmission. Ford claims that its C-Max Energi has better electric mode economy and driving range than the Toyota Prius Plug-In. 

On the other hand, others argue that Toyota is better in terms of build quality, value, and standard features. Furthermore, some claim that Toyota offers better performance and fuel efficiency.

Therefore, the decision between Ford and Toyota depends on personal preferences, priorities, and model type. It's also a good idea to read reviews and do research on specific models that you're considering to get a better understanding of their performance and reliability.

Summarize: Weisman believes the plastic implants could be a safer, more effective tool than bone cement in joint replacement surgery.
x Concrete tanks painted with marine epoxy or plastic-lined tanks are easier to clean and maintain than bare cement tanks.
we use a plastic sheet or tarp on which to dry soil, making it easier to pick up/move/clean up than using a cement pad.
Subminiature equipment is more often assembled in plastic cases than in metal because of the greater ease of mounting parts (using cement) and of avoiding wiring shorts.
Since the plastic shell of the inventive conduit provides two relatively impermeable barriers (i.e., the outside surface of the shell and the pipe portion the shell) it would not matter that such modified concretes having waste material fillers may be inferior to ordinary Portland Cement.
Steeb favors thick-walled plastic ones, which hold moisture better than terra-cotta, provide good insulation against heat and cold, and weigh less than terra-cotta, ceramic, or cement.
they actually have a metal, or plastic, that is designed for the hip and ridge to keep 99% of the water out, ive never used but have seen it, a lot easier than carrying cement up the ladder to cement everything.
Plastic dimpled matting (1/8" to 1/4") has become popular in the tile industry because it resists moisture and cracks better than plywood or cement board.
The plastic sheathing, of thickness greater than 1 mm (40 mils), provides a water-tight barrier and the cement grout with cracks of limited width functions as a secondary chemical corrosion barrier in the event that the plastic sheath is breached.
In another exemplary embodiment, polystyrene divinylbenzene plastic material having greater than or equal to about 4% by weight divinylbenzene crosslinker may be employed in cementing applications in which curing cement is expected to be exposed to pressures or compressional forces of greater than about 6000 psi.
It is suitable for flashings and a wide variety of waterproofing uses, especially at moving joints where its flexibility and elasticity make it superior to standard plastic cements.
It's better than the plastic container on several levels and for me, it's worth the extra money.
This tactic is better than utilizing plastic, because it will allow air to circulate.
Because cement mortar has greater compressive strength than required for most ordinary brickwork and because it is not very plastic by itself it is sometimes mixed with lime and sand.
I think most pros would tell you that waterproofing on top of the cement board is better practice than using the plastic or the felt paper underneath it.
Or if not cement, maybe chocolate, with accuracy that's good enough and much better speed than the plastic-based extruder models.
In the past we have used neoprene rubber shims of a similar size which I think work better than the plastic.
Different materials have different freezing points as well, cement roads seem to ice up faster than tar pavements, and steel, plastic and glass all frost over at different rates.
The sculptor then takes ordinary, sand-based patching cement (faster drying and yet more plastic than its stone-based, sidewalk cousin) and layers it over the armature from the bottom up.
Fiber cement siding tends to have better longevity than wood or plastic-based products because it resists cracking, warping, rot, and pest damage-even after exposure to harsh temperature and moisture.
output:
Plastic and cement are two materials with different properties and uses.

According to some arguments, plastic is easier to handle and more versatile than cement. It's also better for certain applications like waterproofing and insulation. Plastic implants may also be safer and more effective than cement in joint replacement surgery. On the other hand, some argue that plastic may not be as durable as cement, especially in high-pressure applications.

Cement, on the other hand, is praised for its strength and durability. It's also suitable for applications that require high compressive strength. Cement tanks, for example, are easier to clean and maintain than bare cement tanks. Cement mortars mixed with lime and sand can also enhance its plasticity for use in brickwork. Conversely, cement can be heavy and harder to handle than plastic.

Ultimately, the choice of material depends on the specific application and conditions. Cement may be preferable in high-stress environments, while plastic may be more suitable for waterproofing and insulation.

Dell typically has much better quality control than Sony.

Like HP and Dell...and a bit cheaper (with much better battery life) than Sony.

On the other hand I do believe Apple is far more responsive and supportive than Dell, and vastly better than SONY, Panasonic, etc.
This is just an at a glance opinion, but I also like the Dell 1080 screen better than the Sony 1080 screen.
It's heavier than the Sony Vaio T ultrabook, and lighter than the new Dell Inspiron 14z.
At around 4 lb, this laptop is a good 3 lb lighter than the Dell.
If we look into the over heating issues,Â SonyÂ is better than dell
Viewsonic, Samsung, Sony, and several others have superior displays compared to Dell.
Seems much lighter than my wife's comparable Dell, and the screen is brighter.
However, it scored better than the $1,164 Dell Studio 17 with Core i7 (6,494).
Like the Sony VAIO VGN-CR11SR/P , the Satellite U300-111 comes with a larger amount of system memory and is thus superior to the Dell.
Armed with a very fast mobile CPU, the T7700 (200 MHz faster than what the Dell uses), a 2GB RAM and a Nvidia 8400M GS video chip (similar to the Dell), this laptop is the second best performer in this test.
It's light enough to easily move around one-handed (MUCH lighter than the Dell M90 I had previously).
My 10 year old 27" Sony CRT looks better hooked to analog than the Dell unit.

There are also arguments that compare specific Dell and Sony products in terms of weight, benchmark scores, battery life and cost, screen quality, and responsiveness and support from the manufacturers.

Ultimately, the choice between Dell and Sony may depend on personal preferences, priorities, and the specific models and features that you're looking for.

the sausage was crumbled a bit too finely, so it cooked faster than the pizza itself and ended up a bit over done, but not burned.

On the other hand, laptops have certain advantages, such as larger storage and more powerful performance. They are also better for blogging. Additionally, using laptops for playing music produces superior sound compared to the iPod.

Ultimately, the choice between iPods and laptops depends on the user's specific needs and preferences.

PHP is slower than Java but scales nicely anyway.

Java is easier than PHP.

While Ruby/Python/PERL/PHP are interesting and can do some things better/nicer than Java, I think that it will take some time for one of these languages to be on a par with Java.

Net application ran %1000 faster than a tuned version of the Java application.

output:

Some argue that Gamecube is faster, easier to program for, and has better graphics and sound capabilities than PS. Others say that PS is inferior to both Gamecube and Xbox in terms of graphics, texture compression, and overall performance. On the other hand, some argue that PS is a better machine than Gamecube and fared better in the marketplace. 

Opinions also differ on specific games and features of each console. For example, some users prefer the graphics and loading time of Resident Evil  on Gamecube, while others find the control smoother on the PS version. Gamecube is criticized for not being playable online, while PS is praised for its versatility, as it can play DVDs.

Ultimately, the choice between Gamecube and PS may depend on personal preferences, such as favorite games and exclusive features. It's important to research and compare the performance and features of each console before making a decision.

input:
Summarize: Performance is very close and Kingston have better S.M.A.R.T-features than Intel.
It's because the Kingston RAM is faster than stock and the integrated Intel GPU uses the system RAM.
At least at the moment in my market, the Kingston KC100 seems like a better buy than the new Intel 520.
The Kingston SSDNow V is faster in this test than the small Intel X25-V, but the Raid and high-end SSDs again show a clear lead.
after tons of failures from kingston (i know sandisk is better), i stick to intel or Samsung only - data loss is worth more than a few hundred to me .
This cost per gigabyte figure actually makes the Kingston SNV425-S2 64GB SSD much better value than both the ADATA S596 Turbo 32GB and Intel X25-V 40GB drives as well.
after tons of failures from kingston (i know sandisk is better), i stick to intel or Samsung only - data loss is worth more than a few hundred to me Â Â  Happened to me yesterday.
All Kingston products are developed using industry leading quality processes, ensuring superior quality, performance, and 100% compatible with Apple - iMac Intel Core 2 DUo 20-inch/24inch 2.4-3.06GHz (Early 2008) .
The Intel X25-V 40GB was slightly slower than the Samsung Spinpoint F1 1TB desktop hard drive, while the Kingston SNV425-S2 64GB and ADATA S596 Turbo 32GB which performed so well in the read test were the slowest drives in the write test.
In addition, the SSD Toolbox software provided by Intel is far superior to what Kingston provides.
Third, the JM612 controller in the WD drives is better than the JM618 in the Kingston V series.
The Intel drive won this one handily coming in 10 to 11 seconds faster than the Kingston drive, which is surprisingly only less than 2 seconds faster than an unaccelerated HDD.
With a bandwidth of 503.9MB/s it matched the ADATA S511 240GB while it was slightly faster than the OCZ and Kingston drives.
Starting at the bottom with the 512B results, the Mach Extreme has solid write performance - not quite as fast as the smaller Intel drive but a whopping 50% faster than the Kingston.
Many of the tests are heavy on the read performance and the Kingston drive really shows its strengths, but not better than the second generation Intel X25-M drives.
Switching our view from average latency to peak response times, we found similar max latency from the Micron P400m and Samsung SSD 840 Pro, which came in below the Intel DC S3700 but better than the Kingston E100.
output:
Kingston and Intel are two popular manufacturers of computer hardware. 

Some argue that Kingston has better S.M.A.R.T-features, better value, and better compatibility with Apple products. However, others report failures with Kingston products, slower write speeds, and inferior software. 

On the other hand, Intel is noted for faster RAM, superior software, and faster SSDs, as well as better performance in some tests. However, its products can also be more expensive. 

Ultimately, the choice of which brand to use may depend on personal preferences, specific needs, and cost considerations. It's also important to read reviews and do research on specific products to ensure that they meet your standards for quality and performance.

input:
Summarize: Champagne, sherry, and port : All three are lighter choices than a glass of wine or light beer.
Nice citric aroma, not sour (better than DeuS) towards oranges, also malt, champagne, yeast and vanilla.
seen at a lakers championship parade after they beat the pistons... "cheap champagne is better than lame beer" .
I've had $300 champagne and I don't think it tasted any better than $40 champagne and Carlsberg beer tastes like pi$$water no matter how much it costs.
A decade of champagne budgets (or at least Prosecco budgets, which are better than beer budgets) and friends with beach houses.
He said that some brands are like bubbly fruit champagne and have an alcohol content that is equal to or greater than that of beer.
You're off your rocker if you can show me a champagne better than beer, and let's be frank: cheap beer is available, but America is hot on the iron for some micro-brewery beer.
I know High Life claims that, but this looks and feels like a champagne to me, while maintaining a superior beer flavor.
Also, along with hops, barley malt, yeast and water, Samuel Adams used Champagne yeast, which can survive in the higher alcohol better than a lot of beer yeast.
I have to say, though, that when it comes to pairing wine with pizza, I prefer the bubbly; to me, champagne pairs better with pizza than any other beverage, including beer.
very light straw lighter than champagne.
Smoother than expected in mouthfeel, almost champagne-like.
Mouthfeel is much better than a champagne--not as bubbly, and much smoother (and probably isn't as likely to induce a hangover).
Better than a fine Champagne.
d) Better than champagne on a summers day.
Awesome retention and great lacing - put this in a flute and it would look far superior to a regular champagne!
Carbonation coming from the bottom faster than a glass of champagne.
Appearance: A 2 finger white head falls faster than anticipated (like champagne).
M: Medium bodied, the carbonation is lighter than Champagne and adds to the creaminess.
Lighter body than expected, but offers a large canvas of flavors: citrus, fruit, champagne, and wild yeast.
output:
Champagne and beer are two popular alcoholic beverages. Some argue that champagne is a lighter choice than beer and even pairs better with certain foods like pizza. Others say that beer is better than cheap champagne. 

There are also some comments on the taste and quality of both beverages. While some find that expensive champagne doesn't taste any better than cheaper ones and that cheap beer tastes bad regardless of its cost, others claim that some beers have a champagne-like quality or that beer yeast is not as strong as champagne yeast. 

In terms of texture, some arguments describe the mouthfeel of some beers as smoother and creamier than champagne. Some also note that the appearance of some beers, with their white head and fast-coming carbonation, is similar to that of champagne.

Ultimately, the choice between champagne and beer may depend on personal preferences, occasion, and food pairing.

On the other hand, some prefer beer over champagne, arguing that champagne is not better than a good beer. Some also argue that beer has more flavor and substance, and is more widely available and accessible. Some beer lovers also praise its taste and flavor, calling it a superior beer flavor. Finally, beer is considered a better budget choice than champagne and other high-end beverages.

Therefore, the choice between champagne and beer ultimately depends on personal preferences and the occasion. Champagne is a good choice for special occasions and elegant settings, while beer is a more casual and accessible option.

input:
Summarize: A beet juice fruit blend has worked faster, better and longer than coffee for me (maybe for you too!)
A healthy breakfast (always eggs, usually some additional meat, very little bread and NO juice) seems to lessen my appetite throughout the rest of the day and gets my energy level going faster and smoother than coffee.
German scientists have figured out why tomato juice tastes better aboard an airplane than on the ground (and coffee tastes worse).
Fresh Juice is better than any store purchased juice, soda, coffee, etc. .
I think green juice like that is better than tea or coffee tbh.
If you need help waking up, apple juice will actually work better than coffee.
Hot lemonade, sweetened with honey and flavored with a little grape juice or cherry juice or strawberry juice, tastes better than coffee in demitasse.
I swear the green juice recipe is better than coffee and I drink it almost every morning.
Lemon juice is one of Mother Nature's most effective disinfectants, making it a better morning beverage than coffee.
Someone may immediately consider why orange juice is better than coffee and raise arguments about how their coffee isn't so bad and won't kill them.
And orange juice is even worse than coffee.
Superior performance in juice and other concentrated beverage dispensing.
"If you want nutrients, whole fruit is way better than juice.
Also, hot beverages such as coffee and tea are generally safer than fruit juices, sugarcane juice, or buttermilk.
Coffee was better than most cruise lines and they had good juice choices.
Soda or coffee is better by far than alcohol, but juice or water is best.
A cost effective solution to providing low-volume accounts with superior performance in juice and other concentrated beverage dispensing.
For me, selling Coffee/Tea is whole lot easier then selling Soap,Juice or Vitamins...and shoes or make up.
Espresso 12mg/ 0mg No one does coffee flavors better than BWB, and this juice is no exception.
There is coffee, tea, water (which is better than bottled water), some type of punch or lemonade at lunch, orange juice, apple juice, and grapefruit juice for breakfast.
output:
Juice and coffee are two popular beverages that people consume for different reasons. 

Some argue that juice is better than coffee for its health benefits, as fresh juice is better than any store purchased juice, soda, coffee. Lemon juice has disinfectant properties and apple juice can help wake you up. Moreover, green juices are preferred by some people over tea or coffee. 

On the other hand, coffee is appreciated for its energy-boosting properties, and is a preferred beverage by some over other morning beverages like hot lemonade. Some also argue that coffee flavors can be superior when used in e-liquids. 

Ultimately, the choice comes down to individual preferences. Some argue that tomato juice tastes better on an airplane than coffee, while others argue that hot beverages like coffee and tea are safer than fruit juices.

input:
Summarize: Javascript is better (IMO) and faster than Python.
Most JavaScript interpreters are much faster than nearly all implementations of Python.
Also, since I know Javascript pretty well (actually better than Python), it might be easier for me to do analysis on the data.
JavaScript in V8 executes about ten times faster than python 3 ( shootout.alioth.debian.org/u32/... ).
Though thanks to V8, it executes JavaScript faster than PHP, python and ruby.
I like programming in JavaScript better than PHP, Python or Java .
Otherwise Javascript has become amazingly fast, I think V8 is faster then ruby and python.
V.D. Veksler :Â it just came to my attention that Javascript v8 is faster than Python.
Also note that the v8 javascript interpreter is quite a bit faster than standard python.
One thing about JavaScript being faster than Python: One needs to distinguish between a language and its implementation.
;-) But things like clever memory allocation can pay dividends, too, and I wouldn't be surprised if this explained Python's better-than-expected showing when compared to other languages - such as that comparison you provoked with those claims of superior JavaScript performance.
Python is a much nicer and cleaner scripting language than javascript.
Python is a better language than Javascript.
Replace it with a real programming language such as Python, which is vastly superior to javascript.
JavaScript : Dynamically typed and worse design than Python and Ruby.
However, Javascript environments are probably harder to work with than Python.
This makes JavaScript in my experience harder to debug than Python.
Managed JScript on Silverlight still runs many times faster than interpreted Javascript.
As Python code running in Silverlight runs faster than Javascript (and Python is a nicer language of course), you could even use Silverlight as an optional accelerator for RIAs (Rich Internet Applications) - falling back to Javascript when Silverlight is unavailable.
because i found python to be alot more simpler to learn than javascript in many ways.
output:
JavaScript and Python are both popular programming languages, each with its own strengths and weaknesses.

Some argue that JavaScript is faster than Python, and therefore, it is better when it comes to performance. Others also find it easier to work with due to their familiarity with JavaScript. However, some argue that JavaScript is harder to debug than Python, and its design is not as good as Python.

On the other hand, some prefer Python over JavaScript due to its cleaner syntax and more straightforward approach. Python is also said to be a better language and simpler to learn for some users. However, there are also arguments that Python can be slower than JavaScript in certain cases.

Ultimately, the choice of language between JavaScript and Python depends on personal preference and the specific requirements of the project. It is also important to consider the features and limitations of each language.

Ultimately, the choice between wood and rubber depends on the specific application and personal preferences. Factors that may influence decision-making include performance, aesthetics, safety, and ease of installation.

performance on OpenGL will be superior to that of Direct3D".

Direct3D is pushing the envelope for hardware features, which means a Direct3D app can run faster or look better than an OpenGL app on equivalent hardware.
Microsoft was running a massive marketing campaign for Direct3D, and soon everyone "just knew" that it was faster and better than OpenGL.
The Direct3D system is a technically superior piece of technology, and support for working with it is still better than OpenGL whether you're a hobbyist or a pro.

I'm not familiar with any argument stating that Direct3D is superior to OpenGL.
output:
OpenGL and DirectD are both graphics APIs used for creating interactive applications and games. 

While some argue that OpenGL is faster, smoother, and more efficient than DirectD, others claim that DirectD has evolved faster and provides a superior API. It is also argued that support for DirectD is still better and that it can perform better or look better on equivalent hardware. 

Some users have had negative experiences with OpenGL, such as poor driver quality on Windows and slow code. On the other hand, some argue that learning DirectD is easier than learning OpenGL, and that DirectD used to have better support than OpenGL in the past.

Ultimately, the choice between OpenGL and DirectD may depend on personal preferences and the specific needs of each project. It's a good idea to research both APIs and read reviews to make an informed decision.

Butyl rubber surrounds are superior to foam in two important ways.
Magnets were heavier and rubber surround superior to the foam originals.
Rounding out the boot's lightweight attributes, the high-density Evolution foam sole is not only lighter than traditional rubber soles, but it also absorbs more shock than standard EVA foam for a smoother ride.
They market their natural rubber mattress as a safer alternative to memory foam mattresses (meaning temperpedic).
Latex Rubber retains it shape better than any other foam.
But rubber tips are easier to clean than foam, and allow for more breathability.

A polyurethane foam tyre is worse than an air-filles rubber tyre in this respect.
Porschitz has found that EPDM (synthetic rubber) gaskets perform better than spray foam.
STI Evolution foam outsole cushions better than traditional foams and is drastically lighter than rubber .
Pro Foam tyres are significantly lighter than the stock rubber tyres, which helps deliver quicker acceleration for faster lap times.

Open-cell urethane foam, lighter and more durable than foam rubber.
in my opinoin rubber surround is not that superior to the foam surround.
EVA+â„¢ High Abrasion EVA foam is a lighter alternative to rubber in the... Less .
Foam Stamps Foam stamps generally have simpler, solid motifs and are much less expensive than rubber stamps.
