Foam surrounds are also lighter than rubber and more weight can lower sensitivity.
EVA is a microcellular foam material that is lighter and more flexible than rubber.
output:
Rubber and foam are two materials that are used in various products and applications, and there are differences between them.

Some argue that rubber surrounds are superior to foam surrounds in terms of durability and performance. Additionally, latex rubber retains its shape better than any other foam. However, foam has its advantages, such as being lighter in weight and providing better shock absorption. Foam stamps are also less expensive than rubber stamps. 

There are also arguments that compare the two materials in specific products. For example, a high-density Evolution foam sole is lighter and absorbs more shock than standard EVA foam and rubber soles. EPDM (synthetic rubber) gaskets perform better than spray foam. Polyurethane foam tires are worse than air-filled rubber tires, while pro foam tires are significantly lighter than stock rubber tires and deliver quicker acceleration for faster lap times. 

Overall, there are advantages and disadvantages to using both rubber and foam, and the choice between them depends on the specific application and the desired characteristics.

input:
Summarize: to grant a half-holiday upon any lighter occasion than the birthday of the Monarch.
At least the holiday decoration looked better than a "radioactive, rancid birthday cake."
Halloween is the best holiday in my opinion, even slightly better than my birthday or Christmas !
Oh National Margarita Day , the one "holiday" that may be greater than Christmas, Independence Day, and even your birthday combined.
I love Halloween, it's probably my most favorite holiday all year (yes, even better than Christmas and my birthday).
Cross posted @ the Atheist Oasis It's actually a far more fitting holiday (for lack of a better word) for the world at large than any other birthday/holiday/hallmark-excuse-to-gouge-the-consumer.
I borrowed my sisters for holiday and its so much easier to carry them about than 10-12 paperbacks - I will be getting one for my birthday .
I really wanted to celebrate my big birthday in a special way and I thought of no better way than our own holiday to Orlando.
It stings of common sense that a national public holiday would further elevate the importance of this week, with a far greater value being added to our national dialogue than we get from the Queen's Birthday status quo.
Celebrating only one holiday makes things simpler - but if you've chosen to honor more than one tradition and your toddler starts peppering you with questions about the season, try this approach: "Use the birthday party analogy," says Horowitz.
Who better to explain Festivus than the man who gave the holiday its voice.
So I'm sure I'm right that having a birthday at Hogwarts is better than one in the holiday.
The Desperate Housewife is celebrating her birthday today and what better way than to get ready for the holiday season!
And there couldn't be a more BBQ friendly holiday than the 4th of July, because there is no better way to celebrate America's birthday than with smoked food.
My Son, 16, just commented that, considering all JMB's ontributions to this country and society, perhaps this would be a better day to have as a school holiday than some of the others we have.
I'm not, and I don't know why holiday parties are supposed to be all that much worse for you than friends' birthday parties/engagement parties/bachelorette parties throughout the rest of the year.
August 15th we celebrated the centennial birthday of Julia Child, and what better way to celebrate it than in France, which coincides with the festival of Assumption - a feast holiday no less!
Mr Morgan acknowledged that to achieve a zero toll over Easter, making it the first public holiday of no road deaths since records began in 1956, would be an even better result than for Queen's Birthday weekend - when fewer people leave home.
output:
Holidays and birthdays are two celebrations that we look forward to during the year.

Some people argue that holidays, such as Halloween and National Margarita Day, are even better than birthdays, as they are more fitting for the world at large and can be celebrated in special ways such as traveling or BBQs. Others may prefer birthdays, as they are a time to celebrate one's personal milestones with family and friends.

There are also arguments that support the importance of national holidays over personal occasions such as birthdays; for example, a national public holiday can elevate the importance of an event and add value to national dialogue. 

Ultimately, the choice between holidays and birthdays depends on personal preferences and priorities. Some argue that Halloween is the best holiday, while others prefer Christmas or their own birthday. Both holidays and birthdays provide an opportunity to celebrate and enjoy time with loved ones, regardless of which one is considered "better."

Some argue that holidays are better than birthdays because they can be celebrated for reasons other than personal milestones. Holidays can also have a broader meaning for society as a whole, such as a national public holiday being used to elevate the importance of a particular issue.

Ultimately, both holidays and birthdays are important occasions and the choice of which is better depends on personal preferences and circumstances.

Overall, opinions are divided, with some people preferring birthdays and others preferring holidays, depending on personal experiences and traditions.

Concrete and metal are both materials used for construction, but they have different properties and applications.

Some arguments favor concrete, citing its durability, ability to withstand pressure loads, and longevity. Concrete is also said to be easier to paint and is not prone to causing little metal slivers. 

On the other hand, metal is noted for being harder, lighter, and easier to install. Ultimately, the choice of material depends on the specific needs and preferences of the project. For example, concrete or brick construction may be preferred for its durability and resistance to corrosion, while metal pipes may be preferred for their lightweight and compressive strength.

Ultimately, the choice between the PSP and PS depends on personal preferences and requirements. It's essential to consider factors like performance, graphics, features, and gaming options before making a decision.

That said, in our opinion the 15.5in display is a far better trade off in terms of overall notebook size than the large Samsung.
I find it irritating that AMD and Intel are doing better at coming down (e.g. Kabini) than ARM/Samsung at going up.
AMD might even have to sell off their processor division to IBM (which already makes POWER processors), Sun (which needs something better than SPARC), Samsung, etc. .
And finally think about the financial impact of the superior Intel processes and components on ARM, TSMC, GlobalFoundries, and Samsung.
Movies look much better with -vo x11 than with -vo xv, at least in my monitor (Samsung 226BW).
even on my brand new Toshiba (also an AMD/ATI chipset) while far better looking and playable than on my Samsung, it still seems to have a few 'blurries'.
I decided to wait on that front to see if they released something a bit better than the current popular Samsung/Acer models (which also aren't up to the Chrome tab mirroring from what I understand) but a lot cheaper than the Pixel.
output:

Some users prefer Samsung tablets for productivity purposes, while others have experienced better Wi-Fi performance with AMD-based laptops. In terms of financial impact, some point out that Intel processes and components are superior to AMD and pose a threat to ARM, TSMC, GlobalFoundries, and Samsung. 

Overall, both Samsung and AMD have their strengths and weaknesses, and choosing between them may depend on personal preferences and needs.

Python integrates simpler than Lisp and is better readable than Perl.
Maybe python is easier to read, maybe ruby is more object oriented, maybe ocaml is faster, maybe lisp is better then all of them, but I don't care.
All the Scheme implementations I tried are inferior to Python for what concerns introspection and debugging capabilities.
O.k. there is that part about Python being nicer than Lisp.
Believe it or not, Lisp isn't particularly faster than Python for my web app.
These are the only true technical merits I see in Python, Ruby and Perl that make them "superior" to Common Lisp and Schemes.
Python syntax is somewhat simpler than Java, and the presence of eval makes it feasible to generate code at runtime, but the lack of a macro system makes it more tedious than in Lisp.
Python seems to be easier to read than Lisp for someone with no experience in either language.
" , this explains why Python code will always be easier to read than Lisp, without being a veteran in the language.
Lua is much faster, much smaller, easier to embed, and has a better C interface than Python, but Python has more libraries (including many that are included by default) and a larger user-base.
I have no doubt that a good LISP hacker can write from scratch something faster/better than a good Python hacker could write the same thing.
Lisp is about 1.5 to 4 times faster than Java, and about 10 to 50 times faster than Python.
Haskell does better than python (here) .
Arbitrary Python code may run slower than Lisp, though the Python library code is very well optimised.
you can write serious programs in Lisp faster than in Python... ;-) .
Scheme, OCaml, Haskell, and Lisp are all an order of magnitude faster than python.
The reason is that Lisp can be (is) much much faster than Python, Tcl, etc..
It's faster than my Python version and it shows that D code can be positively .

output:
Python and Lisp are both popular programming languages, but they have some differences in terms of syntax, readability, performance, and overall technical merits.

Some argue that Lisp has the simplest syntax, can be faster than Python, and can be used to write faster and better programs than Python. Others argue that Python is easier to read, integrates simpler than Lisp, has more libraries, and has well-optimized library code. It is also noted that Python lacks a macro system, making it more tedious for code generation than Lisp.

Overall, the choice between Python and Lisp may depend on personal preferences, experience, and project requirements. Some users find that Lisp can be faster and more efficient for certain tasks, while others prefer Python for its readability and ease of use. It's also worth noting that there are many other programming languages available, each with its own benefits and drawbacks.

Wouldn't it be better to be struck by lighting at age ninety-seven while fly fishing an alpine lake than to spend months in surgical and hospital care.
Camping Checklist ... Nothing is worse than driving 80 miles down the road for a glorious few days of camping, hiking, fishing and relaxing to find that you have left at home a few really essential items.
We arrived in the town, a tiny fishing village on Lake Superior, and bought some food and camping supplies.
SUMMERTIME FISHING DESTINATIONS SOUTHERN VERMONT TROUT When the warmer weather arrives nothing is better than packing up the camping and fishing gear and heading up to the green mountains.
We went camping and though we had a great time, we learned that the only thing worse than fishing and not catching anything is fishing and not catching anything while everyone around you is emptying the lake.
"I can't think of a better way for grandfathers and fathers to spend their weekend than outside fishing with their sons, daughters and grandkids," said John Arway, executive director of the Pennsylvania Fish and Boat Commission.
Rae Lakes Basin (nice golden trout fishing) is a short hike (class 1) from Dragon Lake (you'd be better off camping at Dragon Lake than in the Rae Lakes Basin).
"For many people buying a tinnie or small boat is something which is still extremely achievable in the current economic climate there is no better place than Queensland to take off for the day and hit the bay for an enjoyable day out fishing," Plant said.
Born in Wabeno on Sept. 23, 1934 to Bernard Sr. and Alice (Mcallen) Bowman, he resided in Mountain and his hobbies were woodworking, fishing, rock finding around Lake Superior and camping.

output:
Fishing and camping are outdoor recreational activities that offer different experiences depending on preferences and priorities.

Some argue that fishing is a great way to spend time outdoors with family and friends, and that there's no better way for grandfathers and fathers to spend their weekend than outside fishing with their loved ones. Others highlight the pleasures of catching fish, the beauty of different fishing destinations, and the sense of achievement that catching a fish can bring. There are also arguments against fishing, such as the frustration of not catching anything or the need to keep track of all the necessary components. 

Camping, on the other hand, is praised for its relaxation and the chance to get away from daily routines and connect with nature. Many enjoy the variety of activities that can be done while camping, such as hiking, bear- and whale-watching, and even wood-working. Moreover, some state parks offer access to water sports. However, there are also arguments against camping, such as the risk of forgetting essential items.

Both activities offer a chance to explore nature and enjoy the great outdoors, and the choice between them depends on personal preferences and desired experiences.

input:
Summarize: Our local pizza shops make a better sandwich than either.
Yes, pizza tastes better than a peanut butter and jelly sandwich.
To Mauro, a bad sandwich is a far worse crime than a bad pizza.
I must not appreciate the finer gastro-things, other than anchovy and onion pizza of course.
(Many have said this pizza is even better than the classic Greek sandwich!)
As a result, this BLT Pizza came about and I personally think it's much better than the sandwich version... .
After a looooong week, there wasn't much that sounded better than ordering a pizza, drinking some wine, and renting a movie from Redbox...so that's exactly what we did.
The pizza was fantastic, and was for sure a lot better than these hamburger/freaky-sandwich vending machines I found outside.
forget my mom, my wife don't even cook for me... I had pizza for dinner... still better than jadukors turkey sandwich imo.
Although I found the pizza to only be average, they make a superior submarine sandwich that will not disappoint you.
My sandwich fared somewhat better than Mary's pizza.
Better than pizza in a cup...Russ .
Much better than Domino's actual pizza.
It's a lot better than grabbing an instant pizza that's for sure!
Even a grilled chicken sandwich is much better for you than a freaking pizza.
In the past, though, I might choose the Caesar Chicken SANDWICH because in some universe, a "sandwich" is better than "pizza."
Adam (coworker on Flight Simulator): [eating sandwich] Oh, this is better than the pizza I had last night.
Julian's gets better-than-average marks from me, based on its pizza crust and sausage, the good, strong, house-brewed tea, the really good Italian sub and a warm, cozy atmosphere.
It's better than leaving him to his own devices which would result is a constant stream of fast food and pizza for my kids.
So hand me my sandwich boards...hey it is better than dressing like a giant pizza and waving advertisements for $5 pizzas!

Ultimately, the choice between pizza and sandwich depends on personal preferences and the quality of the specific item being consumed.

input:
Summarize: For the rest, I a used gold leaf pen, which is great because it's easier to handle than a paintbrush and gives an amazing shimmering gold effect (way better than metallic paint).
I'll certainly view my Posca pen more safer than the testors paint pen I just received.
I did find that the Sakura Souffle pen worked better on the rock than the paint pen.
I found that Â using a pen was a lot easier than paint and more forgiving.
I found the technical pen to be much easier and precise than using paint and a brush, because I had more control and it also matched the color ink better!
I now use a small notebook and black pen which is easier to transport than pastels or paint.
You can use it as a corrective pen, or you can open it and inside there is a thin brush (in my opinion, better to use than the pen mode) to paint small details in the car.
Artists often find these pen-like bottles areÂ easier to write with than attempting to write or outlineÂ with a paint brush.
Just cut out some 3" x 6" tags from Basic Black Cardstock , get out your Blender Pen -which for me worked better than a paint brush-and paint some simple flower shapes using acrylic paint.
I believe in future I may try the crown of thorns and I do believe that the pen would be easier to manipulate than an open bottle of paint and the brush in the cap.
Zenstone shading is several shades lighter than the white pen line .
Make paint polishing easier than ever with the Rupes Swirl Finder Pen Light!
Red chalk allowed him to work at great speed, and was easier to correct than pen and ink.
Finger-paint the letters - easier to draw with a finger than with a pencil or pen.
I definitely can paint a better picture with words than with ink, pen, and brush.
It is must easier to do with a pen tablet than a mouse because you can use the pressure sensitivity to feather more easily.
It transpires that oils are, in may ways, easier than pen and ink, because they're more forgiving.
I think I paint better with words Than pencil or pictures I now belong to the club of weirdos and nerds Where we hunt for rhymes Like it's an important treasure What we find is a pen and paper And a lesson to be mature.
I paint digital now and it is even easier to keep the colors balanced and under control than in the old days with felt pen and gouache.
And if it's a really bad pen(like the one we have in school), it will look even worse than if you did it with your mouse in paint.
output:
When it comes to creating visual art or making corrections and small details in other projects, people may choose between pen and paint and weigh the pros and cons of each.

Some argue that using a pen is easier and more forgiving than using paint, and that it allows for more precise control and matching of colors. Additionally, some pens may produce more interesting effects than metallic paints or work better on certain materials than paint pens. Pens can also be more convenient for certain situations, such as carrying a small notebook and black pen instead of pastels or paint.

Others argue that paint can be easier to manipulate than a pen for certain tasks, and that digital paint is even easier to control and balance than traditional pen and gouache. Paint may also offer more forgiving properties in the case of mistakes, such as oil paint being more forgiving than pen and ink. 

Ultimately, the choice between pen and paint may depend on personal preferences, the specific task at hand, and the desired outcome. Some people may find that they can best paint a picture with words, while others may find that pen and paint have limitations for their creative expression.

input:
Summarize: The graphics are definitely a step up from DQ9 for the DS, though whether they're better than DQ8 for the PS2 is harder to say.
DS will soon be the best selling console of all time - 4 years faster than PS2.
the ds is better than the psp imo even without the ps2(ish) level graphics.
The game feels like it suits the DS better than the PS2 thanks to the touch screen.
When it comes to low-cost independent development, though, the DS seems like a better option than the PS2.
I didn't rae them oakland... Personally, according to IGN, the DS version sounds just as bad, if not worse, than the PS2 version.
nintendo ds (6:09pm EST Wed May 19 2004) It has two screens and way better grapics than bullshit ps2.
I don't know, but the Nintendo DS has (so far) sold faster than the PS2 did simply because their potential market was much larger.
Things that have been maintained or improved for the DS version include the detailed graphics: indeed some say that the DS game looks better than the PS2 original in some ways!
Still, the DS has managed to reach the 10 million mark faster than the PS2 did, just shy of five years since the handheld launched in March 2005.
Probably bigger than the visual difference between PS2 and Xbox games.As I said before,PSP's games will cost less and be easier to develop for.So if I'm right then this means PSP will have more games coming out faster than DS.
Probably because a) the DS is fairly unpopular among adult gamers in the west and b) the DS port of Disgaea was significantly inferior to the PS2 and PSP version.
GTA Liberty Stories is a great game and far superior to all that childish nonsense on DS with those awful kiddy graphics!!!
And S-Shark, for ure information, a PS2 portable is 100 times better than a nintendo DS.
The PS2 continued to do much better then everyone expected, the Wii blew everything away, as did the DS.
I play the PSP version (which sells better than the DS version) more than other PSP games.
even if they stayed with the PS2 for DQ9, it'd still be a hell of a lot better than the DS.
HELL, even Persona 4 Golden, a VITA game AND a port of a PS2 game, sold better than DQVI on DS!
If it's a game I've already played and loved, I'll almost always get the latest remake for the improvements (weird exceptions like Rayman DS, which is inferior to the PS2 version of Rayman 2, may occur, but are rare).
In addition, it will provide about the same graphical processing power of a PS2, which is leagues better than Nintendo's upcoming DS.
output:
DS and PS are both popular gaming consoles that have their strengths and weaknesses. 

Some users argue that DS has better graphics, is better suited for touch screen games, is more popular among a wider range of consumers, and is a better option for low-cost independent game development. On the other hand, some users prefer PS for its superior graphics processing power, superior game library (GTA Liberty Stories), and ability to play more mature/adult games. 

However, there are also arguments that challenge these views, such as a comparison between the graphics of DQ for PS and DQ for DS being difficult to make. Furthermore, while some criticize the DS's "kiddy graphics", others argue that it has sold faster than PS, has games that are as good as or better than PS, and even sound better than PS in some cases. 

Ultimately, the choice between DS and PS depends on personal preferences, gaming needs, and priorities. Both consoles have a rich history of providing fun and entertaining games, so users should try both and see which one they prefer.

Summarize: I am really loving chicken pizza too... a lighter alternative to sausage.
This pizza was much better than the Turkey Sausage Pizza.
clam pizza may be better than its sausage.
De Lorenzo's clam pizza may be better than its sausage.
I always requested their spaghetti (which wasn't great, but it was better than their pizza).
Truly, the only pizza better than one you can make yourself is Lou Mal's butter crust sausage pizza.
Moral disputes are like disputes about whether anchovies on a pizza are better than sausage.
Pizza was a notch better than CiCi's, with decent enough attempts at pies beyond pepperoni and sausage.
On the other hand their sausage rolls and calzones are fantastic - I do not know why the crust on them is so far superior to their pizza crust.
IMHO I think the pizza at La Buca is better than the pizza at Mozza -- I'm comparing the two versions of fennel sausage.
Easier than homemade and marginally better for us than pizza.
What's better than pizza than pizza buns.
The only thing better than pizza, is portable pizza.
Nothing goes together better than late nights and pizza!

Sausage and Broccolini work better than expected in a pizza ($11).
I was expecting better nutritional content but it is better than a high fat pizza.
[...] Nothing better then homemade pizza and this crust is simple and delicious.

The sausage was better than I had hoped for; it is among the better sausages to grace a pizza in this sausage loving town.

Moreover, some people argue about the relative merits of toppings, e.g. whether clam pizza is better than sausage pizza, or whether pepperoni and sausage pizzas are better than veggie pizza.

Ultimately, the decision of whether pizza or sausage is better comes down to personal preferences and tastes. It is worth trying different types of pizzas and sausages to determine what works best for you.

Summarize: Also it has windows 7 which I find it nicer and easier than windows 8.
either that or if its not actually accelerated, the whole OS is much faster, more responsive and much smoother than windows 7.
Not that it made much difference - about 5 seconds faster with my Samsung 830 (worked out to a 5 second quicker boot than Windows 7) .
Learn to keep your fingers on the keyboard rather than reaching for the mouse and you'll probably find that things are just as quick and easy - if not quicker and easier - to achieve as they were in Windows 7 and earlier.
At least I have the dock which is inferior to Windows 7 but superior to Windows 8.
I am not a big fan of the new UI interface but I got used to it and it feels much better and faster then windows 7.
The Windows 7 Explorer status bar along with Classic Shell allowed me to work with file sizes BETTER, faster and with less keystrokes and without any performance issues than the dumbed down Windows 8 Explorer status bar does.
Windows 8.1 is still inferior to Windows 7 for serious desktop users.
The experience for searching local files is still a bit worse than Windows 7, but it is wildly better than Windows 8.0, and the integrated search is actually very useful.
Once you load up Windows 8 with all your programs, software, files that you use on a daily basis, it isn't faster than Windows 7 at all.
It is faster, smoother and just work better than Windows 7.
The Windows 8 Desktop should be made more friendlier, better and faster than the Windows 7 plus the easy switching to Modern UI.
However, I will be fair - Windows 8 DOES explain to you the basics of it's functionality from when you first start it up, and it's faster, lighter and smoother than Windows 7.

Windows 8 runs smoother and faster than Windows 7 across the board.

The desktop part is better and faster than Windows 7.
Because Windows 8 is suppose to be quicker and better, just like windows 7 was quicker and better than XP.

Ultimately, the choice between Windows  and Windows  may depend on personal preferences, needs, and goals. It's also worth mentioning that there are other factors beyond performance and ease of use, such as compatibility with certain software programs, interface design, and security features, that may influence the choice between the two operating systems.

Summarize: Clearly, Apple is in a much better, smarter position than Microsoft and most of the other players.
Apple has better programmers, so it's able to write tighter, faster, stronger code than Microsoft.
Explain to me again why Apple's way is "better" for users and how, exactly Apple is moving faster than Microsoft.
I would hope that when Mr. Jobs is not running Apple they continue offering a superior product with better tech support than any microsoft product.
Apple has shown that they can get massively faster and better OS development out of a small, well-managed team of programmers than Microsoft with its billions and thousands of programmers.
inferior to Apple products and (3.)
re: Braktune (10:51am EST Thu May 20 2004) "Apple has shown that they can get massively faster and better OS development out of a small, well-managed team of programmers than Microsoft with its billions and thousands of programmers.
Only Apple is better than Microsoft, because they usually deliver MORE than they tell you, and the OS gets faster with each point release, instead of slower.
Google is no better than Apple and probably worse.
Apple is certainly a lot better with software than Microsoft and for sure leagues superior to Rim which is famous for inferior software bugs and defects.
Microsoft imperatively needs to be faster (to catch up) and better (to win) than Apple and Google.
Microsoft obtained this position by being easier to use than Linux and by operating a better business model than Apple.
I honestly think Ubuntu has a greater chance of overtaking Windows than OS X does, since they can capture the corporate sector easier than Apple will allow themselves to (it is Debian after all).
While they have some time left to turn that around -- and to their credit they're turning faster and better than most people imagined -- right now they're racing to keep up with Apple (and Google) in mobile.
Microsoft should focus its attack on the Android market instead because that would be easier to penetrate, with users who weigh their options better than the Apple users.
By lending financial and technical support, Microsoft could ensure that the next generation of must-have apps would run faster and smoother on Windows than on anything Apple or Novell or Sun could come up with.
Of course, since the pressure on Microsoft to fix their problems is REALLY high (because the threat of infection is so high), they had BETTER be faster than Apple.
Microsoft was faster than Dell (3 minutes) or Apple (2.5 minutes) for the time it took to get a hold of a real person: Microsoft clocked in at one and a half minutes.
It is actually easier (and better) to connect with an MS network from an Apple product than from an MS product - the thing that keeps this from happening is draconian IT policies enforced by non-progressive IT departments.
"I think Microsoft does a better job with their code auditing than folks like Apple do.
output:
Apple and Microsoft are two technology giants that often draw comparisons.

Some argue that Apple has better programmers and development teams, which allow them to write tighter, faster, and stronger code. Others praise Apple's product quality and tech support. Some even argue that Apple's way of doing things is better for users than Microsoft's. 

On the other hand, some argue that Microsoft has a superior business model and is easier to use than other competitors like Linux and Apple. Others highlight Microsoft's code auditing and faster response times in customer support. Some also argue that Microsoft must be faster and better than Apple and other competitors to stay relevant and secure.

Ultimately, opinions on Apple and Microsoft depend on personal preferences and specific uses. Some people praise both companies for different reasons. It's important to do research and consider different factors when making a decision between the two brands.

Summarize: The advantage of using steel is that it is lighter and easier to move and assemble than concrete.
Because there are no load transfer dowels, steel reinforcing, forms, joints or finishing, RCC is simpler and faster to build than conventional concrete pavement.
Gluing tile on a Myrtha stainless steel surface is much easier and safer than on concrete, as there is no possibility of water seepage from behind the tile and the traditional problem of poor long-term adhesion is therefore eliminated.
This invention pertains to a rigid, fireproof steel floor construction that is simpler and easier to build than the usual metal lath and concrete floors, and which may installed by inexperienced workmen without regard to their ability to proportion and mix ingredients.
But for the building that is ten stories tall, and certainly any buildings that are taller, steel would be a better choice since its compression strength is twenty five times greater than the compression strength of the concrete.

In addition, steel structures are lighter than concrete.

C-GRID is much lighter and has nearly seven times greater tensile properties than steel.
Aluminum shoring is lighter and has load carrying capacity equal to or greater than steel shoring.
Aluminum shoring is lighter and has load-carrying capacity equal to or greater than steel shoring.
A hybrid composite beam used for bridge-building is lighter in weight and easier to install than a typical steel I-beam, has reduced maintenance needs and provides better corrosion-resistance, according to Martin Grimnes, founder and CEO of Maine-based Harbor Technologies.

output:
Steel and concrete are two materials commonly used in construction, with each having its own strengths and weaknesses.

Some arguments in favor of steel include its lighter weight, which makes it easier to move and assemble than concrete, as well as its greater tensile strength, and resistance to moisture. However, steel is slower to erect, and plain steel is poorer in fire situations and needs to be covered in fire-rated materials.

On the other hand, concrete is noted for its strength, cost-effectiveness, and longevity. According to some arguments, concrete is superior to steel in many ways, being better insulated and more fire-rated than plain steel. Concrete is also simpler and faster to build than conventional pavement, making it preferable in some situations.

Overall, the choice between steel and concrete may depend on specific needs and requirements. It is also possible to combine the two materials for optimal results, such as using a hybrid composite beam for bridge-building.

Steel is lighter and easier to move and assemble than concrete, making it a popular choice for structures that require mobility or flexibility. It also has greater tensile strength than concrete, making it ideal for buildings with a height of ten stories or taller. Summarize: The Nikon AF-S 80-400mm is slightly lighter and of course better appointed than the Sigma's, although the Sigma was no slouch.
Nikon 10-24 is more useful, better built, faster to focus, easer to manually override AF if needed, sharper and therefore better than Sigma 10-20.
Canon isn't much better, though: They pump out new APS-C bodies faster than most people change their underwear - but their EF-S lenses are completely incompatible with their FF bodies (they don't have a crop mode like Nikon).
Nikon glass will always be superior to Sigma.
I think most people see Sigma cameras and lenses as inferior to brands like Nikon and Canon.
I could imagine if you would want a lighter and smaller option, the Nikon is better than the Sigma.
My Nikon 14mm-24mm zoom, at 14mm, is clearly superior to a Sigma 14mm f2.8 I have and in my opinion, slightly better than my Nikon 14mm f2.8.
1 stop faster than the Nikon and I like the color rendition better than the Sigma 10-20 which I used to have.
